18.18: maaib taub zruj Lo Eei yiu-Tai myenb naaig ye-su, “pcvb fim Eei finb scv aa'b! yia xij zu'g Navq haiq nx zruj Zivj tu'q yetg liud Eei mcvg?”
18.8: yia Buaj meib Bua, ninb zuvq xij syepg syepq Eei Tevj pcvb fim Eei Beng suv. mq paag yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, cvj taaib uaq zang, yia tu'q pwatg yem luvb Diaq maaib myenb syenj Eei fai?”
18.33: ninb Bua xij lovg pyaab pin Bx'q yaag zx'q yia taij kwavg, mq paag Ga'haaq pua Nxi yia cvj navb taaib.”
18.3: yem uaq nxm muvq maaib taub aub kwaaq zanb zang taaib lxd uaq taub syemq zwid Jyen kxvq, ‘maaib myenb koj yia, Toq lovg pcvb fim Eei leid Tevj yia Beng suv.’
18.32: Tauj uaq yia xij zu'g myenb zx'q Jiu pun Janj, zu'g myenb Jyetq, kxvq to'g Ki, Twiq uamb Rwib nctq yia.
18.21: uaq laanb myenb kxvq, “naaiq teij leid yetg zuvq yia faib faij Eei fyru Tauj ib zang.”
18.35: ye-su mivb aaq lamb Tauj ye-li-Ko zivb, maaib taub mziv mcvb Eei myenb zweid uaq Jaub Len Toq Eang.
18.43: ninb lyemb zeib haib mavg tu'q pwatg zyrug kan Jyenq ye-su mivb, Zev Jyenq Tinb huvb mivb. zwavj myenb pwatg naaiq teij sig, ninb Bua yetg zuvq zyrug Zev Tinb huvb.
18.40: ye-su zyrug tivb Jyenq uaq Buaj myenb txb ninb taaib. Tauj fatq teij, ye-su naaig kaaj ninb,
18.14: ye-su cvj kxvq, “yia Buaj meib Bua, syru Rrub zinb Eei myenb Rwrnj Eei zyavb hog ninb tu'q Zauj Tinb huvb hxpg Hruq. mq paag uaq taub faa-li-sij myenb maiq tu'q Zauj Tinb huvb hxpg Hruq. haiq taub Taaib kanb zruj Lo, Tinb huvb xij pun uaq taub zruj faij. haiq taub Eyemg kanb zruj faij, Tinb huvb xij pun uaq taub zruj Lo.”
18.23: uaq laanb myenb haid naaiq teij waag ninb zyrug Raub, weig zu'g ninb putq zxib haig.
18.6: zyruq cvj kxvq, “mwavj kaaj, naaiq taub maiq pcvb fim Eei syemq zwid Jyen Eei waag.
18.34: ye-su kxvq naaiq teij waag, saib kxj Bua maiq hiuq tu'q kxvq haiq Euvg. naaiq teij waag Eei eij leid se Navq meiq Jyenq nx, saib kxj Bua Zivj taaib maiq pia'g Hruq.
18.2: ninb kxvq, “maaib nxm muvq maaib taub syemq zwid Jyen. ninb maiq kamb Riaj Tinb huvb, yaag maiq mavg haiq taub Eei Myen.
18.36: haid myenb Zamq Jiaj Jauq ninb naaig kaaj, “myenb zruj haiq Euvg?”
18.20: meib yaag hiuq tu'q leib latg kxvq, ‘maiq tuvq Yenj auq Yenj Goj. maiq tuvq taij myenb. maiq tuvq zruj za'g. maiq tuvq zruj Jaaq zxvb zevj. xij zu'g Tovj nimg tiaj maag.’+”
18.24: ye-su pwatg ninb Raub haig zyrug kxvq, “putg zxib myenb a'g tu'q pia'g Tinb huvb Eei kua'q.
18.28: pi-te zyrug kxvq, “mavg kaaj, yia Bua kwavg Jyenq yia Bua Eei Jaab tivb taaib kan saib tiaj.”
18.7: Tinb huvb maiq zeid xij pcvb fim Eei Tevj ninb kinq taaib Eei yaag zyavb Nxi zyavb mwrnd Jrub ninb uaq teij myenb fai? Tinb huvb xij vaib laub Zivj taaib Tevj ninb Bua fai?
18.29: ye-su kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua, haiq taub weig Tinb huvb Eei kua'q kwavg pyauq fai auq fai muab txig fai tiaj maag fai fu'Jweiq,
18.19: ye-su naaig ninb, “meib weig haiq tiug heug yia zruj pcvb fim myenb? Zwrtq liud Tinb huvb, maiq maaib haiq taub pcvb fim.
18.17: yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua, haiq taub maiq Kavq Navq taub fu'Jweiq lovg Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq ninb, uaq taub yetg liud maiq tu'q pia'g Tinb huvb Eei kua'q.”
18.38: uaq taub mziv mcvb myenb zyrug heug, “Daa-witq huvb Eei zeib fun, ye-su aa'b! Kxb lyenb yia maa'b!”
18.31: ye-su txb Jyenq uaq teij zyepg Eeig taub saib kxj mivb Pyen teij Buaj ninb Bua, “Bua ib zang mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb. trug waag myenb fiaq Jyenq kxvq yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, Eei yetg zuvq sig zyrug Zwrtq taaib txib tiug Revg.
18.30: yem naaiq seij ninb xij tu'q kaub Zamq Jiaj ziaj kruq. Ga'haaq hivq yaag xij tu'q yetg liud Eei mcvg.”
18.27: ye-su tau, “paamb myenb maiq haib zruj Eei, Tinb huvb haib zruj.”
18.11: faa-li-sij myenb sruq Jyenq uaq tauj kauj kxvq, ‘Tinb huvb aa'b! yia lcvd zivb haig meib weig zu'g yia maiq Navq ka'Eiag Eei myenb. yia maiq mauq ka'naaiq, yaag maiq zruj Hruq Pyen, yaag maiq Yenj auq. maaib teij myenb zruj naaiq teij Jauq mq paag maiq zeid yia. yia yaag lcvd zivb haig meib, yia maiq Navq naaiq taub syru Rrub zinb Eei myenb.
18.5: mq paag naaiq taub aub kwaaq pa'la'g taaib Zeub faanb yia haig. maiq haib fuvg zruj, xij zu'g Tevj ninb pcvb fim Eei Beng. maiq Tevj nx, ninb zyrug zanb zang taaib la'Eauq yia Kruq haig.’+”
18.9: maaib teij myenb Zev ninb Bua kanb zruj Kuq myenb, mavg Piaj ka'Len myenb. ye-su zyrug kxvq naaiq tiub waab peiq pun naaiq teij myenb mwavj.
18.16: mq paag ye-su heug fu'Jweiq taaib. ninb kxvq, “kunq pun fu'Jweiq taaib lxd yia, maiq tuvq laanb ninb Bua saa. weig zu'g haiq taub lovg Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq ninb se Navq naaiq teij fu'Jweiq nx.
18.41: “meib xij yia Tevj haiq Euvg meib?” ninb tau, “tomb kxj aa'b! yia xij mavg tu'q pwatg.”
18.37: myenb Buaj ninb, “naa-saa-letq muvq Eei ye-su Jiaj naaiq.”
18.39: mivb Daavg uaq teij hemj ninb, “maiq tuvq Ko lo maa'b!” mq paag ninb Jaa heug kaub Bwi teij, “Daa-witq Eei zeib fun aa'b! Kxb lyenb yia maa'b!”
18.4: “Toq laub haig a'q, syemq zwid Jyen yaag maiq Kavq Tevj. zruj kau, ninb yem Hruq Namq, ‘yia maiq kamb Riaj Tinb huvb yaag maiq mavg haiq taub Eei Myen.
18.10: ninb kxvq, “maaib i laanb myenb mivb zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq tauj kauj. maaib laanb faa-li-sij myenb, maaib laanb Tevj lo-maa huvb Jaa syru Rrub zinb Eei myenb.
18.22: ye-su haid Navq naaiq kxvq, ninb zyrug Buaj uaq laanb myenb, “cvj maaib yetg Euvg meib Zxg maiq kcvb zruj. xij zu'g mivb maaig Revg meib maaib Eei ka'naaiq, zx'q uaq teij Eaanb pun Gxi myenb Jomg myenb. Navq naaiq meib zyrug maaib Jaaij Eei ka'naaiq syru Jyenq Tinb txvb. zruj liud, taaib kan yia og.”
18.12: yetg nxm leib paaij yia zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg i Rung. yia tu'q haiq Euvg, zyepg kruq yia pun yetg kruq meib.’
18.42: ye-su Buaj ninb, “ib zang meib mavg tu'q pwatg a'q. laaij meib syenj yia, meib Eei mziv zyrug lovj.”
18.15: maaib teij myenb yaag txb ninb Bua Eei kub vwaad taaib xij ye-su maan. saib kxj Bua pwatg myenb Navq naaiq nx zruj, saib kxj Bua zyrug kxvq ninb Bua a'q.
18.13: “mq paag syru Rrub zinb uaq taub sruq Jyenq uaq mcvj ko teij Eei. ninb lyemb maiq Zau Myen mavg kub vwaaig luvb. ninb za'kevb haid Hruq Raub haig zyrug suv puad Rwei la'Kwrtq kxvq, ‘Tinb huvb aa'b! yia paamd zwid Zamq haig a'q. Toq Kxb lyenb yia maa'b!’+”
18.1: ye-su cvj lovg naaiq tiub waab peiq Faauj ninb Eei saib kxj Bua xij zu'g zanb zang tauj kauj, maiq tuvq Hruq namj.
18.26: maaib teij myenb haid ye-su Navq naaiq nx kxvq zyrug naaig kaaj, “Navq naaig uaq Euvg, haiq taub haib tu'q Fruj?”
18.25: lxb Txb Zunj Jiaj simb Bywig Zxg kaub huvb heg putg zxib myenb pia'g Tinb huvb Eei kua'q.”

8.18: Navq naaig meib Bua xij zu'g lovg Hruq mwavj lovj. weig zu'g haiq taub maaib Eei, ninb xij Jaa tu'q kaub Zamq. haiq taub maiq maaib, lyemb ninb Namq taaib ninb maaib Eei ti'q tyen, zuvq xij zx'q mivb.”
8.45: ye-su naaig kaaj, “haiq taub Lua zu'g yia?” yaag maiq maaib haiq taub lcvd. pi-te zyrug kxvq, “saib tiaj aa'b! myenb Zamq weib Jyenq meib, Bevj zu'g meib saa'b?”
8.3: maaib Ku-saa Eei auq, yo-an-naa. Ku-saa zruj Jyen kruj Revg he-lotq huvb Eei Jaab tivb. cvj maaib su-sanj-naa Zauj msia'q txn Zamq Eei. ninb Bua lovg kanb maaib Eei ka'naaiq Jwav ye-su Bua.
8.43: yaag maaib taub msia'q txn putq pcvb Lutq tu'q zyepg Eeig Havj. ninb mivb lxd Diab sai zxg kau ninb Eei pcvg, zaauj Revg ninb Eei zinb Eaanb, yaag maiq maaib haiq taub zxg tu'q ninb lovj.
8.50: mq paag ye-su haid naaiq teij waag ninb zyrug kxvq Buaj yai-latq, “maiq tuvq kamb Riaj og. Kuvj xij zu'g syenj Navq. meib Eei sia'q zyrug lovj taaib a'q.”
8.14: Dxtq zu'g Fimb lomg uaq teij Eim peiq myenb mwavj haid Kuq fyenj. zruj kau, laaij seij zavg Kwrnj Hruq Eei sig, fai laaij Namq zinb Eaanb, fai paamb ken Eei Fyenb yrub Duaq ninb Bua, naaiq teij sig Byxvd Jyenq ninb Bua Zivj taaib Navq maiq haib Jaub Eei Eim nx.
8.48: ye-su Buaj ninb, “mtaub msia'q txn aa'b! weig zu'g meib syenj yia, meib Eei pcvg lovj mig a'q. kunq pcvb xn Eei Rwrnj a'q og.”
8.34: yuvd tuvd Eei myenb pwatg naaiq teij sig Zwrtq, ninb Bua zyrug pyauj mivb zunb Buaj zivb ka'Euad Zauj zivb ka'Eiag Eei fiub laavd Eei myenb mwavj.
8.2: cvj maaib teij msia'q txn yaag kan Jyenq mivb. naaiq teij msia'q txn tovb zinb Daavg ye-su zung myenq Zwrtq yaag zxg lovj ninb Bua Eei pcvg uaq teij. maaib taub heug maa-li-yaa, tovb myenb heug, makq-Daa-laa, uaq taub. ye-su zung siag taub myenq Zwrtq ninb Eei sin.
8.36: pwatg naaiq teij sig Zwrtq Eei myenb kxvq pun zwavj myenb hiuq tu'q zu'g myenq pia'g uaq taub myenb Navq haiq nx tu'q lovj taaib.
8.35: myenb haid liud naaiq teij sig, zyrug Zwrtq mivb mavg. mivb Tauj ye-su uaq, ninb Bua pwatg uaq taub myenb zweid Jyenq ye-su Eei zauj ka'Len, zu'q Jyenq lwib hruj yaag Rav taaib a'q. ninb Bua zyrug kamb Riaj haig.
8.24: saib kxj Bua zyrug mivb heug ye-su Eia taaib. ninb Bua kxvq, “zyruq aa'b! zyruq! Bua Dxtq uam taig a'q lo'b!” ye-su Jiad sin hatg Ryaauj Zauj uamb laavg. tomb Ryaauj zyrug tivb, uamb laavg haapq, sekq Revg mig a'q.
8.7: maaib teij Eim Dxtq zu'g Fimb lomg, zxpg Jyenq Fimq Lo taaib, Fimq Byxvd Jyenq.
8.17: “maiq maaib haiq Euvg pivj Jyenq Eei sig maiq zu'g Zwrtq yaavb. maiq maaib haiq Euvg kem Jyenq mq paag xij maaib myenb hiuq yaag pun Byaavj yaavb Zwrtq taaib.
8.49: ye-su Zxg kxvq Jyenq waag uaq zang, maaib taub myenb yem uaq taub kunq wig txvb Eei myenb Eei pyauq taaib Buaj yai-latq, “meib Eei sia'q taig mig a'q. maiq zu'g taaib la'Eauq finb scv a'q og.”
8.11: “naaiq tiub waab peiq Eei eij leid se Navq naaiq. uaq teij Eim se Tinb huvb Eei Kuq fyenj.
8.33: myenq zyrug Zwrtq uaq taub myenb mivb pia'g uaq kwanb tuvd mig a'q. zyavb kwanb tuvd zyrug Tiuj Fiag Kamj Dxtq Kxib txn zyemj taig Revg mig a'q.
8.16: “maiq maaib haiq taub tyemq zia'g tav cvj zx'q ka'naaiq Gopq Jyenq fai txb mivb ton Zrub Diaq. tav mtaaib ton tav Eei paaib weig pun pia'g pyauq Eei myenb mavg tu'q pwatg Fav.
8.40: ye-su yem uaq vaang zi'g kaa-li-li Kxib txn Rwrnj taaib, maaib myenb Zamq Eei a'Neiq Eei zipq weig zu'g ninb Bua yem uaq zuaq Jyenq ninb.
8.37: yem ke-laa-saa teig Eei zwavj myenb Toq ye-su leib Gxi ninb Bua weig zu'g ninb Bua kamb Riaj haig. ye-su zyrug pia'g Ravq mivb a'q.
8.4: maaib myenb Zamq! Eei kapq zunq yaag maaib naaiq nxm muvq, uaq nxm muvq Eei myenb taaib lxd ye-su. ye-su zyrug kxvq waab peiq pun ninb Bua mwavj.
8.51: mivb Tauj yai-latq Eei pyauq, ye-su maiq pun haiq taub pia'g. Kuvj pun pi-te, yo-han, yaa-kxpg Zauj uaq taub sia'q Eei tiaj maag pia'g Navq.
8.12: Dxtq zu'g Jauq uaq teij Eim peiq myenb mwavj haid Tinb huvb Eei Kuq fyenj. mq paag myenq Eei huvb taaib Zaavq Zwrtq yem Hruq uaq teij Kuq fyenj, pun ninb Bua maiq haib syenj zyrug maiq tu'q Fruj.
8.46: mq paag ye-su kxvq, “kevb maaib myenb Lua zu'g yia Eei lx'g. yia hiuq Eei, weig zu'g maaib teij yia Eei Qa'q Zwrtq mivb Tevj myenb zxg pcvg mig a'q.”
8.13: Dxtq zu'g la'pyeib Dau uaq teij Eim peiq myenb mwavj haid Kuq fyenj zyrug a'Neiq zipq. mq paag se Navq Kuq fyenj Fiag Ruvb maiq Do. syenj maiq laub, pwavb zu'g seij Hruq Eei sig zyrug Zwrtq mig a'q.
8.26: ye-su Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj Bua Rcv Ravq mivb Tauj ke-laa-saa teig, kaa-li-li Kxib txn Eei txib vaang.
8.28: naaiq taub myenb yetq pwatg ye-su ninb heug Qiaj Lo Eei zyrug Baapq Fiag ye-su Eei Ra'Myen naug! naug Eei kxvq, “yem Lav Jiaj Eei Tinb huvb Eei txn, ye-su aa'b! meib taaib yia naaiq zruj haiq Euvg? Toq maiq tuvq zeij yia.”
8.54: mq paag ye-su nanq Jyenq uaq taub sia'q Eei puad heug, “sia'q aa'b! Jiad sin taaib maa'b!”
8.8: maaib teij Eim Dxtq zu'g Daub lovj. Eim Zwrtq Lo taaib, yetg kruq syru tu'q yetg pc'q kruq.” kxvq liud naaiq teij waag, ye-su heug Qiaj Lo Eei kxvq, “haiq taub maaib mnxmb xij zu'g pcv mnxmb mwavj lovj.”
8.9: saib kxj Bua naaig ye-su, “naaiq tiub waab peiq, eij leid Navq haiq nx?”
8.32: maaib yetg tomb kwanb tuvd yem uaq Jiaj Baiq lxd Eang. myenq zyrug Toq ye-su pun ninb Bua pia'g uaq kwanb tuvd. ye-su yaag Gxi Rwib ninb Bua.
8.21: ye-su kxvq Buaj zwavj myenb, “yia Eei maa Zauj yia Eei yrud se tovb mwavj Tinb huvb Eei waag yaag ei Jyenq zruj uaq teij.”
8.23: mivb kau, ye-su mFxmb mig a'q. lyemb zeib pxvd kxv tomb Ryaauj, pwrng uam Jiad laavg Gomd pia'g Ravq. ninb Bua kevb! kamb Riaj haig.
8.6: maaib teij Dxtq zu'g la'pyeib Dau. Eim zunj taaib maiq laub zyrug Gaai mig a'q, weig zu'g maiq lamb pcv uam.
8.55: uaq taub sia'q zyrug navb taaib, lyemb zeib Jiad sin taaib a'q. ye-su zyrug Buaj ninb Bua lxd ka'naaiq pun uaq taub fu'Jweiq Eang.
8.44: ninb zyrug Bevj Jyenq mivb Tauj ye-su Eei Ga'haaq Gaav Lua ye-su Eei lwib Jua'q. pcvb Lutq zyrug lyemb zeib tivb mig a'q.
8.20: maaib myenb Buaj ye-su, “meib Eei maa Zauj meib Eei yrud sruq Jyenq ka'Eiag mcvj zuaq xij pwavb meib.”
8.5: ninb kxvq, “maaib laanb myenb Zwrtq mivb haad Eim. haad kau Eim, maaib teij Dxtq zu'g Jauq, zu'g myenb Zaaiq. nx'g yaag taaib Raud Eang Revg.
8.56: sia'q Eei tiaj maag Bua'g hxvb haig mq paag ye-su Buaj ninb Bua, naaiq teij sig maiq tuvq kxvq Buaj haiq taub.
8.53: zwavj myenb zyrug Jyetq ye-su, weig zu'g ninb Bua hiuq tu'q uaq taub fu'Jweiq za'kevb taig mig a'q.
8.19: ye-su Eei maa Zauj ninb Eei yrud Bua mivb lxd ye-su mq paag myenb Zamq haig, ninb Bua pia'g maiq Tauj ninb uaq.
8.38: tovb myenq Zwrtq liud uaq taub myenb Toq ye-su pun ninb kan Jyenq mivb. mq paag ye-su heug ninb Rwrnj a'q,
8.31: uaq teij myenq Toq ye-su maiq tuvq zung ninb Bua Dxtq Do haig Eei Kwrtq.
8.52: zwavj myenb yem ka'Eiag Byrub Byrub Eei Eyemq. ye-su kxvq, “maiq tuvq Eyemq a'q. ninb maiq taig. ninb mFxmb Navq.”
8.27: ninb Bua Zwrtq Ravq mivb faauj Byenj uaq zang, maaib taub uaq nxm muvq Eei myenb taaib pwavb zu'g ye-su. naaiq taub myenb maaib myenq yem ninb Eei sin. laub haig maiq zu'q lwib hruj yaag maiq yem pyauq, Kuvj yem uaq zrub kemb Navq.
8.41: maaib taub kunq wig txvb Eei myenb, Buaj heug yai-latq, taaib Tauj. ninb Baapq Fiag ye-su Eei zaub Len Fiag Qa'q Toq ye-su mivb ninb Eei pyauq
8.1: Ga'haaq maiq laub, ye-su zweib muvq zweib laavd Eei mivb zunb Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq myenb Eei Kuq fyenj. ninb Eei zyepg Eeig taub saib kxj yaag Zauj Jyenq ninb mivb.
8.39: kxvq Buaj ninb, “Rwrnj kanb Eei pyauq a'q. Rwrnj mivb ziuj Tinb huvb Tevj meib Eei Jauq kxvq Revg Buaj myenb.” naaiq taub myenb zyrug Rwrnj mivb ziuj ye-su Tevj ninb Eei Jauq kxvq Revg pun yetg nxm muvq Eei myenb mwavj.
8.47: uaq taub msia'q txn mwavj haid pivj maiq Bweid a'q, zyrug sin zinj Jyenq Eei taaib Baapq Fiag ye-su Eei zaub Len. ninb txv Jyenq zwavj myenb Buaj ye-su ninb weig haiq tiug taaib Lua ye-su Eei lwib Jua'q, yaag kxvq ninb Eei pcvg lyemb zeib lovj Revg mig a'q.
8.10: ye-su kxvq, “Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq myenb naaiq teij kem Jyenq Eei sig, Tinb huvb pun meib Bua hiuq mig a'q, mq paag ka'Eiag Eei myenb Kuvj haid kxvq penj waab peiq Navq weig ‘pun ninb Bua mavg yaag maiq pwatg, haid yaag maiq mevb pc'g.’
8.25: ye-su naaig ninb Eei saib kxj Bua, “meib Bua Eei syenj fim Jiaj haaij mig a'q?” mq paag ninb Bua kamb Riaj haig, Bua'g hxvb haig. laanb zyrug naaig laanb, “naaiq haiq taub x'b? ninb hatg Ryaauj hatg uam, lyemb Ryaauj Zauj uam yaag mwavj ninb Eei waag.”
8.22: maaib Nxi nx, ye-su Buaj ninb Eei saib kxj, “Bua mivb uaq vaang zi'g Kxib txn x'g?” ninb Bua zyrug pia'g Ravq Rcv Jyenq mivb a'q.
8.42: weig zu'g ninb Eei sia'g Do'g putq pcvg xij taig haig a'q. naaiq taub sia'q Eei Havb Jeiq leib maiq ko zyepg Eeig Havj. ye-su kan yai-latq mivb kau, myenb Zamq! haig Bevj Jyenq mivb.
8.15: Dxtq zu'g Daub lovj uaq teij Eim peiq myenb haid Tinb huvb Eei Kuq fyenj, lovg Hruq zyepg zua'q Eei syenj, yaag lovg nxig ei Jyenq zruj, Zivj taaib Navq naaiq teij Eim nx, zyavb tu'q kitq.
8.29: ninb Navq naaiq nx kxvq weig zu'g ye-su hatg Yiab kwaiq myenq Zwrtq uaq taub myenb Eei sin. maiq kunq maaib limg Dob Jyenq puab zauj cvj maaib myenb zuaq Jyenq, tu'q ziaj Rung myenq Zyruq taaib pun ninb Zutq tavj limg cvj zung ninb mivb uaq teib puvb Waav.
8.30: ye-su naaig ninb, “meib Eei Buaj heug haiq Euvg?” ninb tau, “Buaj heug kwanb,” weig zu'g myenq Zamq Eei pia'g ninb Eei sin yem.

3.18: yo-han cvj lovg Zamb tiug Jauq Kwinj ninb Bua, yaag zunb Kuq fyenj pun ninb Bua mwavj.
3.8: meib Bua zruj sig xij zu'g pun Ziv meib Bua za'kevb kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid. yaag maiq tuvq yem Hruq Namq, ‘yia Bua maaib apg-laa-ham zruj yia Bua Eei ovb Taaij.’ yia Buaj meib Bua, Tinb huvb zuvq haib zx'q naaiq teij la'pyeiq zruj penj apg-laa-ham Eei zeib fun.
3.33: naa-son zruj am-mi-naa-Dapg Eei txn. am-mi-naa-Dapg zruj atg-min Eei txn, atg-min zruj aan-ni Eei txn, aan-ni zruj hetq-lon Eei txn, hetq-lon zruj pe-letq Eei txn, pe-letq zruj yu-Daa Eei txn,
3.3: ninb zyrug yem Jx-Dcn Daaib uaq teij txvj zunb tod Buaj myenb, “xij zu'g kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid, Jiaj uam Eei leid, Tinb huvb zyrug kwavg meib Bua Eei zwid.”
3.32: Daa-witq zruj Jyetg-si Eei txn, Jyetg-si zruj o-Betg Eei txn, o-Betg zruj Bo-aatg Eei txn, Bo-aatg zruj sanj-mon Eei txn, sanj-mon zruj naa-son Eei txn,
3.21: zwavj myenb Jiaj uam Eei leid Eei zyavb hog, ye-su yaag Jiaj uam Eei leid. txij ninb tauj kauj uaq zang, luvb Gxi mig a'q.
3.35: naa-ho zruj sej-lukq Eei txn, sej-lukq zruj le-u Eei txn, le-u zruj pe-lekq Eei txn, pe-lekq zruj e-Be Eei txn, e-Be zruj Qe-laa Eei txn,
3.14: maaib teij pcv cvj naaig ninb, “yia Bua ni? xij zu'g Navq haiq nx zruj?” yo-han tau, “maiq tuvq la'kwaib lomb huq, Duaq myenb Eei Eaanb Eang. maiq tuvq koj Jaaq sig hxig myenb. meib Bua Eei kovb zinb tu'q Bu'ziaj xij zu'g Hruq Gaai.”
3.23: ye-su Jiad kxn zruj ninb Eei kov uaq zang, ninb tu'q faab zyepg Havj Eei txvj. myenb Namq taaib ye-su zruj yo-sepq Eei txn. yo-sepq zruj he-li Eei txn,
3.6: luvb Diaq myenb xij tu'q pwatg Tinb huvb Eei Fruj en.’+”
3.34: yu-Daa zruj yaa-Kopq Eei txn, yaa-Kopq zruj i-sakg Eei txn, i-sakg zruj apg-laa-ham Eei txn, apg-laa-ham zruj Te-laa Eei txn, Te-laa zruj naa-ho Eei txn,
3.2: an-naatq Zauj Kaa-yaa-faatq zruj tomb sai myenb. tovb uaq zang sej-Kaa-li-yaa Eei txn, yo-han, yem teib puvb Waav zipq Tinb huvb Eei waag.
3.36: Qe-laa zruj Kai-naan Eei txn, Kai-naan zruj aan-faa-satq Eei txn, aan-faa-satq zruj sem Eei txn, sem zruj no-yaa Eei txn, no-yaa zruj laa-mekq Eei txn,
3.20: Navq naaig, he-lotq cvj Jaa zruj kaub waaig, zuvq zx'q yo-han wrnj Jyenq lob.
3.24: he-li zruj matq-Tatq Eei txn, matq-Tatq zruj le-wi Eei txn, le-wi zruj men-Ki Eei txn, men-Ki zruj yan-naai Eei txn, yan-naai zruj yo-sepq Eei txn,
3.28: ne-li zruj men-Ki Eei txn, men-Ki zruj atg-Di Eei txn, atg-Di zruj Ko-samj Eei txn, Ko-samj zruj en-maa-Dam Eei txn, en-maa-Dam zruj e-aa Eei txn,
3.7: myenb Zamq kwanb kwanb Eei mivb lxd yo-han, xij yo-han Tevj ninb Bua Jiaj uam Eei leid. yo-han Buaj ninb Bua, “meib Bua naaig Dwi naavb to'g Eei pwrnq aa'b! haiq taub Kwinj meib Bua pyauj, weig Ga'haaq maiq zu'g Tinb huvb nrud meib Bua?
3.29: e-aa zruj yo-su-waa Eei txn, yo-su-waa zruj e-li-ye-se Eei txn, e-li-ye-se zruj yo-lim Eei txn, yo-lim zruj matq-Tatq Eei txn, matq-Tatq zruj le-wi Eei txn,
3.19: ninb yaag kxvq he-lotq, laaij he-lotq lovg ninb kanb Eei yrud Eei auq, he-lo-Dyetg, yaag laaij ninb zruj Zamb Euvg waaig sig.
3.17: ninb Eei puad nanq Jyenq ka'naaib Zenq, xij fyruj Revg ninb Eei Bx'q Byaub Zyavq yaag syru ninb Eei Byaub tapq lamd. mq paag Zu'g mauj ninb xij lovg yetg liud maiq haib taig Eei trud puaq Revg.”
3.38: Ke-nan zruj e-notq Eei txn, e-notq zruj setg Eei txn, setg zruj aa-Dam Eei txn, aa-Dam zruj Tinb huvb Eei txn.
3.31: e-li-yaa-Kim zruj me-le-aa Eei txn, me-le-aa zruj men-naa Eei txn, men-naa zruj matq-taa-Taa Eei txn, matq-taa-Taa zruj naa-Tan Eei txn, naa-Tan zruj Daa-witq Eei txn,
3.30: le-wi zruj si-me-on Eei txn, si-me-on zruj yu-Daa Eei txn, yu-Daa zruj yo-sepq Eei txn, yo-sepq zruj yo-naam Eei txn, yo-naam zruj e-li-yaa-Kim Eei txn,
3.27: yo-Daa zruj yo-aa-nan Eei txn, yo-aa-nan zruj le-saa Eei txn, le-saa zruj sej-lupq-Baa-Ben Eei txn, sej-lupq-Baa-Ben zruj se-an-Ti-en Eei txn, se-an-Ti-en zruj ne-li Eei txn,
3.11: ninb tau, “haiq taub maaib i teij lwi xij zu'g pun teij maiq maaib uaq taub. haiq taub maaib Naavj Eang yaag xij zu'g pun teij vxg Eei myenb Eang.”
3.5: nxmb nxm hxvd xij zu'g tinb pwavq, Bovb Lav Bovb aiq xij zu'g zruj pcvb. Jauq vau Jauq Fwrtq xij zu'g kxiq za'g, Jauq maiq ywrnb xij zu'g zruj ywrnb.
3.9: ib zang Beng zyavj pruq, zuvq an Jyenq Dyavb kxn. haiq tiub Dyavj zyavb pyruq maiq Kuq, xij zu'g kxij kwavg puaq trud mivb.”
3.16: yo-han zyrug kxvq Buaj zwavj myenb, “yia lovg uam Tevj meib Bua Jiaj leid. cvj maaib taub xij taaib. ninb maaib livg maaib Qa'q kaub Lo Jiaj yia. yia lyemb maiq Pwij Tevj ninb Jaiq heb Laav. ninb yaag xij lovg sivj livb Zauj trud Tevj meib Bua Jiaj leid.
3.37: laa-mekq zruj me-Tu-sej-laa Eei txn, me-Tu-sej-laa zruj e-nokq Eei txn, e-nokq zruj yaa-letq Eei txn, yaa-letq zruj maa-haa-laa-le-en Eei txn, maa-haa-laa-le-en zruj Ke-nan Eei txn,
3.4: naaiq se Navq trug waag myenb, i-saa-yaa, fiaq Jyenq ninb Eei sru kxvq, “maaib laanb myenb yem teib puvb Waav heug Jyenq kxvq, ‘xij zu'g liug leid zyruq Eei Jauq. ninb Eei Jauq xij zu'g Kxi za'g Eei.
3.10: zwavj myenb naaig kaaj yo-han, “Navq naaig, yia Bua xij zu'g Navq haiq nx zruj?”
3.22: sivj livb Fiag taaib, Euvg zeiq Navq nxm nx'g Go nx, yem ninb Eei sin. yaag maaib Qiaj yem kub vwaaig luvb kxvq, “meib se yia Eei txnb Namq. yia za'kevb a'Neiq haig meib.”
3.12: maaib teij Tevj lo-maa huvb Jaa syru Rru Eei myenb taaib lxd yo-han, xij Jiaj uam Eei leid. ninb Bua naaig kaaj, “finb scv aa'b! yia Bua ni? xij zu'g Navq haiq nx zruj?”
3.15: zwavj myenb haiq zang yaag zuaq Jyenq Tinb huvb lcvd Paaiq taaib uaq taub Fruj zyruq, zyrug yem Hruq Namq yo-han se ki-tug mq pei.
3.13: yo-han tau, “meib Bua hxpg zu'g syru Bu'ziaj, xij zu'g syru Bua'g uaq Navq.”
3.1: Ti-Be-li-atg si-saa zruj huvb tiaj zyepg Mmd Havj uaq Havj, pxn-Ti-atg pi-laatq zruj zuvj kunq yu-Dia scvq, he-lotq kunq kaa-li-li scvq. ninb Eei yrud, fi-lipq, kunq i-Tu-lia Zauj taa-Ko-ni-titg teig. li-saa-nyetq kunq aa-Bi-len,
3.26: nakq-kaai zruj maa-aatg Eei txn, maa-aatg zruj matq-Taa-Ti-atg Eei txn, matq-Taa-Ti-atg zruj sej-me-in Eei txn, sej-me-in zruj yo-sekg Eei txn, yo-sekg zruj yo-Daa Eei txn,
3.25: yo-sepq zruj matq-Taa-Ti-atg Eei txn, matq-Taa-Ti-atg zruj aa-motq Eei txn, aa-motq zruj naa-hum Eei txn, naa-hum zruj etg-li Eei txn, etg-li zruj nakq-kaai Eei txn,

21.18: mq paag meib Bua Eei Ba'pyei yetg tiub zuvq maiq zu'g myetg.
21.8: ye-su kxvq, “xij zu'g faij fim og. maiq tuvq mwavj haiq taub Duaq meib Bua. maaib myenb Zamq xij lovg yia Eei Buaj taaib kxvq, ‘yia tovb ki-tug a'q,’ yaag kxvq, ‘zyavb hog Tauj a'q.’ maiq tuvq kan ninb Bua.
21.33: luvb Dau xij Jiaj Revg mq paag yia Eei waag yetg liud maiq Jiaj.
21.3: ye-su kxvq, “yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua, naaiq taub aub kwaab Jomg fovg hxg Eei Eaanb kaub Zamq Jiaj taub taub Eei.
21.32: “yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua, naaiq txig myenb Jiaj seij maiq kcvb Revg, naaiq teij yetg zuvq sig zyrug Zwrtq taaib a'q.
21.21: uaq zang yem yu-Dia scvq uaq teij xij zu'g pyauj faauj Bov. yem zivb Eei myenb xij zu'g pyauj Zwrtq. yem ka'Eiag zi'g zivb uaq teij maiq tuvq pia'g zivb a'q.
21.35: weig zu'g uaq nxm Nxi za'kevb xij Tauj luvb Diaq nxmb nxm txvj Eei myenb.
21.14: xij zu'g Jaab Daavg tivg Hruq maiq tuvq Raub Tauj uaq zang Navq haiq nx tau.
21.23: yem uaq teij Nxib Eia'g, maaib Jyenq sin Zauj maaib kub vwaad hopq Exj Eei msia'q txn za'kevb Kruq a'q. naaiq nxm teib puv xij zu'g tomb ze'g naang yaag zu'g Tinb huvb nrud, zyrug tivg naaiq teij myenb Eei zwid.
21.6: “meib Bua pwatg naaiq teij ka'naaiq, maaib nxm Nxi yetg zuvq zu'g Zc'q Revg. maiq maaib yetg Kwaaiq la'pyeiq lapq Jyenq a'q.”
21.34: “xij zu'g kiv Hruq Buvb Jyenq, maiq tuvq laaij Namq xij Eang peuq hopq Gwin yaag laaij seij zavg Eei Jauq Kwrnj Hruq. kamb Riaj uaq nxm Nxi lyemb zeib Tauj, Navq zcv Laav Lopq Jyenq meib Bua nx.
21.2: ninb yaag pwatg taub aub kwaab Jomg taaib tapq i nxm tovb zinb si'q.
21.36: xij zu'g zanb zang kiv Hruq zuaq Jyenq, tauj kauj Toq Tinb huvb pun meib Bua maaib Qa'q haib tiaq tu'q yetg zuvq xij Zwrtq taaib Eei sig, yaag tu'q sruq Jyenq yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, Eei Ra'Myen.”
21.20: “meib Bua pwatg pcv weib Jyenq ye-lu-saa-lem uaq zang, meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q zivb zu'g paaig Waav Eei zyavb hog Tauj fatq a'q.
21.24: maaib teij zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij. maaib teij zu'g Zaavq mivb Tauj maang kua'q. Janj xij Zaaiq Jyenq ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Tauj Janj Eei zyavb hog pwavq sruj mrug.
21.28: pwatg naaiq teij sig Jiad kxn Zwrtq, xij zu'g sruq Jiad taaib Zau Myen mavg Jyenq luvb, weig zu'g zua'g meib Bua Eei zyavb hog Tauj fatq a'q.”
21.7: ninb Bua naaig ye-su, “saib tiaj aa'b! Toq Buaj yia Bua og. naaiq teij sig haiq zang xij Zwrtq? sig xij Zwrtq uaq zang maaib haiq Euvg Javb hog pun Ziv zyavb hog Tauj?”
21.29: ye-su cvj kxvq naaiq tiub waab peiq pun ninb Bua mwavj. ninb kxvq, “mavg kaaj vovb Exj Dyavj Zauj Euvb Euvg Dyavj!
21.19: meib Bua tiaq tu'q Tauj taaub nx, zyrug Fruj tu'q meib Bua Eei mcvg a'q.
21.17: laaij yia, zwavj myenb xij Rxv meib Bua.
21.38: Dxmb Dxm Ryruq Eei zwavj myenb mivb zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq xij mwavj ye-su.
21.31: naaiq fib Navq Eei. meib Bua pwatg naaiq teij sig Zwrtq, meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq myenb Eei Nxib Eia'g Tauj fatq a'q.
21.30: pwatg Zwrtq nxmb lunj zyrug hiuq tu'q xij pia'g haag kweij a'q.
21.27: Tauj uaq zang ninb Bua zyrug pwatg yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, maaib Qa'q Zauj tomb Favb laavg yem txq Bwrnj Fiag taaib.
21.11: cvj maaib teij txvj Dau yaag tovd tu'q seij haig. maaib teij txvj pwavb tomb vxg, maaib teij putq tomb wrnb pcvg. yaag maaib kamb Riaj haig Eei sig, Zauj tomb Javb hog yem uaq luvb Zwrtq.
21.5: maaib teij myenb Zev zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq zxv tu'q Rweig haig. lovg la'pyeib Rweig zruj taaib, yaag lovg myenb fovg hxg Eei zivb Eeig zxv Rweig. ye-su kxvq,
21.9: meib Bua haid Bx'q tomb Jaaj Zauj teib puv lung Eei fyenj, maiq tuvq kamb Riaj. naaiq teij sig Dovg haaij yaag xij Zwrtq Daavg. mq paag setq mweid Eei Nxib Eia'g lyemb zeib maiq kcvb Tauj.”
21.16: meib Bua Eei tiaj maag, muab txig, Zyenb Ze'q, kxb yrud yaag xij maaig meib Bua. maaib teij meib Bua yaag xij zu'g ninb Bua taij taig.
21.37: ye-su Nxib Nxi mivb zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Faauj myenb. Mwavj teij ninb zyrug Zwrtq zivb mivb zyavb mwrnd yem ka'lanq Bov.
21.4: weig zu'g uaq teij myenb Eaanb Zamq, ninb Bua fovg hxg teij paaq Navq. mq paag naaiq taub aub kwaaq Dovg naaig Jomg, lyemb ninb Eei yuvd mcvg Eaanb ninb fovg hxg Revg mig a'q.”
21.10: ye-su cvj kxvq, “naaiq fivj Zauj uaq fivj xij Bx'q Jaaj. naaiq nxm kua'q Zauj uaq nxm kua'q xij Bx'q tomb Jaaj.
21.22: weig zu'g naaiq se tivg zwid Eei Nxib Eia'g, xij pun Euvb Euvg Zwrtq taaib txij Revg kivb sru fiaq Jyenq Eei waag.
21.12: “naaiq teij sig maiq kcvb Zwrtq Eei Nxib Eia'g, myenb xij zx'q meib Bua yaag zruj to'g hxig. ninb Bua xij zx'q meib Bua Jiu pun wig txvb yaag pun meib Bua zu'g wrnj Jyenq lob. meib Bua weig yia Eei mevb cvj zu'g txb mivb yem huvb tiaj Zauj zuvj Eei Ra'Myen.
21.15: weig zu'g yia xij pun meib Bua maaib Rwib maad, maaib Zovb mevb, pun meib Bua Eei winb wavq Rcv maiq hivb yaag maiq maaib waag kxvq a'q.
21.13: zyrug maaib Qavj kxvq weig Kuq fyenj zruj zxvb zevj.
21.1: ye-su Zau Myen pwatg putg zxib myenb tapq Eaanb zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq uaq nxm syru Eaanb Eei faav.
21.26: myenb kamb Riaj kau, zyrug meib mwavq Revg. ninb Bua kamb Riaj haig yem naaiq luvb Diaq xij Zwrtq taaib Eei sig, weig zu'g yem luvb maaib Qa'q Eei ka'naaiq zuvq zu'g Dang tovd.
21.25: “uaq zang Leij, Laaj, Ba'Nxi xij Zwrtq Javb hog. luvb Diaq maang fivj xij Raub Tauj Do'q yaag Namq maiq mevb pc'g weig zu'g Kxiq Jiaj tomb laavg yaag pa'la'g Bwi tu'q seij haig.

14.18: “mq paag uaq teij myenb yetg zuvq Kuvj kxvq Twij zivb waag. ta'yetq taub kxvq, ‘yia maaid Rov Deig, xij zu'g mivb mavg tavb. meib Rwrnj mivb Buaj meib Eei zyruq, yia maiq tu'q mivb mq paag lcvd zivb a'q. Beng suv lovj a'q.’
14.8: ninb kxvq, “myenb Zivq meib mivb Zivb Jaab yinb maiq tuvq mivb zweid tiab kxn. Riaj pyaub zyruq Zivq taaib Eei Kc'q maaib taub kaub Lo meib mq pei.
14.33: fib Navq Eei, meib Bua haiq taub maiq siaq Jyenq kwavg meib maaib Eei yetg zuvq, maiq haib zruj maiq tu'q yia Eei saib kxj.
14.3: ye-su naaig kaaj faa-li-sij myenb Zauj Faauj leid Eei finb scv, “lovg tivb kov Nxi zxg pcvg, txvg Bua Eei leid fai maiq txvg?”
14.32: funj taaib Bx'q maiq hivb nx, uaq teij i waang Zxg yem ko Eei, ninb xij zu'g Paaiq myenb mivb Daavg Toq kxvq hxpg.
14.21: “pru Rwrnj mivb zx'q naaiq teij Jaub lrug Buaj ninb Eei zyruq. pyaub zyruq Qiaj Jiad haig. ninb Buaj ninb Eei pru, ‘kaanq mivb muvq zavg tomb Jaai fiub hxvg lxd myenb Jomg myenb, waaig favj Eei, mziv mcvb mziv Buaq Eei, Zauj zauj Bai Eei myenb.’
14.35: zruj pwrnj an Deig yaag maiq lamb lovg. toj kwavg vovb Gaiq Dwi zruj pwrnj yaag maiq tu'q. xij zu'g kwavg Navq. “haiq taub maaib mnxmb xij zu'g pcv mnxmb mwavj lovj.”
14.14: Navq naaig meib zyrug tu'q Fyenb yrub a'q. weig zu'g ninb Bua maiq haib winb pun meib. zuaq Kuq myenb navb taaib uaq Nxi, Tinb huvb xij winb pun meib.”
14.23: “zyruq cvj Buaj uaq taub pru, ‘xij zu'g Zwrtq mivb zweib tomb Jauq fiub Jauq lxd Jyenq mivb. pwatg haiq taub xij zu'g aapq Jyenq ninb Bua taaib, zyrug tu'q myenb pwavq yia Eei pyauq a'q.
14.6: mq paag maiq maaib haiq taub maaib waag tau.
14.34: “Rauq se lovj Eei. mq paag sij kxvq Rauq Eei mweij Twij zaamq mivb, Navq haiq nx nxig tu'q Raaib taaib?
14.2: maaib taub myenb putq pcvb frub taaib lxd ye-su.
14.20: “cvj maaib taub kxvq, ‘yia Zo'q ho'g lovg Jyenq auq, maiq haib mivb a'q.’
14.24: yia Buaj meib Bua, tovb yia Zivq Daavg uaq teij myenb, maiq maaib yetg laanb haib tu'q seij yia Eei laib Naavj Eei mweij.’+”
14.28: “sij kxvq meib Bua maaib taub xij komq nxm pyauq, ninb maiq zeid Jaab Daavg zweid Jyenq funj mavg kaaj Eaanb kauj zruj tu'q zyavj fai maiq zyavj?
14.7: ye-su pwatg Zivq taaib Eei Kc'q myenb Kuvj kinq zweid Jiaj mcvj puv tiab, ninb zyrug kxvq naaiq tiub waab peiq pun ninb Bua mwavj.
14.29: ninb maiq funj Daavg nx, zruj kau Tauj Daamb Jauq Daamb Juv zyrug kwavg Jyenq. haiq taub pwatg yaag Jyetq ninb.
14.19: “cvj maaib taub kxvq, ‘yia maaid tu'q pyaa txij vovb xij zu'g txb mivb seij mavg kaaj. meib Rwrnj mivb Buaj meib Eei zyruq, yia maiq tu'q mivb mq paag lcvd zivb a'q. Beng suv lovj a'q.’
14.17: “Tauj Eang Eei zyavb hog, ninb heug ninb Eei pru mivb Buaj Zivq liud Eei Kc'q myenb, ‘taaib a'q og. Euvb Euvg Beng zyavj a'q.’
14.31: “fai sij kxvq maaib taub huvb xij mivb Zauj kanb taub huvb Bx'q Jaaj, ninb maiq zeid xij zweid Jyenq funj mavg kaaj ninb Eei yetg waang pcv haib Bx'q tu'q uaq taub Eei i waang pcv hivb fai maiq hivb?
14.30: ninb Bua xij kxvq, ‘naaiq taub loq Jiad kxn komq yaag maiq maaib panb zeig komq maiq zyavj.’
14.27: haiq taub maiq Daam Jyenq ninb kanb Eei zyepg Ravg Jaaj kan Jyenq mivb, uaq taub yaag zruj maiq tu'q yia Eei saib kxj.
14.11: haiq taub Taaib ninb kanb zruj Lo, uaq taub xij zu'g zruj faij. haiq taub Eyemg kanb zruj faij, uaq taub xij tu'q zruj Lo.”
14.5: ye-su naaig kaaj ninb Bua, “sij kxvq tivb kov Nxi meib Bua haiq taub maaib taub lxb fai maaib taub vovb Za'g prug Dxtq Kwrtq, meib Bua maiq zeid lyemb zeib mivb zx'q Zwrtq fai?”
14.9: pyaub zyruq Zivq meib Bua i laanb taaib ninb zyrug xij zu'g taaib Buaj meib, ‘xij zu'g simq Gxi pun naaiq laanb myenb zweid naaiq.’ meib zyrug Eaiq haig a'q. xij zu'g swiq mivb zweid Diaq mcvj puv.
14.16: ye-su kxvq Buaj ninb, “maaib laanb myenb Beng nxm yinb Lo Eei yaag Zivq Kc'q Zamq.
14.4: mq paag ninb Bua maiq Ko lo. ye-su zyrug zxg lovj uaq taub myenb, Buaj ninb mivb a'q.
14.10: pia'g yinb uaq zang, meib xij zu'g zweid Diaq mcvj puv. Navq naaig pyaub zyruq xij Buaj meib, ‘kxj aag, faauj Jiaj mcvj puv zweid og.’ Zauj meib zruj Kc'q uaq teij zyrug Taaib meib a'q.
14.22: “maiq laub uaq taub pru Rwrnj taaib kxvq, ‘tomb kxj aag, yia ei meib Eei waag zruj liud a'q. mq paag Zxg maaib txvj Kuvj Eei.’
14.12: ye-su Buaj Zivq ninb taaib uaq taub pyaub zyruq, “meib haiq zang Zivq Kc'q taaib Eang Naavj, maiq tuvq Zivq meib Eei lob kcv txig, muab txig, Zyenb Ze'q fai laavd zavg Eei putg zxib myenb. mRiaj ninb Bua xij Zivq meib mivb winb meib Eei enb zivb.
14.15: maaib laanb myenb Zauj ye-su Jwavg tiab Eang Naavj haid naaiq teij waag ninb zyrug Buaj ye-su, “haiq taub tu'q yem Tinb huvb Eei kua'q Eang uaq nxm yinb Eei Naavj, uaq taub maaib Fyenb yrub a'q.”
14.13: meib Beng Naavj Zivq Kc'q, xij zu'g Zivq myenb Jomg myenb, zauj Bai, puab zauj waaig Zauj mziv mcvb mziv Buaq Eei myenb.
14.1: maaib nxm tivb kov Nxi, ye-su mivb taub zruj Lo Eei faa-li-sij myenb Eei pyauq Eang Naavj. myenb yaag lovb lovj Eei mavg Jyenq ninb.
14.26: “haiq taub taaib lxd yia yaag maiq Namq yia kaub Zamq Namq ninb Eei tiaj maag, ninb Eei auq Zauj fu'Jweiq Zauj muab txig, lyemb ninb kanb Eei mcvg, uaq taub maiq haib zruj yia Eei saib kxj.
14.25: myenb Zamq Eei kan Jyenq ye-su mivb. ye-su zyrug Win Rwrnj Buaj ninb Bua,

23.18: zwavj myenb yetg zuvq naug Jyenq Kib Kuvj Kaatq Eei kxvq, “taij naaiq taub a'q. puvj Baa-lapq-Batg pun yia Bua.”
23.45: Ba'Nxi yaag Mwavj mivb. yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq uaq Kwaaiq Bc'g kcvb Dia yaag Baaij zruj i mcvj.
23.3: pi-laatq zyrug naaig kaaj ye-su, “meib kevb zruj yiu-Tai myenb Eei huvb fai?” ye-su tau, “se Navq meib kxvq nx.”
23.43: ye-su tau ninb, “yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib, ib Nxi meib tu'q Zauj yia yem xnb lx'g Wivj.”
23.14: kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “meib Bua txb naaiq laanb myenb Tauj yia naaiq koj ninb. meib Bua kxvq ninb Zo'q pc'g fivj lung Revg. ib zang yem naaiq meib Bua Eei Ra'Myen yia zaab liud. tovb meib Bua koj ninb uaq teij sig, yia maiq pwatg ninb txvg haiq Euvg.
23.48: kapq zunq mavg naaiq teij sig Eei zwavj myenb pwatg sig Navq naaiq nx Zwrtq, ninb Bua zyrug Raub haig, Rwei Jyenq la'Kwrtq Rwrnj.
23.34: ye-su kxvq, “aa tia aa'b! Toq tia kwavg Gxi ninb Bua Eei zwid, weig zu'g ninb Bua zruj Eei ninb Bua maiq hiuq.” ninb Bua yaag zx'q ye-su Eei lwib hruj taaib Druq mavg weig pun Gxi.
23.2: yem uaq ninb Bua koj ye-su. ninb Bua kxvq, “yia Bua pwatg naaiq laanb myenb Duaq yia Bua Eei pc'g fivj zruj txvg. ninb yaag Buaj ninb Bua maiq zu'g Zwrtq Rrub zinb pun lo-maa tomb ziub huvb, yaag kxvq ninb kanb zruj ki-tug yaag zruj taub huvb.”
23.36: pcv yaag fib Navq Eei Wrtq ye-su, cvj mivb fatq teij zx'q a'vung tiub swi Zunq pun ninb
23.35: zwavj myenb sruq Jyenq uaq mavg. mq paag zruj Lo uaq teij yiu-Tai myenb Jyetq ninb. ninb Bua kxvq, “ninb Fruj tu'q myenb. sij kxvq ninb tovb Tinb huvb kinq taaib Eei ki-tug, pun ninb Fruj ninb kanb maa'b!”
23.24: pi-laatq zyrug tivg ei ninb Bua Toq Eei zruj.
23.7: pi-laatq hiuq tu'q ye-su zruj he-lotq huvb Eei pc'g fivj, ninb zyrug fuvj ye-su mivb Tauj he-lotq uaq. uaq zang he-lotq yaag yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb.
23.17: Havb Havj Tauj siaj mcvg zipq, pi-laatq xij zu'g puvj taub zwib myenb Zwrtq pun pc'g fivj.
23.49: Zauj ye-su Jiu zua'g uaq teij myenb cvj Zauj yem kaa-li-li kan ye-su taaib uaq teij msia'q txn sruq Jyenq ko teij Eei mavg naaiq teij sig.
23.11: he-lotq Zauj ninb Eei pcv mavg Piaj, Wrtq ninb, zruj to'g pun ninb. ninb Bua zx'q teij Rweig haig Eei lwi Tevj ninb zu'q Jyenq cvj fuvj ninb Rwrnj pi-laatq uaq.
23.33: ninb Bua mivb Tauj nxm txvj Buaj heug mGxvb Kx'q txvj, zx'q ye-su tiv Jyenq zyepg Ravg Jaaj. cvj tiv uaq teij i taub zwib myenb yem ye-su Eei ka'Len. maaib taub yem Byaaug mcvj, maaib taub yem zaaij mcvj.
23.16: Navq naaig, yia pun pcv Bx'q liud zyrug puvj ninb a'q.”
23.40: mq paag uaq taub zwib myenb paaq ninb kxvq, “meib maiq kamb Riaj Tinb huvb? Bua lomb Rxib zu'g tivg zwid taig.
23.37: yaag kxvq, “sij kxvq meib za'kevb yiu-Tai myenb Eei huvb nx, Fruj meib kanb maa'b!”
23.4: pi-laatq zyrug kxvq Buaj sai myenb pyeiq yaag Buaj zwavj myenb, “yia zaab maiq Zwrtq naaiq laanb myenb maaib haiq Euvg zwid.”
23.51: maaib taub yu-Dia scvq, aa-li-maa-Tia muvq Eei myenb, Buaj heug yo-sepq. ninb zruj taub Kuq myenb, kan lovj Tinb huvb Eei leid yaag zanb zang zuaq Jyenq Tinb huvb taaib zruj zyruq Eei Nxi Tauj. ninb yaag zruj taub kunq sig wig Eei myenb. mq paag uaq teij kunq sig myenb Zaavb laavb tivg Navq haiq nx zruj uaq zang, yo-sepq maiq Tevj ninb Bua kxvq.
23.12: zinb Daavg pi-laatq Zauj he-lotq zruj winb Jaa. mq paag tovb naaig Nxi ninb Bua zruj lovj taaq lob kcv.
23.46: ye-su heug Qiaj Lo Eei kxvq, “aa tia aa'b! yia Eei livb wrnb yia Jiu yem tia Eei puad.” Navq naaiq kxvq liud zyrug tavj Qiaj mig a'q.
23.13: pi-laatq heug sai myenb pyeiq Zauj Jyenb fruq Zauj pc'g fivj taaib kapq zunq
23.26: ninb Bua txb ye-su Zwrtq Jauq uaq zang, pwavb zu'g taub sai-lin myenb, Buaj heug si-mon, yem uaq naab taaib xij pia'g zivb. pcv zyrug Zaa taaib zx'q zyepg Ravg Jaaj lxvj Jyenq si-mon Eei Ba'taub, aapq ninb Daam kan Jyenq ye-su mivb.
23.28: ye-su Win Rwrnj taaib kxvq, “ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Eei msia'q txn aa'b! meib Bua maiq tuvq weig yia Eyemq og. xij zu'g weig meib Bua kanb Zauj meib Bua Eei fu'Jweiq Eyemq Navq.
23.54: uaq Nxi se liug leid Jiaj tivb kov Eei Nxi, tivb kov Nxi xij Tauj a'q.
23.8: he-lotq pwatg ye-su zyrug a'Neiq haig a'q, weig zu'g Kuvj haid myenb kxvq Navq. maiq kcvb tu'q pwatg yetg Rung. ninb yaag xij pwatg ye-su zruj teij Bua'g hxvb Eei sig.
23.9: he-lotq zyrug naaig Zamb Euvg Eei mq paag ye-su maiq tau yetg Jruj.
23.32: ninb Bua cvj txb i taub zwib myenb mivb Zauj ye-su yetg Jauq taij.
23.21: mq paag ninb Bua cvj nib nuvj naug Eei heug Jyenq kxvq, “txb ninb mivb tiv Jyenq! txb ninb mivb tiv Jyenq zyepg Ravg Jaaj!”
23.23: mq paag zwavj myenb yetg zei Kib Kuvj Kaatq Eei kxvq xij zu'g txb ye-su mivb tiv Jyenq zyepg Ravg Jaaj. zwavj myenb heug Tauj hivb.
23.6: pi-laatq haid ninb Bua Navq naaiq nx kxvq ninb zyrug naaig kaaj, “naaiq taub se kaa-li-li myenb?”
23.55: yem kaa-li-li kan ye-su taaib uaq teij msia'q txn kan Jyenq yo-sepq mivb mavg zruq, yaag mavg ninb Bua Navq haiq nx an ye-su Eei sei.
23.44: uaq zang aaq lamb zyavj aanj Eei zyavb hog, uaq nxm teib puv Mwavj Revg Tauj Fiag aanj pua nxm zyavb hog.
23.20: pi-laatq maaib Hruq xij puvj ye-su, ninb zyrug kxvq Lo Eei Buaj zwavj myenb.
23.5: mq paag ninb Bua Fiag Qa'q Jaa kxvq, “naaiq laanb myenb Faauj Eei leid pun zwavj myenb lung Revg. ninb Faauj kxmj yu-Dia teig, yem uaq kaa-li-li scvq Jiad kxn, ib zang zuvq Faauj Tauj naaiq taaib a'q.”
23.56: mavg liud ninb Bua zyrug Rwrnj mivb Beng Jyenq Daav Eei Dia, Daav Eei yrub, xij txb mivb Yetq ye-su Eei sei. Tauj tivb kov Nxi, ninb Bua zyrug ei leib latg tivb kov.
23.53: Toq liud zyrug mivb zx'q sei Fiag taaib, lovg la'maab Dia peu Jyenq fuvj mivb zavj nxm zu'g taaib Eei la'pyeib zruq. naaiq nxm zruq maiq kcvb zavj Jiaj yetg taub Janb taig.
23.19: naaiq taub Baa-lapq-Batg Zeuj lung zivb ka'Euad yaag taij Jiaj myenb Zivj taaib zu'g wrnj Jyenq lob.
23.38: yem ye-su kub vwaaig fiaq Jyenq naaiq teij waag, “naaiq taub se yiu-Tai myenb Eei huvb.”
23.31: sij kxvq Dyavj Eyemd Eei zyavb hog ninb Bua zuvq Navq naaiq zruj, Dyavb Krub Gaai xij Navq haiq nx?”
23.52: yo-sepq mivb lxd pi-laatq Toq ye-su Eei sei.
23.27: myenb Zamq Eei yaag kan Jyenq ye-su mivb. maaib teij msia'q txn yaag Eyemq tu'q Kruq haig weig zu'g ninb Bua Kxb lyenb haig ye-su.
23.41: weig Bua se hxpg Eei, Pwij tu'q Bua zruj Eei. mq paag naaiq taub maiq zruj txvg haiq Euvg.”
23.1: kunq sig wig Eei myenb yetg zuvq zyrug Jiad sin txb ye-su mivb pi-laatq zuvj uaq.
23.39: Zauj ye-su tiv Jyenq uaq teij i taub zwib myenb maaib taub kxvq to'g Ki ye-su, “meib zruj ki-tug maiq zeid? Fruj meib kanb yaag Fruj yia Bua maa'b!”
23.47: maaib taub pcvb pyeiq pwatg naaiq teij sig Zwrtq zyrug Zev Tinb huvb yaag kxvq, “naaiq laanb myenb za'kevb! Kuq myenb.”
23.10: sai myenb pyeiq Zauj Faauj leid Eei finb scv sruq Jyenq uaq, Qa'q koj ye-su.
23.25: ninb puvj ninb Bua Toq uaq taub, tovb laaij Zeuj lung zivb ka'Euad taij Jiaj myenb, zu'g wrnj Jyenq lob uaq taub. ninb cvj zx'q ye-su Jiu pun ninb Bua, sweib ninb Bua zruj.
23.22: pi-laatq cvj kxvq ta'faam Rung, “uaq Euvg, ninb zruj txvg haiq Euvg zwid? yia kevb maiq pwatg ninb txvg haiq Euvg zig tu'q taij ninb lx'g. yia zyrug pun yia Eei pcv Bx'q liud, puvj Gxi ninb a'q.”
23.42: ninb cvj kxvq Buaj ye-su, “ye-su aa'b! meib taaib zruj huvb Eei zyavb hog, Toq Javj teij yia og.”
23.15: he-lotq yaag fib Navq Eei maiq pwatg ninb maaib haiq Euvg txvg Eei txvj, weig zu'g ninb fuvj ye-su taauj Gaav Rwrnj Bua naaiq. mavg kaaj, naaiq laanb myenb maiq txvg haiq Euvg zwid zig tu'q taij lx'g.
23.29: weig zu'g zyavb hog xij Tauj, myenb xij kxvq, ‘maiq haib maaib scvb yuvd Eei uaq teij, Zauj maiq kcvb yuvd Jiaj kub vwaad uaq teij, cvj Zauj maiq pun kub vwaad hopq Jiaj Exj uaq teij msia'q txn maaib Fyenb yrub a'q.’
23.30: Tauj uaq zang myenb xij kxvq Buaj tomb zxv, ‘Baav taaib Dapq yia Bua maa'b!’ cvj heug fiub Bov, ‘pyopq Jyenq yia Bua a'q.’

6.18: taaib mwavj ye-su yaag Toq ninb zxg ninb Bua Eei pcvg. zu'g myenq mua'q uaq teij yaag taaib. ye-su zxg lovj Revg.
6.45: Kuq myenb Eei Hruq syru lovj Eei ka'naaiq, zx'q Zwrtq taaib Eei se lovj Eei. myenb waaig myenb Eei Hruq syru waaig Eei ka'naaiq, zx'q Zwrtq taaib se waaig Eei. Hruq zaavb pwavq haiq Euvg, Rwib zyrug kxvq Zwrtq uaq Euvg.
6.3: ye-su tau ninb Bua, “meib Bua maiq to'g Jiaj naaiq teij Jauq fai? Daa-witq huvb Zauj kan ninb uaq teij myenb Hruq sia Eei zyavb hog, ninb Bua Navq haiq nx zruj?
6.43: “Dyavj lovj maiq zyavb maiq penj Eei pyruq. maiq penj Eei Dyavj yaag maiq zyavb lovj Eei pyruq.
6.14: ninb kinq si-mon, (cvj Tevj ninb Zwrtq Buaj heug pi-te) Zauj pi-te Eei yrud, an-Daa-lu, cvj maaib yaa-kxpg, yo-han, fi-lipq, Baa-To-lo-miu,
6.48: ninb se Navq laanb myenb komq pyauq, wetq tu'q Do, pavg la'pyeib pcvb kub vwaaig Zeij Jiad. uam yemj, uam kwaatq, pyauq yaag maiq Baav, weig zu'g Zeij tu'q wrnq.
6.34: sij kxvq meib Bua Kuvj kaaq ka'naaiq pun haib Jaauq meib Bua uaq teij Navq, Tinb huvb Navq haiq nx haib Zeij fu'q pun meib Bua? lyemb zwib myenb yaag kaaq ka'naaiq pun zwib myenb, weig zu'g ninb Bua Namq taaib haib tu'q ninb Bua Eei ka'naaiq Rwrnj Revg.
6.2: maaib teij faa-li-sij myenb naaig kaaj, “ei Bua Eei leid, tivb kov Nxi maiq hxpg zu'g Navq naaiq nx zruj, meib Bua weig haiq tiug zruj?”
6.36: meib Bua xij zu'g Kxb lyenb myenb Navq meib Bua Eei zavg tiaj Kxb lyenb myenb uaq nx.
6.35: taauj Rwrnj xij zu'g Namq meib Bua Eei winb wavq, zruj lovj pun ninb Bua. kaaq ka'naaiq xij zu'g pun ninb Bua yaag maiq tuvq Namq cvj tu'q Rwrnj. Navq naaiq, meib Bua xij tu'q tomb zivb Eeig yaag penj yem Lav Jiaj uaq taub Eei txn, weig zu'g ninb zruj lovj pun maiq maaib enb zivb Eei myenb Zauj myenb waaig myenb.
6.24: meib Bua ib zang putq zxib Eei myenb xij zu'g Kruq a'q, weig zu'g meib Bua Eei Fyenb yrub meib Bua tu'q liud a'q.
6.7: maaib teij Faauj leid Eei finb scv Zauj faa-li-sij myenb xij lxd Jauq koj ye-su zyrug Zyenb mavg Jyenq, mavg kaaj, ye-su lovg tivb kov Nxi zxg pcvg fai?
6.17: ye-su Zauj ninb Eei kovb zob Bua Fiag Tauj Daub pcvb sruq Jyenq uaq. yem uaq cvj maaib ninb Eei saib kxj Zamq Eei, yaag maaib myenb Zamq yem yu-Dia scvq nxmb nxm txvj, Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem zivb, cvj Zauj yem Kxib Len uaq teij i nxm zivb, Tai-la'q Zauj sai-Dxn,
6.49: mq paag haiq taub haid yia Eei waag yaag maiq mwavj, maiq ei Jyenq zruj nx, se Navq laanb myenb komq pyauq yem Dau yaag maiq maaib kxnb Do'q. uam yemj, uam kwaatq, pyauq zyrug lomd! lomd Eei Baav waaig Revg mig a'q.”
6.11: uaq teij myenb Qiaj Jiad! haig. ninb Bua Zaavb laavb xij Navq haiq nx zruj pun ye-su.
6.33: sij kxvq meib Bua Kuvj zruj lovj pun tovb zruj lovj pun meib Bua uaq teij Navq, Tinb huvb Navq haiq nx haib Zeij fu'q pun meib Bua? Navq naaig lyemb zwib myenb yaag haib zruj Eei.
6.16: cvj maaib yaa-kxpg Eei txn, yu-Daatg, Zauj maaig ye-su uaq taub yu-Daatg i-saa-Kaa-li-otg.
6.40: hx'g scv maiq haib kaub Lo ninb Eei finb scv. hx'g scv ho'g liud Euvb Euvg zyrug Zauj finb scv fib Navq Eei.
6.37: “maiq tuvq taanb myenb, Tinb huvb zyrug maiq taanb meib Bua. maiq tuvq tivg myenb Eei zwid, Tinb huvb zyrug maiq tivg meib Bua Eei zwid. xij zu'g kwavg myenb Eei zwid, Tinb huvb zyrug kwavg meib Bua Eei zwid.
6.4: Daa-witq huvb pia'g zavg Tinb huvb Eei Dopg liub zx'q kevj Tinb huvb uaq teij Fuaq Eang. naaiq teij Fuaq Kuvj sai myenb kanb maaib leid Eang Navq. mq paag Daa-witq Eang yaag pun kan ninb uaq teij myenb Zauj Jyenq Eang.”
6.12: uaq teij zyavb hog ye-su faauj Bovb aiq mivb tauj kauj, yem uaq zyavb mwrnd Zauj Tinb huvb kxvq waag.
6.46: “meib Bua weig haiq tiug heug yia, ‘zyruq aa'b! zyruq!’ yaag maiq ei Jyenq yia Buaj Eei waag zruj?
6.13: luvb Fav Eei zyavb hog, ninb heug ninb Eei saib kxj Bua taaib, zyrug kinq Zwrtq zyepg Eeig taub, cvj heug ninb Bua penj kovb zob.
6.26: meib Bua tu'q zwavj myenb Zev meib Bua lovj Eei zyavb hog, meib Bua xij zu'g Kruq a'q. Zev meib Bua uaq teij myenb Eei ovb Taaij fib Navq Eei Zev Jaaq trug waag myenb.
6.28: myenb zyruj meib Bua, xij zu'g pwav waag pun ninb Bua. zruj to'g meib Bua uaq teij, xij zu'g Tevj ninb Bua tauj kauj.
6.8: mq paag ninb Bua Navq haiq nx Namq, ye-su hiuq Eei. ninb Buaj puad waaig uaq laanb myenb, “taaib sruq naaiq zwavj myenb Eei Ra'Myen og.” uaq laanb myenb zyrug Jiad sin sruq Jyenq uaq a'q.
6.9: ye-su kxvq, “yia naaig kaaj meib Bua, ei Bua Eei leid, tivb kov Nxi Bua haib zruj haiq Euvg? haib zruj lovj fai zruj waaig? Fruj mcvg fai hxig mcvg?”
6.32: “sij kxvq meib Bua Kuvj Namq tovb Namq meib Bua uaq teij myenb, naaiq maaib haiq Euvg faauj tu'q Zev? lyemb zwib myenb yaag Namq tovb Namq ninb Bua uaq teij.
6.21: meib Bua ib zang vxg Jyenq yem Eei myenb maaib Fyenb yrub a'q, weig zu'g meib Bua xij tu'q Eang peuq. meib Bua ib zang Eyemq Jyenq Eei myenb maaib Fyenb yrub a'q, weig zu'g meib Bua xij tu'q Jyetq.
6.23: ninb Bua Navq naaiq nx zruj, meib Bua xij zu'g a'Neiq, Fyenb yrub Eei Zavj heij, weig zu'g yem Tinb txvb maaib meib Bua Eei tomb zivb Eeig. zruj hxig meib Bua uaq teij myenb Eei ovb Taaij yaag fib Navq Eei zruj pun trug waag myenb.
6.6: cvj maaib nxm tivb kov Nxi, ye-su pia'g nxm wig txvb Faauj myenb. yem uaq maaib laanb myenb Byaaug Jia'q puad waaig mig a'q.
6.44: pwatg pyruq zyrug hiuq tu'q pyrub Dyavj se haiq Euvg Dyavj. myenb maiq mivb Dyavb Fimq kc'q vovb Exj pyruq, yaag maiq mivb Fimb Byx'g kc'q a'vung pyruq.
6.20: ye-su mavg Jyenq ninb Eei saib kxj Bua zyrug kxvq, “meib Bua myenb Jomg myenb maaib Fyenb yrub a'q, weig zu'g maaib Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq meib Bua.
6.5: ye-su zyrug Buaj ninb Bua, “yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, zruj tivb kov Nxi Eei zyruq.”
6.19: zwavj myenb Bevj Jyenq mivb xij Lua ye-su, weig zu'g ninb maaib zxg pcvg Eei Qa'q Zwrtq mivb Tevj ninb Bua yetg zuvq zxg pcvg.
6.38: meib Bua pun haiq Euvg myenb, Tinb huvb yaag xij winb pun meib Bua, zuvq xij toj pun meib Bua kaub Zamq, zatq ywrnb, Gamq zyetg, Laau nivj Tauj yem maiq Jyenq. meib Bua lovg haiq Euvg Laau pun myenb, Tinb huvb yaag xij lovg uaq Euvg Laau pun meib Bua.”
6.31: meib Bua xij myenb Navq haiq nx zruj pun meib Bua, meib Bua yaag xij zu'g Navq uaq nx zruj pun myenb.
6.27: “yia Buaj meib Bua ib zang mwavj Jyenq Eei myenb, xij zu'g Namq meib Bua Eei winb wavq, zruj lovj pun Rxv meib Bua uaq teij.
6.41: “meib weig haiq tiug pwatg meib Eei kxb yrud Eei mziv maaib la'fapq, yaag maiq Namq Tauj meib kanb Eei mziv maaib Ganj Dyavj?
6.1: maaib nxm tivb kov Nxi, ye-su Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj Bua Jiaj myenb Eei Byaub Deig. ninb Eei saib kxj nyetq Byaub txq nomq Eang.
6.39: ye-su cvj kxvq waab peiq pun ninb Bua mwavj. ninb kxvq, “mziv mcvb myenb haib Ken mziv mcvb myenb fai? Navq naaig i taub zuvq haib Dxtq Kwrtq maiq zeid?
6.47: haiq taub taaib lxd yia, haid yia Eei waag yaag ei Jyenq zruj, yia xij pun meib Bua hiuq tu'q uaq taub Navq haiq nx.
6.10: ye-su Win mivb mavg ninb Bua taub taub cvj kxvq Buaj puad waaig uaq laanb myenb, “suv meib Eei puad Zwrtq taaib maa'b!” ninb suv puad Zwrtq taaib, puad zyrug lovj Revg mig a'q.
6.25: meib Bua ib zang tu'q Eang peuq Eei myenb xij zu'g Kruq a'q, weig zu'g meib Bua xij zu'g vxg. meib Bua ib zang Jyetq Eei myenb xij zu'g Kruq a'q, weig zu'g meib Bua xij zu'g Raub, Eyemq Jyenq yem.
6.22: meib Bua weig yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, zu'g myenb Rxv, zu'g myenb Gemb, zu'g myenb Wrtq, yaag zu'g myenb taanb meib Bua Eei Buaj se x'q haig Eei Buaj, meib Bua maaib Fyenb yrub a'q.
6.42: kanb Eei mziv maaib Ganj Dyavj meib yaag maiq pwatg, fuvg haib Buaj kxb yrud, ‘kxj aag, yia Tevj kxj pan Zwrtq mziv Eei la'fapq og.’ peib za'g Hruq Fwrtq Eei myenb aa'b! xij zu'g zx'q Zwrtq kanb Eei mziv uaq Ganj Dyavj Daavg, meib zyrug haib mavg tu'q zyen Tevj kxb yrud pan Zwrtq mziv Eei la'fapq.
6.15: matq-Taai, To-matq, an-fe-atg Eei txn, yaa-kxpg, si-mon (tovb myenb heug, “Namq kua'q zavg” uaq taub).
6.29: myenb Bx'q meib Eei naaiq puv Myen, lyemb uaq puv Myen yaag Win pun ninb. myenb zx'q meib Eei tomb lwi mivb, lyemb ka'Euad uaq teij sweib ninb zx'q.
6.30: haiq taub Toq meib Eei haiq Euvg, xij zu'g pun ninb. haiq taub zx'q meib Eei haiq Euvg ka'naaiq mivb yaag maiq tuvq lxd Rwrnj.

2.18: haiq taub haid yaag Bua'g hxvb kruj yuvb myenb kxvq Eei waag.
2.45: lxd yaag lxd maiq pwatg, ninb Bua zyrug taauj sin Rwrnj ye-lu-saa-lem zivb lxd.
2.3: taub taub myenb zyrug Rwrnj kanb Eei pwrnb muvq faauj myenb hrud.
2.43: tovb uaq Rung mivb kau, Jiaj zipq Eei wig Raanj, ninb Bua Rwrnj, mq paag naaiq taub txn, ye-su, Zxg yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb. ninb Eei tiaj maag yaag maiq hiuq tu'q,
2.50: ye-su Navq naaig nx kxvq mq paag ninb Bua Zxg Namq maiq mevb pc'g.
2.14: ninb Bua kxvq, “Zev Tinb huvb, yem Lav Jiaj Eei txvj uaq taub. luvb Diaq myenb, tovb ninb a'Neiq uaq teij, xij tu'q pcvb xn.”
2.48: ninb Eei tiaj maag pwatg ninb uaq zang, ninb Bua lyemb Namq maiq hiuq. ninb Eei maa zyrug kxvq Buaj ninb, “aa txn aa'b! meib fuvg Navq naaiq nx zruj pun yia Bua? meib Eei tia Zauj yia lxd maiq pwatg meib, Raub tu'q Kruq haig a'q nyaa.”
2.34: si-me-on pwav waag pun ninb Bua, cvj Buaj ye-su Eei maa, maa-li-yaa, “Tinb huvb kinq naaiq taub kub vwaad taaib pun i-saa-laa-en myenb Zamq Eei zu'g myetg, pun Zamq Eei tu'q Fruj. ninb xij penj nxm Javb hog mq paag maaib myenb Zamq Eei xij taanb ninb,
2.2: (faauj naaiq ta'yetq Rung myenb hrud uaq zang, txij zu'g Ki-li-ni-atg zruj zuvj kunq si-lia teib puv.)
2.36: cvj maaib taub msia'q txn, Buaj heug an-naa, zruj trug waag myenb. ninb se aa-se fivj, faa-nu-en Eei sia'q. an-naa koj haig a'q. zinb Daavg ninb txv Jyenq Jaa siag Havj,
2.35: pun ninb Bua yem Hruq Namq Eei Jauq piuj mevb Zwrtq taaib. meib xij pwavb zu'g Raub Navq Ru'g Daauq pa'q Jyenq meib Eei Ba'Riu uaq nx.”
2.24: ninb Bua yaag ei zyruq Eei leib latg txb ka'naaiq mivb ziag pun zyruq Navq naaiq, “yetg txij nx'g Go fai i nxm pc'g kopq lunj.”
2.7: maa-li-yaa zyrug yuvd tu'q ninb Eei taaub taub txn taaib, lovg swavj peu Jyenq pun ninb pweij maab zob ka'Euad, weig zu'g Kc'q pyauq maiq maaib txvj pun ninb Bua hitq.
2.17: kruj pa'ki yuvb Eei myenb pwatg, ninb Bua zyrug zyav finb myenb kxvq naaiq taub kub vwaad Eei Jaub lrug Buaj zwavj myenb.
2.49: ye-su tau, “aa maa Bua weig haiq tiug lxd yia? meib Bua maiq hiuq tu'q yia xij zu'g yem yia Eei tia Eei pyauq?”
2.11: ib Nxi, yem Daa-witq Eei muvq, meib Bua Eei Fruj zyruq Zwrtq seij taaib a'q, tovb zyruq ki-tug.
2.33: kub vwaad Eei tiaj maag Bua'g hxvb haig si-me-on Navq naaiq nx kxvq kub vwaad Eei Jaub lrug.
2.16: ninb Bua zyrug kaanq Jyenq mivb, lxd pwatg maa-li-yaa Zauj yo-sepq yaag pwatg uaq taub kub vwaad pweij Jyenq maab zob ka'Euad.
2.40: naaiq taub kub vwaad kunq Lo kunq henq, kunq maaib Zovb mevb, Tinb huvb yaag Zeij en pun ninb.
2.37: zyrug kwaaq mig a'q. ninb zruj aub kwaaq Tauj tu'q petq zyepg feij Havj yaag maiq mivb haiq Dau. Kuvj yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Nxib Nxi mwrnb mwrnd zavg Tinb huvb Navq. maaib zyavb hog ninb zei Jyenq maiq Eang haiq Euvg yaag tauj kauj.
2.4: yo-sepq zyrug yem kaa-li-li scvq, naa-saa-letq muvq, mivb yu-Dia scvq, Betg-le-hem muvq uaq. naaiq nxm muvq se lob Nxi Daa-witq huvb Zwrtq seij Eei muvq. yo-sepq se Daa-witq huvb Eei zeib fun Zivj taaib xij zu'g mivb uaq nxm muvq faauj myenb hrud.
2.51: ye-su zyrug kan Jyenq ninb Bua Rwrnj naa-saa-letq muvq, yaag mwavj Revg tiaj maag Eei waag. naaiq teij Jaub lrug Zwrtq liud, ninb Eei maa haiq zang yaag Javj Jyenq.
2.12: naaiq se zruj Javb hog pun meib Bua. meib Bua xij lxd pwatg taub kub vwaad peu Jyenq swavj pweij maab zob ka'Euad.”
2.46: cvj lxd kau, Tauj ta'faam Nxi uaq Nxi, pwatg ninb yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq zweid Jyenq finb scv Eei Bu'Dovj, yetg ping mwavj ninb Bua kxvq, yetg ping naaig ninb Bua.
2.13: lyemb zeib cvj hing Zwrtq yetg tomb kwanb finb myenb taaib Zauj Jyenq hing Zwrtq Daavg uaq taub, Zev Tinb huvb.
2.26: sivj livb pun ninb hiuq tu'q ninb zuaq Tauj tu'q pwatg zyruq lcvd pun uaq taub ki-tug Zivj taaib taig.
2.28: si-me-on zyrug Lxpq Jyenq ye-su Zev Tinb huvb. ninb kxvq,
2.8: uaq nxm teib puv maaib teij kruj pa'ki yuvb Eei myenb luvb mwrnd zang yem yuvb Zyavq kruj ninb Bua Eei yuvb.
2.9: maaib taub zyruq Eei finb myenb hing Zwrtq taaib yaag maaib zyruq Eei Favb laavg ziuj Jyenq ninb Bua, hc'q ninb Bua kamb Riaj haig.
2.32: naaiq taub kub vwaad zruj Fav pun kanb fivj myenb hiuq tu'q meib Eei eij, yaag pun myenb Taaib meib Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb.”
2.21: ye-su Zwrtq seij taaib pwavq Yetg Nxi uaq Nxi, Tauj zyavb hog Tevj ninb Jiaj kaatq Eei leid, ninb Bua zyrug Tevj ninb Zwrtq Buaj heug ye-su. naaiq nxm Buaj, maa-li-yaa maiq kcvb maaib sin uaq zang finb myenb Tevj Zwrtq zyavj a'q.
2.23: ei zyruq Eei leib latg fiaq Jyenq kxvq, “haiq taub yuvd tu'q taaub taub txn xij zu'g fuvj pun zyruq.”
2.6: yem Betg-le-hem muvq uaq zang, Tauj Dutq sin Eei zyavb hog a'q.
2.44: laaig ye-su Zauj Jyenq myenb Zamq Rwrnj. ninb Bua zyrug Rwrnj yetg Nxi Mwavj a'q, Zivj taaib lxd naaig Zyenb Ze'q kxb yrud.
2.20: mavg yuvb Eei myenb weig ninb Bua pwatg liud, haid liud Eei sig zyrug Taaib Tinb huvb, Zev Jyenq Tinb huvb Rwrnj. yetg zuvq txij Revg finb myenb kxvq Eei waag.
2.5: yo-sepq kxvq zyavb maa-li-yaa, zyrug txb ninb Zauj Jyenq mivb. maa-li-yaa Eei sin yaag maiq Kuvj.
2.19: mq paag maa-li-yaa maiq haib la'Ku'q. aab log Javj Jyenq naaiq teij Jauq.
2.38: si-me-on yem uaq kxvq Jyenq waag uaq zang, an-naa cvj mivb Tauj ninb Bua uaq, lcvd zivb Tinb huvb cvj kxvq naaiq taub kub vwaad Eei Jaub lrug pun zuaq Jyenq Tinb huvb taaib zua'g ye-lu-saa-lem zivb uaq teij myenb mwavj.
2.31: tovb meib txv Jyenq maang fivj myenb liug leid zyavj Eei Fruj en.
2.52: ye-su kunq Lo kunq maaib Zovb mevb. Tinb huvb a'Neiq haig ninb. myenb yaag fib Navq Eei a'Neiq haig ninb.
2.27: sivj livb txb si-me-on pia'g zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq. yo-sepq Zauj maa-li-yaa yaag txb ye-su pia'g mivb xij ei Jyenq leib latg zruj.
2.41: Havb Havj ye-su Eei tiaj maag mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Jiaj siaj mcvg zipq.
2.1: uaq zang si-saa x-katg-tatg huvb Fiag livg hatg lo-maa zyrub tivb yetg zuvq pc'g fivj faauj myenb hrud.
2.39: yo-sepq Zauj maa-li-yaa ei Jyenq zyruq Eei leib latg zruj zyavj Revg, ninb Bua zyrug Rwrnj kaa-li-li scvq, ninb Bua Eei pwrnb muvq naa-saa-letq.
2.47: myenb haid ninb kxvq Eei waag, haiq taub yaag Bua'g hxvb haig ninb Dovg naaig kwai, tau tu'q Dovg naaig hxpg.
2.10: finb myenb kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “maiq tuvq kamb Riaj og. yia txb Kuq fyenj taaib pun meib Bua. naaiq Kuq fyenj xij pun luvb Diaq myenb tu'q Fyenb yrub.
2.25: yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb maaib laanb myenb, Buaj heug si-me-on. ninb zruj Kuq myenb, kan lovj Tinb huvb Eei leid. ninb zuaq Jyenq Tinb huvb Fruj i-saa-laa-en myenb. sivj livb yaag Zauj ninb yem.
2.22: ei Jyenq mo-se Eei leib latg, maa-li-yaa saaj wij Eei Nxib Eia'g Tauj. yo-sepq Zauj maa-li-yaa zyrug txb ye-su mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb fuvj pun zyruq,
2.42: ye-su tu'q zyepg Eeig Havj uaq Havj, ninb Bua ei Jyenq leid mivb Jiaj zipq.
2.15: finb myenb zyrug leib Gxi ninb Bua, cvj Rwrnj Tinb txvb mig a'q. uaq teij kruj yuvb myenb, laanb Buaj laanb, “Bua xij zu'g mivb Betg-le-hem muvq mavg kaaj zyruq Buaj Bua naaiq teij Jauq x'g?”
2.29: “zyruq aag, meib lcvd Eei waag, meib zruj zyavj a'q. ib zang pun yia, meib Eei pru, pcvb xn Eei kwei seij.
2.30: weig zu'g yia kanb Eei mziv tu'q pwatg liud meib Eei Fruj en,

20.18: haiq taub Dxpg, zov zu'g naaiq nxm la'pyeiq, uaq taub zyrug huq penj ziaj teij mig a'q. naaiq nxm la'pyeiq Dxtq, zov zu'g haiq taub, uaq taub zyrug mwrng Revg mig a'q.”
20.45: zwavj myenb mwavj ye-su kxvq uaq zang, ye-su Buaj ninb Eei saib kxj Bua,
20.3: ye-su tau, “yia yaag xij naaig Jruj meib Bua. Buaj yia og.
20.43: zuaq yia pun meib Eei winb wavq zruj meib lxvj zauj Eei txvj.”+’
20.14: “mq paag kruq Wivj myenb pwatg ninb, laanb Buaj laanb, ‘Ripg naaiq nxm Wivj se tovb naaiq taub a'q. Bua zx'q ninb taij kwavg mivb. ninb Ripg Eei Jaab tivb zyrug penj Bua Eei a'q.’
20.34: ye-su tau ninb Bua, “naaiq seij myenb lovg auq lovg Goj, puvj sia'q zruj Zivb Jaa.
20.2: “Buaj yia Bua og. meib maaib haiq Euvg leid zruj naaiq teij sig? naaiq Euvg leid haiq taub pun meib?”
20.36: ninb Bua yaag maiq haib taig weig zu'g ninb Bua Navq finb myenb nx. ninb Bua zruj Tinb huvb Eei naamb Erud weig zu'g ninb Bua taig mivb cvj navb taaib.
20.35: mq paag taig mivb Pwij tu'q navb taaib yem Ga'haaq uaq seij mJavg msia'q maiq lovg auq lovg Goj, maiq puvj sia'q zruj Zivb Jaa.
20.24: “zx'q nxm Eaanb taaib pun yia mavg kaaj. naaiq haiq taub Eei favj Zauj haiq taub Eei Buaj?” ninb Bua tau, “lo-maa huvb Eei.”
20.7: ninb Bua zyrug tau, “yia Bua maiq hiuq tu'q haiq taub pun ninb maaib leid zruj.”
20.17: ye-su mavg Jyenq ninb Bua naaig kaaj, “kivb sru fiaq Jyenq naaiq Jruj waag maaib haiq Euvg eij leid? ‘komq pyauq zavg Gemb Zwrtq uaq nxm la'pyeiq, zuvq penj an pyaub kx'q kaub lovg Jyenq Jiaj uaq nxm.’
20.11: Wivb zyruq zyrug cvj Paaiq taub pru mivb, mq paag kruq Wivj myenb cvj Bx'q ninb, zruj to'g pun ninb Eaiq, yaag zung ninb Kuvb puad pc'g zauj Eei Rwrnj.
20.33: Navq naaig, myenb taig mivb, Tauj navb taaib uaq Nxi, uaq taub msia'q txn funj haiq taub Eei auq? weig zu'g ninb Bua siag muad yetg zuvq lovg Jiaj ninb.”
20.16: ninb xij mivb taij kwavg ninb Bua cvj pun kanb teij myenb kruq uaq nxm Wivj.” zwavj myenb haid liud naaiq teij waag, ninb Bua kxvq, “Zinb maang maiq tuvq pun maaib Navq naaig.”
20.40: kxvq liud ninb Bua maiq kaamq naaig haiq Euvg ninb a'q.
20.37: mo-se yaag pun Ziv myenb taig mivb cvj navb taaib weig zu'g ninb kxvq trud zia'g Dyavb txnb fomq uaq tiub Jauq. ninb heug zyruq zruj ‘apg-laa-ham Eei Tinb huvb, i-sakg Eei Tinb huvb Zauj yaa-Kopq Eei Tinb huvb.’
20.4: haiq taub pun yo-han maaib leid Tevj myenb Jiaj uam Eei leid, Tinb huvb fai paamb myenb?”
20.12: Wivb zyruq cvj Paaiq ta'faam taub mivb. kruq Wivj Eei myenb cvj Bx'q tu'q ninb syav haig, Tx kwavg ka'Eiag zi'g Wivj mivb.
20.46: “xij zu'g faij fim Faauj leid Eei finb scv. ninb Bua a'Neiq zu'q lwib Daauq mivb mivb taaib taaib, mivb uaq heib hxvg xij myenb Taaib, zx'q yia'q pun ninb Bua. mivb wig txvb ninb Bua kinq lovj Jiaj Eei txvj zweid. pia'g yinb ninb Bua Kuvj xij zweid tiab kxn Navq.
20.13: “Wivb zyruq zyrug kxvq, ‘aa, yia xij zu'g Navq haiq nx zruj ni? yia Paaiq yia kanb Eei txnb Namq mivb, mRiaj ninb Bua xij Taaib ninb mq pei.’
20.26: txv Jyenq zwavj myenb ninb Bua maiq pwatg ye-su kxvq txvg haiq Euvg. ninb Bua Bua'g hxvb haig ninb tau Eei waag zyrug maiq Ko lo a'q.
20.28: ninb Bua naaig ye-su, “finb scv aa'b! mo-se weig Bua fiaq naaiq tiub leid, ‘sij kxvq maaib laanb myenb lovg Jyenq auq, maiq kcvb maaib fu'Jweiq mq paag ninb taig mig a'q, ninb Eei yrud xij zu'g lovg Eaam zruj auq weig tu'q fu'Jweiq funj kxj Eei pwrng.’
20.8: ye-su Buaj ninb Bua, “Navq naaig yia yaag maiq Buaj meib Bua yia maaib haiq Euvg leid zruj naaiq teij sig.”
20.9: ye-su cvj kxvq waab peiq pun myenb mwavj. ninb kxvq, “maaib laanb myenb zwavj Rov a'vung pyruq, yaag kruq pun myenb. ninb kanb c'q, Zwrtq teib puv mivb laub Eei.
20.32: zruj kau, Ga'haaq uaq taub msia'q txn yaag taig mig a'q.
20.21: ninb Bua zyrug naaig kaaj ye-su, “finb scv aa'b! yia Bua hiuq tu'q meib kxvq Eei waag Zauj Faauj Eei leid se hxpg Eei. meib yaag maiq mavg haiq taub Eei Myen. Tinb huvb Eei Jauq meib yaag Faauj tu'q zyen.
20.23: ye-su hiuq tu'q ninb Bua Eei Byenb Beuj zyrug kxvq,
20.6: mq paag sij kxvq Bua kxvq, ‘myenb pun taaib,’ zwavj myenb xij zx'q la'pyeiq zov taig Bua weig zu'g ninb Bua funj tivg yo-han se trug waag myenb.”
20.44: Daa-witq heug ninb zruj zyruq. uaq Euvg, ki-tug Navq haiq nx haib zruj Daa-witq Eei zeib fun?”
20.20: Faauj leid Eei finb scv Zauj sai myenb pyeiq zyrug zanb zang Zyenb mavg Jyenq ye-su. ninb Bua Paaiq myenb mivb zruj sig Navq Kuq myenb, mq paag ninb Bua xij Duaq ye-su kxvq txvg zyrug haib zx'q ninb Jiu pun yem lo-maa zuvj Eei puab Diaq.
20.5: ninb Bua zyrug laanb Zauj laanb Zaavb laavb, “Bua hxpg zu'g Navq haiq nx kxvq? sij kxvq Bua kxvq, ‘Tinb huvb pun taaib,’ ninb xij kxvq, ‘uaq Euvg meib Bua weig haiq tiug maiq syenj yo-han?’
20.19: Faauj leid Eei finb scv Zauj sai myenb pyeiq hiuq tu'q ye-su kxvq naaiq tiub waab peiq zi'q zu'g ninb Bua. uaq nxm zyavb hog ninb Bua xij zx'q ye-su haig a'q, mq paag ninb Bua kamb Riaj zwavj myenb.
20.38: Tinb huvb se myenb navb myenb Eei Tinb huvb, maiq zeid taig mivb Eei myenb Eei Tinb huvb, weig zu'g ei Tinb huvb mavg, yetg zuvq se zyavb Jyenq Eei.”
20.31: lauq saan cvj lovg kau, taig mig a'q. naaiq teij siag muad lovg Jiaj Revg, yaag fib Navq Eei maiq maaib fu'Jweiq, zyav naaig taig mig a'q.
20.27: maaib teij saa-Du-sij myenb taaib lxd ye-su. saa-Du-sij uaq Jauq myenb kxvq myenb taig mivb maiq haib navb a'q.
20.41: ye-su zyrug naaig ninb Bua, “myenb Navq haiq nx haib kxvq ki-tug zruj Daa-witq huvb Eei zeib fun?
20.1: maaib Nxi ye-su yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Faauj myenb yaag zunb Kuq fyenj. sai myenb pyeiq Zauj Faauj leid Eei finb scv Zauj myenb koj taaib kxvq,
20.39: maaib teij Faauj leid Eei finb scv kxvq, “finb scv aag, meib tau tu'q hxpg haig.”
20.47: ninb Bua Duaq aub kwaaq Eei Jaab tivb Eang yaag tu'g eij tauj kauj Daauq Eei Duaq myenb. tovb naaiq Euvg myenb xij zu'g tivg zwid kaub Niaq Jiaj.”
20.10: Tauj pyruq zua'g Eei zyavb hog, ninb Paaiq taub pru mivb lxd kruq Wivj Eei myenb, weig syru ninb Eei pwrng kruq Wivj Eei pyruq. mq paag kruq Wivj myenb Bx'q uaq taub pru, zung ninb Kuvb puad pc'g zauj Eei Rwrnj.
20.25: ye-su zyrug kxvq, “haiq Euvg lo-maa huvb Eei, xij zu'g pun lo-maa huvb. haiq Euvg Tinb huvb Eei, xij zu'g pun Tinb huvb.”
20.22: uaq Euvg meib Buaj yia Bua og. Bua Zwrtq Rrub zinb pun lo-maa huvb se txvg Bua Eei leid fai?”
20.42: weig zu'g yem sivj Ruv sru Daa-witq kanb fiaq, ‘zyruq kxvq Buaj yia Eei zyruq, “zweid Jyenq yia Eei Byaaug mcvj puv
20.15: ninb Bua zyrug zx'q ninb Tx Zwrtq ka'Eiag zi'g Wivj taij kwavg mig a'q.” ye-su naaig kaaj, “Navq naaig Wivb zyruq xij Navq haiq nx zruj pun kruq Wivj myenb?
20.29: zinb Daavg maaib siag muab txn. txnb Lo txv Jyenq Jaa, maiq maaib fu'Jweiq, ninb taig mig a'q.
20.30: ta'naij lovg Eaamb kwaaq cvj taig mig a'q. maiq maaib fu'Jweiq.

24.18: maaib taub, Buaj heug Ken-o-patg, naaig ye-su, “Kuvj meib kanb Du'g taub Kc'q yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb maiq hiuq tu'q naaiq teij i ziaj Nxi Zwrtq taaib Eei sig?”
24.45: ye-su zyrug Pxq Gxi ninb Bua Eei Hruq pun ninb Bua mevb pc'g kivb sru.
24.3: ninb Bua zyrug pia'g mivb mavg, maiq pwatg zyruq ye-su Eei sei.
24.43: ninb zipq taaib zyrug txv Jyenq ninb Bua Eang.
24.50: ye-su txb ninb Bua Zwrtq mivb Tauj Be-Taa-ni laavb Len zyrug Zau Jyenq puad pwav waag ninb Bua.
24.14: kan Jauq mivb uaq zang, ninb Bua kxvq Jyenq Ko'q ho'g Zwrtq liud Eei sig mivb.
24.48: meib Bua zruj naaiq teij sig Eei zxvb zevj myenb.
24.34: haid ninb Bua kxvq, “zyruq za'kevb navb taaib a'q. ninb hing pun si-mon pwatg liud a'q.”
24.2: Tauj uaq pwatg Bc'g zrub kcvb uaq Kwaaiq la'pyeiq Twi Gxi mig a'q.
24.36: uaq teij i laanb kxvq Jyenq naaiq teij Jauq uaq zang, zyruq ye-su kanb lyemb zeib hing taaib sruq Jyenq ninb Bua zwavj myenb Eei Bu'Dovj kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “meib Bua pcvb xn a'q og.”
24.35: uaq teij i laanb yaag kxvq ninb Bua yem Jauq zavg pwavb Eei sig yaag kxvq ye-su mc'q Fuaq uaq zang ninb Bua zia'q tu'q ninb a'q.
24.24: yia Bua maaib teij mivb mavg yaag pwatg Navq naaiq teij msia'q txn kxvq nx. mq paag ninb Bua maiq pwatg ye-su.”
24.7: ninb kxvq, ‘yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, xij zu'g Jiu pun myenb waaig myenb txb mivb tiv zyepg Ravg Jaaj. mq paag ta'faam Nxi yia cvj navb taaib’ uaq teij waag.”
24.17: ye-su naaig kaaj ninb Bua, “meib Bua kan Jyenq Jauq mivb meib Bua kxvq haiq Euvg?” ninb Bua zyrug tivb Jyenq, Myen Raub Raub uaq.
24.49: tovb yia Eei tia lcvd pun Eei, yia kanb xij Paaiq taaib Zauj meib Bua yem. mq paag meib Bua xij zu'g yem naaiq zivb zuaq Tauj yem kub vwaaig taaib Eei Qa'q Fiag Tauj meib Bua.”
24.11: mq paag kovb zob Bua maiq syenj. laaig naaiq teij msia'q txn la'kwaib kxvq Navq.
24.33: ninb Bua lyemb zeib Jiad sin Rwrnj ye-lu-saa-lem. ninb Bua pwatg uaq teij zyepg yetq taub saib kxj Zauj teij ninb Bua Eei txig kapq zunq uaq,
24.16: ninb Bua pwatg Eei mq paag weig haiq tiug mq pei, ninb Bua zia'q maiq tu'q ninb.
24.40: ninb Navq naaiq nx kxvq yaag pun ninb Bua mavg ninb Eei puab zauj.
24.37: ninb Bua laaig pwatg Janb taig Fxid mq pei, zyrug hc'q ninb Bua kamb Riaj haig, Hruq Waav Revg.
24.4: ninb Bua sruq Jyenq uaq Namq maiq mevb pc'g. lyemb zeib maaib i laanb myenb zu'q Jyenq lwib hruj zcvb zcvb Eei sruq Jyenq ninb Bua Eei ka'Len.
24.51: pwav kau waag, ninb zyrug leib Gxi ninb Bua, faauj Tinb txvb mig a'q.
24.12: mq paag pi-te Jiad sin Tiuj Jyenq mivb Tauj zruq, Do'q Fiag Zyepq mavg, Kuvj pwatg Diab tamb Navq. ninb zyrug taauj Gaav Rwrnj, yaag Namq maiq mevb pc'g naaiq teij sig.
24.46: ninb yaag kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “kivb sru fiaq Jyenq Navq naaiq nx kxvq ki-tug xij zu'g syrug Kruq. taig mivb Tauj ta'faam Nxi cvj navb taaib.
24.13: tovb naaig Nxi maaib i taub ye-su Eei saib kxj mivb nxm laavd heug em-maa-utg, yem nitq ye-lu-saa-lem zivb leib maiq ko zyepg yetq ki-lo Jauq.
24.26: ki-tug xij zu'g syrug liud naaig teij Kruq Eei sig Zivj taaib pia'g ninb Eei Favb laavg maiq zeid?”
24.28: mivb aaq lamb Tauj ninb Bua xij mivb uaq nxm laavd, ye-su zruj Navq xij pcv za'g Eei Jiaj.
24.8: uaq teij msia'q txn zyrug Javj zu'g ye-su Eei waag a'q.
24.9: yem zruq Rwrnj mivb, ninb Bua zx'q naaiq teij yetg zuvq sig Buaj uaq teij zyepg yetq taub kovb zob Zauj ka'Len Eei zwavj myenb.
24.32: laanb Buaj laanb, “Bua kan Jauq taaib uaq zang, ninb Zauj Bua kxvq waag yaag Pxq mevb kivb sru, Bua haid Jxm Hruq haig Navq maaib trud zia'g Jyenq nx x'g?”
24.21: yia Bua yaag Namq Jyenq tovb naaiq taub xij zua'g i-saa-laa-en myenb Rwrnj. yaag maiq taan Bua'g naaiq Navq. naaiq teij sig Zwrtq liud tu'q pua Nxi a'q.
24.23: maiq pwatg ninb Eei sei mig a'q. ninb Bua Rwrnj taaib kxvq ninb Bua pwatg finb myenb hing Zwrtq taaib Buaj ninb Bua, ye-su zyavb Jyenq Eei.
24.6: ninb maiq yem naaiq lx'g. ninb navb taaib a'q. meib Bua xij zu'g Javj Tauj ninb yem kaa-li-li uaq zang kxvq Buaj meib Bua uaq teij waag.
24.44: Eang liud, ninb Buaj ninb Bua, “naaiq teij sig se yia Zauj meib Bua yem uaq zang yia Buaj Jiaj meib Bua. yem mo-se Eei leib latg sru Zauj Tinb huvb Eei trug waag myenb Eei sru Zauj sivj Ruv zyavq Jyenq yia uaq teij waag yetg zuvq, xij zu'g Zwrtq taaib txib tiug Revg.”
24.20: yia Bua Eei sai myenb pyeiq Zauj Jyenb fruq zx'q ninb Jiu pun Janj tivg zwid taij ninb zyrug txb ninb mivb tiv zyepg Ravg Jaaj taig.
24.5: uaq teij msia'q txn kamb Riaj haig zyrug Pua'q Fiag Dau. naaiq teij i laanb myenb naaig ninb Bua, “meib Bua weig haiq tiug taaib naaiq Janb taig yem Eei txvj lxd myenb navb myenb?
24.53: yaag zanb zang yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Zev Tinb huvb.
24.19: ye-su cvj naaig, “haiq Euvg sig?” ninb Bua tau, “naa-saa-letq muvq Eei ye-su Eei sig. ninb zruj taub trug waag myenb. yem Tinb huvb Zauj zwavj myenb Eei Ra'Myen ninb kxvq Eei waag Zauj zruj Eei sig maaib tomb Qa'q.
24.38: mq paag ye-su Buaj ninb Bua, “meib Bua weig haiq tiug Raub faanb? zruj haiq Euvg maaib Hruq Buvb Byenq?
24.31: Tinb huvb pun ninb Bua i laanb lyemb zeib zia'q tu'q ye-su, zyav naaig maiq pwatg ninb mig a'q.
24.52: ninb Bua zyrug yem uaq paaij ninb, Fyenb yrub a'Neiq Eei Rwrnj ye-lu-saa-lem,
24.27: ye-su zyrug kxvq mevb kivb sru zyavq Jyenq ninb kanb kxvq Eei Jrub Jruj waag pun ninb Bua mwavj, yem mo-se Eei leib latg sru Jiad kxn cvj kxvq Revg Tinb huvb Eei zwavj trug waag myenb Eei sru.
24.41: mavg liud ninb Bua a'Neiq haig, Bua'g hxvb haig, mq paag Zxg maiq kcvb syenj. ye-su naaig ninb Bua, “yem naaiq maaib Eang Eei ka'naaiq Eei fai?”
24.1: Tauj uaq nxm leib paaij Eei ta'yetq Nxi luvb Dxm Ryruq Eei, luvb Byrub Byrud Fav Navq, uaq teij msia'q txn txb Jyenq ninb Bua Beng taaib Eei Diab Daav mivb ye-su Eei zruq.
24.39: samj mavg kaaj yia Eei puab zauj! Lua mavg, meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q tovb yia a'q. Janb taig Fxid maiq maaib xq, maiq maaib Buvq Navq meib Bua pwatg yia maaib nx.”
24.47: xij zu'g tevq ninb Eei Buaj mivb zunb Buaj myenb kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid zyrug tu'q Tinb huvb kwavg ninb Bua Eei zwid. xij zu'g yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Jiad kxn zunb Zwrtq pwavq maang kua'q maang fivj.
24.10: Buaj kovb zob Bua uaq teij msia'q txn, tovb makq-Daa-laa muvq uaq taub maa-li-yaa Zauj yo-an-naa Zauj yaa-kxpg Eei maa, maa-li-yaa, cvj Zauj ninb Bua taaib uaq teij msia'q txn.
24.25: ye-su kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “meib Bua myenb Vovj myenb aa'b! trug waag myenb kxvq Eei yetg zuvq waag meib Bua weig haiq tiug syenj Dovg naaig Danb?
24.22: mq paag yem yia Bua uaq maaib teij msia'q txn zruj pun yia Bua Namq maiq mevb pc'g. ninb Bua a'Dxm Ryruq Eei mivb uaq zruq mavg.
24.42: ninb Bua zx'q teij zi'q taaib Eei Byaud pun ninb.
24.15: txij ninb Bua kxvq Jyenq uaq zang, ye-su kanb taaib fatq Zauj Jyenq ninb Bua mivb.
24.29: mq paag ninb Bua Qa'q lyrub ninb kxvq, “ib zang aaq lamb Mwavj a'q. Ba'Nxi xij mwrtq a'q. Zauj yia Bua pweij mwrnd naaiq maa'b!” ye-su zyrug pia'g pyauq Zauj ninb Bua hitq uaq.
24.30: ye-su Zauj ninb Bua Jwavg tiab Eang Naavj uaq zang, ninb cvj zx'q Fuaq taaib lcvd zivb liud Tinb huvb zyrug mc'q Gxi pun ninb Bua.

7.18: yo-han Eei saib kxj kxvq Revg naaiq teij Jaub lrug pun yo-han mwavj. yo-han zyrug heug i taub ninb Eei saib kxj taaib
7.45: meib zipq yia pia'g pyauq yaag maiq zom yia, mq paag yia taaib Tauj, naaiq taub msia'q txn zom yia Eei zauj Tauj ib zang.
7.3: ninb haid myenb kxvq ye-su Eei Jaub lrug, zyrug heug yiu-Tai myenb Eei myenb koj mivb Toq ye-su taaib Tevj zxg ninb Eei pru Eei pcvg.
7.43: si-mon kxvq, “taaij Qyemj Zamq uaq taub Namq zc'g zyruq kaub Zamq mq pei.” ye-su kxvq, “meib kxvq tu'q zu'g Eei.”
7.50: ye-su Buaj uaq taub msia'q txn, “laaij meib syenj yia, meib zyrug tu'q Fruj. meib kunq pcvb xn Eei mivb og.”
7.14: kxvq liud, ye-su mivb maan penq. kcv Niaq myenb zyrug tivb Jyenq uaq. ye-su kxvq, “yrud aa'b! yia Buaj meib, Jiad sin taaib maa'b!”
7.48: ye-su zyrug Buaj uaq taub msia'q txn, “meib Eei zwid tu'q kwavg liud a'q.”
7.34: yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, taaib Tauj yaag Eang yaag hopq, meib Bua zyrug kxvq, ‘mavg kaaj, uaq laanb myenb Kuvj mauq Eang mauq hopq Gwin Navq. ninb yaag Zauj Tevj lo-maa huvb Jaa syru Rrub zinb Eei myenb Zauj mevb taub waaig Eei myenb zruj txig.’
7.2: yem uaq nxm muvq maaib taub lo-maa pcvb pyeiq. ninb maaib taub pru maiq lovj Kruq Eei, xij taig haig a'q. pcvb pyeiq yaag Namq haig naaiq taub pru.
7.36: maaib taub faa-li-sij myenb heug ye-su mivb Zauj ninb Eang Naavj. ye-su mivb Tauj ninb Eei pyauq zyrug zweid Jyenq uaq Eang Naavj a'q.
7.35: haiq taub lcvd zipq Tinb huvb Eei Zovb mevb zyrug hiuq tu'q uaq Euvg Zovb mevb se zyen a'q.”
7.24: yo-han Paaiq taaib uaq teij i laanb myenb Rwrnj mig a'q. ye-su yem uaq kxvq yo-han Eei Jaub lrug Buaj zwavj myenb. ninb kxvq, “meib Bua Zwrtq mivb teib puvb Waav, meib Bua mivb xij mavg haiq Euvg? mivb mavg tiub Ryaauj pwrng tovd Eei lua'g ti'g fai?
7.7: weig naaiq yia zuvq haid lyemb maiq Pwij mivb pwavb meib. tomb kxj Kuvj kxvq Zwrtq Navq, yia Eei pru zyrug lovj a'q.
7.17: ye-su zruj naaiq teij sig Eei fyenj siv pwavq yu-Dia teig Zauj Wiv Rwrnj Eei txvj.
7.49: Jwavg tiab Eang Naavj Eei myenb, laanb Buaj laanb, “naaig haiq taub myenb lcb? ninb haib kwavg tu'q myenb Eei zwid.”
7.11: Ga'haaq maiq laub, ye-su cvj mivb Tauj nxm muvq, Buaj heug naa-in. ninb Eei saib kxj Bua Zauj myenb Zamq Eei kan Jyenq mivb.
7.33: Tevj myenb Jiaj uam Eei leid uaq taub yo-han taaib, ninb zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg yaag maiq hopq a'vung tiuq. meib Bua kxvq, ‘ninb maaib myenq yem ninb Eei sin.’
7.16: zwavj myenb kamb Riaj haig zyrug Zev Tinb huvb kxvq, “maaib taub zruj Lo Eei trug waag myenb Zwrtq taaib yem yia Bua Bu'Dovj,” yaag kxvq, “Tinb huvb taaib Tevj ninb Eei pc'g fivj a'q.”
7.40: ye-su kxvq Buaj uaq taub faa-li-sij myenb, “si-mon aa'b! yia maaib Jruj waag xij kxvq Buaj meib.” si-mon tau, “finb scv aa'b! kunq kxvq maa'b!”
7.37: uaq nxm muvq maaib taub mevb taub waaig Eei msia'q txn. ninb haid kxvq ye-su yem uaq taub faa-li-sij myenb Eei pyauq Eang Naavj, zyrug txb nxm pcvb tapq pwavq yrub Daav,
7.4: mivb Tauj ye-su uaq, naaiq teij myenb koj Qa'q Toq ye-su. ninb Bua kxvq, “naaiq taub pcvb pyeiq Pwij tu'q meib Tevj ninb.
7.12: ye-su mivb Tauj muvq Eei zivb laatg kcvb Daavg, pwavb zu'g myenb kcv Jyenq Janb taig Zwrtq. uaq taub Janb taig se aub kwaaq Eei Do'g txn, yaag maaib uaq nxm muvq Eei myenb Zamq Tevj aub kwaaq fuvj Janb taig mivb.
7.46: meib maiq toj yrub Yetq yia Eei mGxvq mq paag naaiq taub msia'q txn toj yrub Daav Yetq yia Eei zauj.
7.13: zyruq pwatg uaq taub aub kwaaq, ninb kevb! Kxb lyenb haig zyrug Buaj ninb, “maiq tuvq Eyemq a'q og.”
7.26: meib Bua Zwrtq mivb xij pwatg haiq Euvg? xij pwatg taub trug waag myenb zeid Eei saa'b? zeid Eei. mq paag, meib Bua xij pwatg uaq taub, ninb zuvq kaub Lo trug waag myenb.
7.28: ye-su cvj kxvq, “yia Buaj meib Bua, Zwrtq seij taaib yem Jiaj paamb ken Eei myenb, yo-han kaub Lo Jiaj. mq paag yem Tinb huvb Eei kua'q zruj kaub faij Jiaj uaq taub, ninb Zxg kaub Lo Jiaj yo-han.”
7.8: yia kanb yaag yem tomb pcvb pyeiq Eei puab Diaq, yaag maaib pcv Zamq yem yia Eei ka'Diaq mcvj. yia heug naaiq taub mivb, ninb zyrug mivb. heug uaq taub taaib, ninb zyrug taaib. heug yia Eei nrub zruj naaiq, ninb zyrug zruj a'q.”
7.9: ye-su haid ninb Navq naaiq nx kxvq zyrug Bua'g hxvb haig. ninb Win Myen mavg yaag kxvq Buaj kan ninb taaib uaq teij zwavj myenb, “yia Buaj meib Bua, yia maiq kcvb pwatg Jiaj myenb syenj Dovg naaig lovj. lyemb i-saa-laa-en myenb yaag maiq maaib yetg taub.”
7.32: ninb Bua se Navq fu'Jweiq zweid Jyenq heib hxvg, naaiq kwanb heug uaq kwanb. ninb Bua kxvq, ‘yia Bua pyomq Laub Dovb nuj, meib Bua yaag maiq Zavj heij. yia Bua paauj pyopq Janb taig Eei Ruv, meib Bua yaag maiq Eyemq.’
7.21: txij uaq zang ye-su Tevj myenb Zamq zxg ninb Bua Eei Euvb Euvg pcvg. zu'g myenq mua'q Eei myenb ninb yaag zxg lovj, yaag Tevj mziv mcvb mziv Buaq Eei myenb haib mavg tu'q pwatg.
7.23: “haiq taub maiq Gemb yia, uaq taub maaib Fyenb yrub a'q.”
7.6: ye-su zyrug kan Jyenq ninb Bua mivb a'q. mivb kau, leib pyauq maiq navg ko, naaiq taub pcvb pyeiq Buaj ninb Eei txig mivb Buaj ye-su, “tomb kxj aag, maiq zu'g la'Eauq meib kanb a'q. yia maiq Pwij zipq meib pia'g yia Eei pyauq.
7.44: ye-su Win mavg uaq taub msia'q txn, cvj kxvq Buaj si-mon, “meib pwatg naaiq taub msia'q txn Eei saa'b? yia pia'g meib Eei pyauq, meib maiq pun uam yia Raauj zauj. mq paag naaiq taub msia'q txn lovg ninb Eei uamb mweig Raauj yia Eei zauj cvj lovg Ba'pyei Tevj sxtq Gaai.
7.20: naaiq teij i taub myenb mivb Tauj ye-su uaq cvj kxvq, “Tevj myenb Jiaj uam Eei leid uaq taub yo-han Paaiq yia Bua taaib naaig meib, ‘meib tovb xij taaib uaq taub fai? fai yia Bua Zxg xij zu'g zuaq kanb taub?’+”
7.5: ninb Namq haig Bua yiu-Tai myenb, zuvq zruj nxm wig txvb pun yia Bua.”
7.19: yaag Paaiq ninb Bua mivb naaig zyruq, “meib tovb xij taaib uaq taub fai? fai yia Bua Zxg xij zu'g zuaq kanb taub?”
7.38: mivb sruq Jyenq ye-su Eei Ga'haaq Gaav, yem ninb Eei zaub Len Eyemq, uamb mweig Dyepq zu'g ye-su Eei zauj Dxn. uaq taub msia'q txn zyrug lovg kanb Eei Ba'pyei sxtq Gaai yaag zom, cvj zx'q yrub Daav toj Jyenq ye-su Eei zauj.
7.31: ye-su cvj kxvq Jyenq mivb. ninb kxvq, “yia xij zu'g lovg haiq Euvg peiq ib Jaaj Eei myenb? ninb Bua Navq haiq nx?
7.27: kivb sru fiaq Jyenq kxvq, ‘yia xij Paaiq yia Eei trug fyenj myenb mivb Daavg liug leid meib Eei Jauq.’ se tovb naaiq taub a'q.”
7.41: ye-su kxvq, “maaib i laanb myenb Qyemj taub myenb Eei zc'q. maaib taub Qyemj Mmd pc'q nxm zinb. maaib taub Qyemj Mmd zyepg nxm.
7.1: ye-su kxvq naaiq teij yetg zuvq waag Buaj liud zwavj myenb, ninb zyrug mivb Kaa-pe-naa-um muvq.
7.39: heug ye-su taaib Eang Naavj uaq taub faa-li-sij myenb pwatg Navq naaig, zyrug yem Hruq Namq, “sij kxvq naaiq laanb myenb zruj trug waag myenb nx, ninb hxpg zu'g hiuq tu'q ib zang Lua ninb Eei zauj naaiq taub msia'q txn se haiq taub, yaag penj haiq Euvg msia'q txn, weig zu'g naaiq taub msia'q txn se mevb taub waaig Eei myenb.”
7.47: Navq naaiq yia Buaj meib, ninb Eei zwid Dovg naaig Zamq tu'q kwavg liud a'q weig zu'g ninb Namq yia Zamq. mq paag haiq taub tu'q kwavg zwid zo'g uaq taub Namq kaub zo'g.”
7.10: pcvb pyeiq Paaiq mivb lxd ye-su uaq teij myenb Rwrnj Tauj pyauq zyrug pwatg uaq taub pru lovj mig a'q.
7.25: meib Bua mivb mavg haiq Euvg? mavg taub mJavg txn zu'q Zyrub zu'q tung fai? zu'q Zyrub zu'q tung zruj fyrub zxib uaq teij yem huvb ting Navq lx'g.
7.22: ye-su tau yo-han Paaiq mivb Eei myenb, “Rwrnj mivb kxvq meib Bua pwatg liud haid liud naaiq teij Jaub lrug pun yo-han mwavj og. Buaj ninb, mziv mcvb mziv Buaq Eei myenb haib mavg tu'q pwatg. zauj Bai Eei haib yavb Jauq a'q. putq komb huq pcvg uaq teij zxg lovj Revg. mnxmb Duv Eei yaag haib mwavj tu'q haid. taig mivb Eei myenb cvj navb taaib. myenb Jomg myenb yaag tu'q haid Kuq fyenj.
7.42: i taub zuvq maiq maaib panb zeig Jaauq maiq suv zc'q. zc'g zyruq zyrug zyav naaig kwavg pun ninb Bua i taub mig a'q. uaq teij i taub myenb, haiq taub Namq zc'g zyruq kaub Zamq?”
7.15: taig mivb uaq taub myenb zyrug navb taaib Jiad sin zweid Jyenq uaq kxvq waag. ye-su yaag Jiu pun ninb Eei maa mig a'q.
7.29: zwavj myenb Zauj Jyenq Tevj lo-maa huvb Jaa syru Rrub zinb Eei myenb haid ye-su Eei waag, ninb Bua kxvq Tinb huvb Eei za'eij se hxpg Eei, weig zu'g zinb Daavg ninb Bua kanb yaag pun yo-han Tevj ninb Bua Jiaj uam Eei leid.
7.30: mq paag faa-li-sij myenb Zauj Faauj leid Eei finb scv Gemb Tinb huvb weig ninb Bua lyepg taaib Eei za'eij, zyrug maiq Kavq pun yo-han Tevj ninb Bua Jiaj uam Eei leid.

19.18: “ta'Eeig taub pru taaib kxvq, ‘zyruq aa'b! meib pun yia uaq tiub Eaanb yia cvj zxng tu'q pyaa tiub.’
19.45: ye-su pia'g zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq mivb zyrug zung maaid maaig Eei myenb Zwrtq mivb,
19.3: ninb xij mavg kaaj ye-su Navq haiq nx, mq paag sakg-Kyetq aiq haig. myenb Zamq Txvq Jyenq ninb, ninb mavg maiq pwatg ye-su.
19.43: zyavb hog xij Tauj, meib Eei winb wavq xij wetq niab Dwi Wiv kxmj meib. ninb Bua xij weig Jyenq pyei puv Kwrnj Jyenq meib.
19.14: “uaq taub Jyen Eei pc'g fivj Rxv haig ninb zyrug Paaiq myenb kan Gaav mivb kxvq, ‘yia Bua maiq xij lovg naaiq laanb myenb zruj yia Bua Eei huvb.’
19.48: mq paag ninb Bua lxd maiq tu'q Qavj weig zu'g zwavj myenb a'Neiq mwavj ye-su Faauj, yaag maiq xij puvj Dxtq yetg Jruj ninb Eei waag.
19.34: ninb Bua tau, “zyruq Qyemj zu'g lovg.”
19.2: yem uaq maaib taub myenb zruj syru Rrub zinb Eei pyeiq zeiq, Buaj heug sakg-Kyetq. ninb yaag putg zxib myenb.
19.36: keb Jyenq mivb uaq zang, zwavj myenb zx'q ninb Bua Eei tomb lwi timg Jyenq uaq Jauq.
19.35: ninb Bua zyrug Ken maa-li txn mivb ye-su uaq, cvj zx'q kanb Eei tomb lwi timg Jyenq, yaag paaq ye-su faauj mivb keb Jyenq maa-li Eei ti'g taand.
19.24: “zyruq cvj Buaj sruq ka'Len uaq teij myenb, ‘zx'q ninb uaq tiub Eaanb pun maaib zyepg tiub uaq taub maa'b!’
19.7: zwavj myenb pwatg naaiq teij sig ninb Bua zyrug vopq kxvq, “naaig laanb myenb mivb zruj zwib myenb Eei Kc'q a'q lo'b!”
19.17: “zyruq tau, ‘lovj a'q. meib za'kevb Hruq zivj Eei pru. teij paaq faib fiuq sig meib zuvq kruj Dovg naaig lovj, yia pun meib kunq zyepg nxm zivb.’
19.11: zwavj myenb Zxg mwavj Jyenq naaiq teij waag, ye-su cvj kxvq tiub waab peiq. uaq zang ninb aaq lamb teij Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem zivb, myenb laaig Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq myenb Eei zyavb hog Tauj a'q mq pei.
19.33: ninb Bua Jaiq maa-li txn uaq zang, maa-li Eei zyruq naaig kaaj, “meib Bua Jaiq maa-li txn zruj haiq Euvg?”
19.16: “ta'yetq taub pru taaib kxvq, ‘zyruq aa'b! meib pun yia uaq tiub Eaanb yia zxng tu'q zyepg tiub.’
19.40: ye-su tau, “yia Buaj meib Bua, sij kxvq ninb Bua maiq Ko lo, la'pyeiq zuvq xij zu'g heug Jiad taaib.”
19.37: ye-su Tauj fatq ye-lu-saa-lem zivb, Fiag ka'lanq Bov uaq zang, zwavj saib kxj zyrug lomb Rxib Fyenb yrub Eei lovg Qiaj Lo Eei Zev Tinb huvb weig ninb Bua pwatg Jiaj yetg zuvq Bua'g hxvb haig Eei sig. ninb Bua zyrug heug,
19.4: ninb zyrug Zaavq Jiaj Daavg faauj vovb Exj Dyavj, yem uaq zuaq Jyenq mavg ye-su, weig zu'g ye-su xij yavb naaiq tiub Jauq Jiaj.
19.12: ye-su zyrug kxvq, “maaib taub Jyen xij Zwrtq mivb ko Eei kua'q zipq livg zruj huvb. zipq liud ninb cvj Rwrnj taaib.
19.46: yaag Buaj ninb Bua, “kivb sru fiaq Jyenq kxvq, ‘yia Eei pyauq xij zu'g zruj tauj kauj Eei pyauq,’ mq paag meib Bua lovg zruj ‘Janb za'g pivj Eei Kwrtq.’+”
