19.13: xij mivb uaq zang ninb heug ninb Eei zyepg taub pru taaib, yetg taub pun tiub Eaanb. ninb kxvq, ‘txb naaiq teij Eaanb mivb zruj scvb eij Tauj yia Rwrnj.’
19.26: “uaq taub huvb tau, ‘yia Buaj meib Bua, haiq taub maaib Eei, xij Jaa pun ninb maaib kaub Zamq. haiq taub maiq maaib, lyemb ninb maaib teij paaq, zuvq xij zu'g zx'q mivb.
19.28: ye-su kxvq liud naaiq teij waag ninb zyrug mivb Daavg. saib kxj Bua kan Jyenq mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb.
19.8: sakg-Kyetq sruq Jiad taaib kxvq Buaj zyruq, “zyruq aa'b! yia maaib Eei yetg zuvq ka'naaiq yia xij zx'q yetg pwrng pun myenb Jomg myenb. sij kxvq yia Pyenj haiq taub Eei haiq Euvg, yetg kruq yia xij pwib pyei kruq ninb Bua.”
19.9: ye-su kxvq Buaj ninb, “ib Nxi Fruj en taaib Tauj naaiq pwrng myenb. naaiq laanb myenb yaag zruj apg-laa-ham Eei zeib fun.
19.32: ninb Bua zyrug mivb Daavg, pwatg Euvb Euvg txij ye-su kxvq Eei waag.
19.21: yia kamb Riaj haig meib. yia hiuq tu'q meib maiq sia haiq taub. maiq zeid meib kanb Eei ka'naaiq meib yaag zx'q. meib kanb maiq zu'g Dxtq Qa'q zwavj mq paag meib yaag syru.’
19.23: Navq naaig meib zruj haiq Euvg maiq txb yia Eei Eaanb mivb tapq Eaanb lamd? yia Rwrnj taaib yia tu'q pwrnb zinb yaag tu'q teij leig zinb Zauj Jyenq nyaa.’
19.6: sakg-Kyetq Waavb Waav zaavb zaav Eei Fiag taaib, a'Neiq Eei zipq ye-su.
19.44: lyemb meib kanb Zauj yem meib Eei zivb laatg ka'Euad Eei myenb yetg zuvq ninb Bua xij myetg Revg, maiq lyrub yetg Kwaaiq la'pyeiq lapq Jyenq, weig zu'g meib zia'q maiq tu'q Tinb huvb taaib Fruj meib Eei zyavb hog.”
19.20: “cvj maaib taub pru taaib kxvq, ‘zyruq aa'b! naaiq! meib pun yia uaq tiub Eaanb. yia lovg si'g Jaauq peu Jyenq syru lovj Eei.
19.5: ye-su Jiaj Tauj Dyavb kxn zyrug Zau Myen kxvq Buaj sakg-Kyetq, “sakg-Kyetq aag, kaanq Fiag taaib maa'b! ib Nxi yia xij zu'g mivb hitq meib Eei pyauq.”
19.19: “zyruq Buaj ninb, ‘yia pun meib kunq pyaa nxm zivb.’
19.38: “Toq Tinb huvb Zeij fu'q tevq zyruq Eei Buaj taaib naaiq taub huvb. Tinb txvb maaib pcvb xn. yem Lav Jiaj Eei txvj maaib Favb laavg.”
19.31: sij kxvq maaib myenb naaig, ‘meib Bua Jaiq maa-li txn zruj haiq Euvg?’ xij zu'g Buaj ninb Bua, ‘zyruq Qyemj zu'g lovg.’+”
19.27: mq paag maiq xij yia zruj huvb uaq teij winb wavq txb taaib naaiq yem yia Eei Ra'Myen taij kwavg.’+”
19.41: ye-su mivb aaq lamb Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem zivb. mavg pwatg zivb ninb zyrug weig uaq nxm zivb Eyemq.
19.1: ye-su pia'g ye-li-Ko zivb, xij yavb zivb Jiaj.
19.39: yem uaq maaib teij faa-li-sij myenb kxvq Buaj ye-su, “finb scv aa'b! hatg meib Eei saib kxj Bua sekq maa'b!”
19.47: ye-su Nxib Nxi yem uaq zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Faauj myenb. sai myenb pyeiq Zauj Faauj leid Eei finb scv Zauj kunq pc'g fivj Eei pyeiq xij taij ye-su,
19.10: yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, taaib lxd yaag Fruj tivj laaib Eei myenb.”
19.25: “uaq teij kxvq, ‘zyruq aa'b! ninb zuvq maaib zyepg tiub nyaa.’
19.22: “zyruq kxvq Buaj ninb, ‘meib waaig haig Eei pru aa'b! yia lovg meib kanb Eei waag tivg meib Eei zwid. meib hiuq tu'q yia maiq sia haiq taub? meib yaag hiuq tu'q maiq zeid yia Eei ka'naaiq yia yaag zx'q? maiq zeid yia Dxtq Qa'q zwavj yia yaag syru?
19.42: ninb yaag kxvq, “feij tu'q ib Nxi meib hiuq tu'q haiq Euvg haib pun meib maaib pcvb xn. mq paag ib zang naaiq teij sig kem Jyenq, meib Eei mziv mavg maiq pwatg.
19.15: “mq paag uaq taub Jyen tu'q livg zruj huvb cvj Rwrnj taaib a'q. ninb zyrug heug tovb ninb pun Eaanb uaq teij pru, taaib mavg kaaj ninb Bua zxng tu'q Bu'ziaj.
19.29: mivb Tauj ka'lanq Bov, leib Betg-faa-yi Zauj Be-Taa-ni laavd maiq ko, ninb Paaiq i taub saib kxj mivb Daavg.
19.30: ninb kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “meib Bua mivb Tauj Ra'Myen mcvj uaq nxm laavd. pia'g laavd mivb zyrug pwatg taub maa-li txn Dob Jyenq uaq, myenb maiq kcvb keb Jiaj. Jaiq Ken Jyenq taaib og.

17.18: Zwrtq liud naaiq taub kanb fivj myenb, maiq maaib haiq taub taauj Gaav taaib Zev Tinb huvb fai?”
17.8: maiq zeid lx'g. meib zuvq xij Buaj ninb, ‘zruq zua'g laib Naavj Beng taaib pun yia Eang, yaag xij zu'g Tevj yia tinb laib Naavj. zuaq yia Eang peuq hopq peuq meib mtaaib Ga'haaq Eang.’
17.33: haiq taub Namq Fruj kanb Eei mcvg, uaq taub zyrug zu'g kwavg mcvg. haiq taub Eung kwavg ninb kanb Eei mcvg, uaq taub zyrug tu'q ninb Eei mcvg Zwrtq.
17.3: meib Bua xij zu'g faij fim. “sij kxvq meib Eei kxb yrud zruj txvg meib, meib xij zu'g Kwinj ninb. ninb kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid nx, xij zu'g kwavg pun ninb.
17.21: maiq maaib haiq taub haib kxvq, ‘mavg maa'b! yem naaiq!’ fai ‘mavg maa'b! yem uaq!’ weig zu'g Tinb huvb ib zang yem meib Bua Bu'Dovj zruj zyruq.”
17.35: maaib i taub msia'q txn mxg mc'g, xij zipq taub mivb, kwavg taub yem uaq.
17.14: ye-su pwatg zyrug kxvq, “mivb pun sai myenb zaab mavg meib Bua Eei sin og.” ninb Bua kan Jyenq Jauq mivb uaq zang, pcvg zyrug lovj mig a'q.
17.23: myenb xij Buaj meib Bua, ‘mavg maa'b! yem uaq!’ fai ‘mavg maa'b! yem naaiq!’ mq paag maiq tuvq Zwrtq mivb kan ninb Bua.
17.6: zyruq tau, “sij kxvq meib Bua maaib syenj fim lomb yetg nxm laib Jaaij Eim nx, meib Bua haib Buaj naaiq tiub scvb fxv Dyavj, ‘lyemb Ruvb pcv Zwrtq swiq mivb zwavj uaq Kxiq ka'Euad maa'b!’ Dyavj zuvq xij zu'g mwavj meib Eei waag.
17.34: yia Buaj meib Bua, maaib i taub myenb Jwavg Zruj pweij, xij zipq taub mivb, kwavg taub yem uaq.
17.2: zx'q mxg Diuj Jyenq ninb Eei Jaav puvj Fiag Kxiq kaub lovj pun ninb Duaq yetg taub naaiq teij fu'Jweib faij paamd zwid.
17.36: maaib i taub myenb yem Deig, xij zipq taub mivb, kwavg taub yem uaq.”
17.20: maaib teij faa-li-sij myenb naaig kaaj ye-su, “Tinb huvb Tauj haiq zang Zivj taaib zruj zyruq kunq myenb?” ye-su tau, “Tinb huvb taaib zruj zyruq kunq myenb maiq zeid mziv mavg tu'q pwatg.
17.24: yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, taaib uaq nxm Nxi xij Navq pxvd Ba'livg yem naaiq puv luvb Tauj uaq puv luvb.
17.28: “lotq Eei luvb Diaq yaag fib Navq Eei. myenb yaag Eang yaag hopq, maaid maaig, zwavj ka'naaiq, komq pyauq.
17.7: “sij kxvq meib Bua haiq taub maaib taub pru Zwrtq mivb laib livb fai puvj pa'ki yuvb. yem Deig Rwrnj taaib meib zyrug Buaj ninb, ‘meib kunq zweid Jyenq Eang Naavj a'q’ fai?
17.29: mq paag lotq Zwrtq soj-Dom zivb uaq Nxi, maaib trud Zauj huvb yem uaq luvb Dxtq Fiag taaib puaq myetg Revg ninb Bua yetg zuvq.
17.19: ye-su cvj kxvq Buaj uaq laanb myenb, “Jiad sin taaib Rwrnj a'q og. weig meib syenj Kauj yia, meib Eei pcvg lovj Revg mig a'q.”
17.17: ye-su kxvq, “maaib zyepg taub zxg lovj Revg maiq zeid? uaq teij Duab taub ni?
17.31: “uaq Nxi haiq taub yem pyaub vxb Fiag, lyemb maiq tuvq pia'g pyauq zx'q yem pyauq Eei ka'naaiq. haiq taub yem Deig yaag maiq tuvq Rwrnj mivb zx'q haiq Euvg.
17.30: yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, hing Zwrtq uaq Nxi yaag xij Navq uaq nx.
17.27: no-yaa Eei luvb Diaq, myenb Eang yaag hopq, puvj sia'q kxvq auq, zruj Zivb Jaa, Tauj no-yaa pia'g Ravq uaq Nxi. yem Ravq ka'Eiag Eei yetg zuvq zu'g Byuvb swib imj yemj taig Revg.
17.11: ye-su mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb ninb yavb saa-maa-lia teig Zauj kaa-li-li teig Eei kapg Jaaij mivb.
17.5: kovb zob Bua Buaj zyruq, “Toq pun yia Bua syenj kaub henq teij og.”
17.9: pru ei Jyenq zyruq Paaiq Eei waag zruj, zyruq xij zu'g lcvd zivb ninb fai?
17.16: Tauj ye-su uaq, ninb zyrug Baapq Fiag Dau lcvd zivb haig ye-su. naaiq taub myenb se saa-maa-lia Janj.
17.37: saib kxj Bua naaig kaaj, “saib tiaj aa'b! naaiq teij sig xij zu'g yem haaij Zwrtq?” ye-su tau, “ka'naaib taig yem haaij, tomb Jaavb vovb yaag yem uaq.”
17.4: kxvq Navq ninb yetg Nxi txvg meib siag Rung, mrud Rung taaib Eyemg kxvq, ‘yia lcvd txvg a'q,’ meib zuvq xij zu'g kwavg pun ninb.”
17.10: meib Bua yaag fib Navq Eei. meib Bua zruj zyavj Paaiq taaib Eei kov xij zu'g kxvq, ‘yia Bua zruj pru Navq. naaiq teij kov mtaaib hxpg zu'g yia Bua zruj.’+”
17.22: ye-su cvj Buaj ninb Eei saib kxj Bua, “Nxib Eia'g xij Tauj, meib Bua xij tu'q pwatg yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, Eei yetg nxm Nxi, mq paag meib Bua maiq tu'q pwatg.
17.12: pia'g nxm laavd uaq zang, maaib zyepg taub putq komb huq pcvg Eei myenb pwavb zu'g ye-su. ninb Bua sruq Jyenq ko teij Eei
17.15: maaib taub pwatg ninb kanb lovj Revg zyrug lyemb zeib taauj Gaav Rwrnj, lovg Qiaj Lo Eei Zev Jyenq Tinb huvb taaib.
17.13: heug, “ye-su aa'b! zyruq aa'b! Kxb lyenb teij yia Bua maa'b!”
17.1: ye-su kxvq Buaj saib kxj Bua, “Duaq myenb zruj txvg Eei sig Dovg haaij zuvq xij maaib. mq paag Duaq myenb zruj txvg uaq taub xij zu'g Kruq a'q.
17.26: “no-yaa Eei luvb Diaq Navq haiq nx, yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, taaib uaq teij Nxi yaag Navq uaq nx.
17.25: mq paag yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, xij zu'g syrug ziaj Euvg Kruq Daavg, yaag zu'g ib Jaaj Eei myenb Gemb.

11.18: Navq naaig, sij kxvq saa-taan Eei kua'q pun Gxi zruj ziaj kwanb, naaiq kwanb Zauj uaq kwanb Bx'q Jaaj, ninb Eei kua'q Navq haiq nx haib yem tu'q wrnq? meib Bua kxvq yia lovg Be-en-se-Bun myenq Eei livg zung myenq Zwrtq.
11.45: maaib taub Faauj leid Eei finb scv kxvq, “finb scv aa'b! meib Navq naaiq nx kxvq, meib lyemb yia Bua yaag kxvq to'g nyaa.”
11.3: yia Bua Nxib Nxi Qyemj Eei Eang hopq, Toq pun yia Bua yetg Nxi maaib kauj yetg Nxi Eang.
11.43: “meib Bua faa-li-sij myenb aa'b! meib Bua xij pwavb zu'g Kruq a'q. meib Bua yem wig txvb xij zweid lovj Jiaj Eei txvj. yem heib hxvg yaag xij myenb zx'q yia'q Taaib meib Bua.
11.50: Navq naaiq, ib Jaaj myenb zu'g tivg zwid se laaij ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij taij zwavj trug waag myenb pun Ryaamq lyrug Zwrtq, yem zeij luvb zeij Dau Tauj ib zang,
11.14: ye-su zung ka'naaib Vovj myenq Zwrtq myenb Eei sin. myenq Zwrtq mivb, uaq laanb myenb zyrug haib kxvq waag a'q. zwavj myenb Bua'g hxvb haig.
11.48: Navq naaig meib Bua piuj mevb meib Bua a'Neiq meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij zruj Eei sig, weig zu'g ninb Bua taij naaiq teij trug waag myenb, meib Bua yaag Tevj Zeij zruq.
11.34: meib Eei mziv peiq sin Eei tav. meib Eei mziv Fav nx, zyavb sin zyrug Fav Revg. mq paag mziv maiq Fav, meib Eei sin zyrug Mwavj Revg mig a'q.
11.2: ye-su zyrug Buaj ninb Bua, “meib Bua haiq zang tauj kauj xij zu'g Navq naaiq nx kxvq, ‘zavg tiaj aa'b! Toq pun myenb Taaib meib Eei Zivb Revg Buaj. Toq pun meib zruj zyruq kunq myenb Eei Nxi Tauj.
11.36: sij kxvq meib Eei sin maaib Fav pwavq Revg, maiq maaib yetg nxm txvj Mwavj, yetg zuvq zyrug Fav, Navq maaib tav Eei Fav ziuj Jyenq meib nx.”
11.35: Navq naaiq meib xij zu'g Buvb Jyenq maiq tuvq pun meib Eei sin Eei Fav Mwavj.
11.24: “maaib Yiab kwaiq myenq yem myenb Eei sin Zwrtq taaib uaq zang, ninb yrub Jyenq teib puvb haand mivb lxd txvj hitq. mivb kau, lxd maiq tu'q txvj hitq. myenq zyrug kxvq, ‘aa, yia xij Rwrnj yia Eei lob pyauq yem a'q.’
11.7: “yem pyauq ka'Euad uaq taub lob kcv zyrug tau, ‘maiq tuvq taaib kivb Zeuq yia a'q. yia Bua kwrn Jyenq kcvb. Mwavq txig yetg zuvq pweij Revg. yia maiq haib Jiad sin zx'q haiq Euvg pun meib a'q lx'g.’
11.17: mq paag ninb Bua Eei Hruq Navq haiq nx Namq, ye-su hiuq Eei. ninb zyrug kxvq, “haiq nxm kua'q pun Gxi zruj ziaj Jauq, kanb Eei kua'q zavg myenb Zauj kanb Eei kua'q zavg myenb Bx'q Jaaj, uaq nxm kua'q zyrug paaig Revg a'q. sij kxvq yetg pyauq myenb Bx'q Jaaj pun Gxi, Jaab tivb zyrug paaig Revg a'q.
11.49: weig naaiq Tinb huvb lovg ninb Eei Zovb mevb kxvq, ‘yia xij Paaiq trug waag myenb yaag Paaiq kovb zob mivb Tauj ninb Bua naaig. maaib teij ninb Bua xij taij taig. maaib teij ninb Bua xij zruj to'g.’
11.11: “meib Bua haiq taub zruj tia Eei myenb, txn Toq Byaud meib xij pun naav ninb fai?
11.33: “maiq maaib haiq taub tyemq zia'g tav taaib txb mivb pivj Jyenq, fai zx'q Tovq Gopq Jyenq. tav mtaaib xij zu'g ton tav Eei paaib pun pia'g pyauq Eei myenb mavg tu'q pwatg Fav.
11.16: cvj maaib teij myenb xij seij ye-su zyrug Toq ninb pun nxm yem Tinb txvb taaib Eei Javb hog.
11.40: ka'naaib Vovj aa'b! Tinb huvb zeij Zwrtq ka'Eiag mcvj yaag maiq zeid cvj zeij Zwrtq ka'Euad mcvj?
11.37: ye-su kxvq paag waag, maaib taub faa-li-sij myenb heug ye-su mivb Zauj ninb Eang Naavj. ye-su zyrug pia'g pyauq zweid Jyenq Eang Naavj.
11.4: Toq kwavg yia Bua zruj Eei zwid, weig zu'g haiq taub txvg yia Bua, yia Bua yaag kwavg pun ninb Bua. maiq tuvq pun yia Bua pwavb seij Hruq Eei sig.’+”
11.51: tovb yem taij aa-Bcn uaq txig myenb cvj Tauj taij sej-Kaa-li-yaa yem ziab txvb Zauj Zivb Revg Eei txvj Bu'Dovj. yia Buaj meib Bua, ib Jaaj myenb xij zu'g laaij naaiq teij yetg zuvq zu'g tivg zwid.
11.12: txn Toq Jauj, meib xij pun zyepg Eeig Daavb ninb fai?
11.46: ye-su tau, “meib Bua Faauj leid Eei finb scv yaag xij zu'g Kruq a'q. meib Bua zx'q Niaq Eei, a'g tu'q Eiaj Eei ka'naaiq Paanj pun myenb Eiaj. mq paag meib Bua kanb lyemb maiq lovg yetg nxm puab Do'q Tevj ninb Bua prub.
11.13: meib Bua Dovg naaig waaig Eei myenb zuvq hiuq tu'q pun lovj Eei ka'naaiq meib Bua Eei fu'Jweiq, meib Bua Eei Tinb txvb tiaj Zxg kaub xij Zeij sivj livb pun Toq ninb uaq teij myenb.”
11.26: ninb zyrug cvj mivb lxd siag taub myenq kaub Zyruq Jiaj ninb, taaib Zauj Jyenq ninb pia'g uaq laanb myenb Eei sin yem. uaq laanb myenb zyrug kaub Kruq Jiaj zinb Daavg a'q.”
11.28: ye-su tau, “tovb haid Tinb huvb Eei waag yaag ei Jyenq zruj uaq teij, kaub maaib Fyenb yrub.”
11.54: xij Duaq ninb kxvq txvg waag weig lovg ninb Eei waag koj ninb.
11.8: yia Buaj meib Bua, maiq zeid laaij taaq lob kcv xij Jiad sin zx'q haiq Euvg pun ninb, mq paag weig ninb Toq tu'q Erub haig Zivj taaib Jiad sin zx'q ninb Qyemj zu'g Eei ka'naaiq pun.
11.9: “Navq naaig yia Buaj meib Bua, xij zu'g Toq zyrug tu'q. xij zu'g lxd zyrug pwatg. xij zu'g vcvq kcvb, kcvb zyrug Gxi.
11.32: Tauj Tinb huvb syemq zwid uaq Nxi, ni-naa-we myenb xij sruq Jiad taaib koj ib Jaaj myenb, weig zu'g yo-naa mivb zunb tod uaq zang ninb Bua zuvq kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid mig a'q. mavg maa'b! ib zang yem naaiq Zxg maaib taub kaub Lo Jiaj yo-naa.
11.21: “sij kxvq maaib taub myenb henq myenb Beng Rxib ua'g king zuaq Jyenq kanb Eei pyauq, ninb Eei Jaab tivb zyrug pcvb xn a'q.
11.23: “haiq taub maiq kan yia, se Zauj yia txib tekg. haiq taub maiq Tevj yia syru zunq, uaq taub zruj pun Raanj Revg mig a'q.
11.6: yia maaib taub lob piuq txig Jiaj Jauq Ko'q ho'g Tauj taaib hitq yia uaq, yia yaag maiq maaib haiq Euvg pun ninb Eang.’
11.44: meib Bua xij zu'g Kruq a'q. meib Bua se Navq maiq maaib Javb hog Eei Janb taig zruq. myenb Zaaiq zu'g yaag lyemb maiq hiuq Zaaiq zu'g Janb taig zruq.”
11.20: mq paag sij kxvq yia Kauj Tinb huvb Eei Qa'q zung myenq Zwrtq, naaiq pun Ziv Tinb huvb yem meib Bua Bu'Dovj zruj zyruq a'q.
11.5: ye-su cvj kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “sij kxvq meib Bua maaib taub Daamq mwrnd pyenj seij mivb Tauj lob kcv txig Eei pyauq Buaj ninb, ‘lob kcv aa'b! Toq kaaq pua nxm Fuaq pun yia og.
11.53: ye-su yem uaq Zwrtq taaib, Faauj leid Eei finb scv Zauj faa-li-sij myenb Zauj ninb txib tekg Rcv, Qa'q lxd Jauq naaig,
11.19: sij kxvq yia Kauj Be-en-se-Bun myenq zung myenq Zwrtq, uaq Euvg meib Bua Eei saib kxj Kauj haiq taub Eei livg zung myenq Zwrtq? meib Bua Eei saib kxj zruj Eei sig pun Ziv meib Bua txvg a'q.
11.38: uaq taub faa-li-sij myenb pwatg ye-su Eang Naavj, maiq ei Jyenq leid Raauj puad Daavg, ninb Bua'g hxvb haig a'q.
11.31: Tauj Tinb huvb syemq zwid uaq Nxi, yem naamb puv mcvj uaq taub huvb maag xij sruq Jiad taaib koj ib Jaaj myenb, weig zu'g uaq taub huvb maag yem luvb kxn taaib mwavj saa-lo-mxn huvb Zovb mevb Eei waag. mavg maa'b! yem naaiq maaib taub kaub Lo Jiaj saa-lo-mxn.
11.52: “meib Bua Faauj leid Eei finb scv xij zu'g Kruq a'q, weig zu'g meib Bua zx'q Kxi wrnb zaav uaq nxm pyauq Eei fxb zeib syru Jyenq. meib Bua kanb maiq pia'g. myenb xij pia'g meib Bua yaag laanb Jyenq maiq pun pia'g.”
11.27: ye-su kxvq Jyenq naaiq teij waag uaq zang, uaq kwanb myenb maaib taub msia'q txn heug Jyenq Bwi Eei kxvq Buaj ye-su, “yuvd meib taaib cvj pun Exj meib hopq uaq taub maaib Fyenb yrub a'q.”
11.41: xij zu'g zx'q yem meib Bua Eei Rxmg yenq ka'Euad uaq teij ka'naaiq fuvj myenb Jomg myenb, meib Bua Eei yetg zuvq zyrug Zivb Revg mig a'q.
11.1: maaib Nxi ye-su yem nxm txvj tauj kauj. tauj kauj liud, maaib taub ninb Eei saib kxj kxvq Buaj ninb, “zyruq aag, Toq Faauj yia Bua tauj kauj Navq yo-han Faauj ninb Eei saib kxj Bua nx.”
11.39: zyruq zyrug kxvq Buaj ninb, “meib Bua faa-li-sij myenb Raauj Rxmg yenq Kuvj Raauj ka'Eiag Revg Navq. mq paag meib Bua ka'Euad zaavb pwavq meib Bua mauq taaib Eei ka'naaiq Zauj Ywav x'q.
11.47: meib Bua kevb xij zu'g Kruq a'q. meib Bua Zeij trug waag myenb Eei zruq mq paag naaiq teij trug waag myenb meib Bua kanb Eei ovb Taaij taij taig.
11.10: weig zu'g haiq taub Toq zyrug tu'q. haiq taub lxd zyrug pwatg. haiq taub vcvq kcvb, kcvb zyrug Gxi.
11.25: ninb zyrug Rwrnj mivb pwatg ninb Eei lob pyauq Pwrtq Fav Revg, Beng suv Eei.
11.22: mq paag sij kxvq maaib taub kaub henq taaib Bx'q hivb, ninb zyrug zx'q Revg tovb uaq taub pavg weig kruj Jaab tivb Eei ua'g king. Zaavq tu'q taaib Eei ka'naaiq yaag txb mivb pun Gxi.
11.42: “meib Bua faa-li-sij myenb aa'b! meib Bua xij pwavb zu'g Kruq a'q. meib Bua txb pc'g Zitq Zauj yenb si Zauj Euvb Euvg ka'naaib Daav zyepg kruq Eei yetg kruq fovg hxg Tinb huvb. mq paag zruj pcvb fim Eei Jauq Zauj Namq Tinb huvb Eei Jauq meib Bua la'Ku'q maiq zruj. meib Bua hxpg zu'g zruj naaiq teij Jauq mq paag maiq tuvq la'Ku'q zyepg kruq Eei yetg kruq ka'naaiq fovg hxg Tinb huvb.
11.15: mq paag maaib teij kxvq, “ninb lovg myenq Eei huvb, Be-en-se-Bun, Eei livg zung myenq Zwrtq.”
11.29: myenb kunq zruj kunq Zamq taaib kapq zunq uaq zang, ye-su kxvq, “ib Jaaj Nxi Eei myenb kevb waaig haig. ninb Bua Kuvj Toq Javb hog mavg mq paag Zwrtq liud yo-naa uaq Euvg Javb hog, yia maiq pun haiq Euvg Javb hog ninb Bua mavg.
11.30: yo-naa Navq haiq nx penj Javb hog pun ni-naa-we myenb mavg, yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, yaag xij Navq uaq nx penj Javb hog pun ib Jaaj Nxi Eei myenb mavg.

5.18: maaib teij myenb lovg Jiug kcv taub putq pcvb Bai myenb, xij txb pia'g pyauq mivb an ye-su Eei Ra'Myen.
5.8: si-mon pi-te pwatg Navq naaiq nx ninb zyrug kweig Fiag ye-su Eei Zivb Bx'g ka'Len kxvq, “zyruq aa'b! Toq leib ko teij yia maa'b! weig zu'g yia se zwib myenb.”
5.33: maaib teij myenb kxvq Buaj ye-su, “yo-han Eei saib kxj Bua zanb zang zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg yaag tauj kauj. faa-li-sij myenb Eei saib kxj yaag fib Navq Eei, mq paag meib Eei saib kxj Kuvj Eang Kuvj hopq Navq.”
5.3: ye-su pia'g Pruj Ravq. uaq Pruj se si-mon Eei. ye-su Toq ninb Rcv Jiaj mivb teij zyrug zweid Jyenq uaq Ravq Faauj zwavj myenb.
5.32: yia maiq zeid taaib heug Kuq myenb. yia taaib heug mevb taub waaig Eei myenb, xij ninb Bua kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid.”
5.21: Faauj leid Eei finb scv Zauj faa-li-sij myenb yem Hruq Namq, “naaiq haiq taub myenb lcb? fuvg Navq naaig kxvq waag Ki Tinb huvb? Kuvj Tinb huvb kanb haib kwavg tu'q myenb Eei zwid Navq nyaa.”
5.35: mq paag Nxib Eia'g xij Tauj, syavb laavb zu'g txb mivb mig a'q. Tauj uaq zang Kc'q myenb Zivj taaib zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg.”
5.14: ye-su kxvq, “Zinb maang maiq tuvq Buaj haiq taub og. pcv za'g Eei mivb sai myenb uaq pun ninb zaab mavg. mavg liud, xij zu'g ziuj mo-se Paaiq Eei waag txb scvb Kuq mivb ziag pun Tinb huvb weig saaj meib Eei wij, zruj zxvb zevj pun zwavj myenb hiuq tu'q meib Eei pcvg lovj Revg mig a'q.”
5.23: kxvq, ‘meib Eei zwid tu'q kwavg liud a'q,’ fai kxvq, ‘Jiad sin taaib yavb Jauq a'q,’ naaiq teij i Jruj waag, haiq Jruj kaub heg tu'q kxvq?
5.6: ninb Bua zyrug pxvd muvd Fiag, tu'q Byaud Zamq! haig. muvd Kaaq teij huq mig a'q.
5.34: ye-su tau, “syavb laavb Zxg yem Jyenq Zivb Jaab yinb Eei zyavb hog, haib heug syavb laavb Eei Kc'q myenb zei Jyenq maiq pun Eang, maiq pun hopq fai?
5.2: ye-su pwatg i Pruj Ravq tivb Jyenq uaq Kxib Len, mq paag zx'q Byaud myenb Zwrtq Ravq mivb Roj ninb Bua Eei muvd mig a'q.
5.36: ninb cvj kxvq naaiq tiub waab peiq, “maiq maaib haiq taub petq syavb lwi taaib Biaq lob lwi. Navq naaig nx Kuvj petq waaig syavb lwi Navq. syavb Dia yaag maiq Pwij lob Dia.
5.20: ye-su pwatg ninb Bua syenj Dovg naaig lovj, ninb zyrug kxvq, “yrud aa'b! meib Eei zwid tu'q kwavg liud a'q.”
5.24: mq paag yia xij pun meib Bua hiuq tu'q yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, yem naaiq luvb Diaq maaib hatg maad kwavg myenb Eei zwid.” ye-su Buaj uaq taub putq pcvb Bai Eei myenb, “yia Buaj meib, Jiad sin taaib txb Jyenq meib Eei Jiug Rwrnj a'q.”
5.28: le-wi zyrug Jiad sin, kwavg Revg ninb Eei yetg zuvq ka'naaiq, kan Jyenq ye-su mivb mig a'q.
5.7: si-mon Bua zyrug yaapq ninb Bua Eei zx'q Byaud txig txb uaq Pruj Ravq taaib Tevj. i Pruj Ravq maaib Byaud pwavq Revg. Ravq Kaaq teij zemb a'q.
5.29: le-wi zyrug yem ninb Eei pyauq Beng tonj Naavj Lo Eei hrug ye-su. Eang uaq tonj Naavj Eei Kc'q myenb maaib Tevj lo-maa huvb Jaa syru Rru Eei myenb cvj Zauj myenb Zamq Eei.
5.19: mq paag myenb Zamq haig, pia'g maiq Tauj ye-su uaq. ninb Bua zyrug faauj pyaub vxb, Zc'q Tov vwaad, zx'q pcvg myenb pweij Jyenq Jiug puvj Fiag zwavj myenb Bu'Dovj, ye-su Eei Ra'Myen.
5.17: maaib Nxi ye-su Faauj Jyenq myenb, maaib teij faa-li-sij myenb Zauj teij Faauj leid Eei finb scv yaag zweid Jyenq uaq. ninb Bua yem kaa-li-li teig Eei nxmb nxm laavd, yaag yem yu-Dia teig, yaag yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb taaib. zyruq Eei Qa'q Zauj ye-su yem, pun ninb haib zxg tu'q pcvg lovj.
5.38: syavb a'vung tiuq xij zu'g tapq syavb Dopg Bua'g Navq.
5.31: ye-su tau, “wavg syavj Eei myenb maiq Qyemj zu'g Diab sai. Kuvj putg pcvg myenb Navq, Qyemj zu'g Diab sai.
5.30: maaib teij faa-li-sij myenb Zauj ninb Bua Eei Faauj leid Eei finb scv vopq pun ye-su Eei saib kxj Bua mwavj. ninb Bua kxvq, “meib Bua weig haiq tiug Zauj syru Rru Eei myenb Zauj mevb taub waaig Eei myenb Jwavg tiab Eang, Jwavg tiab hopq?”
5.27: Ga'haaq ye-su cvj Zwrtq Jauq mivb kau, pwatg taub Tevj lo-maa huvb Jaa syru Rrub zinb Eei myenb, Buaj heug le-wi, zweid Jyenq syru Rru Eei zaamg. ye-su Buaj ninb, “taaib kan yia og.”
5.11: ninb Bua zyrug Tx Ravq Zwrtq uamb Len, yetg zuvq ka'naaiq kwavg Revg kan Jyenq ye-su mivb a'q.
5.5: si-mon tau, “zyruq aa'b! yia Bua zyavb mwrnd pxvd kau Kruq Revg. yetg taub Byaud yaag maiq tu'q. mq paag yia ei Jyenq meib Eei waag pxvd muvd Fiag.”
5.9: ninb Zauj ninb Eei txig Bua'g hxvb haig, zx'q tu'q Byaud Dovg naaig Zamq.
5.16: mq paag ye-su aab log mivb levb Eei txvj tauj kauj.
5.37: yaag maiq maaib haiq taub toj syavb a'vung tiuq tapq lob Dopg Bua'g. Navq naaiq nx zruj, syavb tiuq haib zuvj Dopg Bua'g Baaij. a'vung tiuq zyrug Zwrtq Revg. Dopg Bua'g yaag huq mig a'q.
5.39: haiq taub hopq liud lob a'vung tiuq maiq xij hopq syavb a'vung tiuq. ninb kxvq, ‘lob tiuq kaub Kuq.’+”
5.4: ye-su Faauj paag waag, ninb Buaj si-mon, “cvj Rcv Ravq Jiaj mivb teij uaq mcvj uam Do Eei txvj pxvd muvd Fiag zx'q Byaud maa'b!”
5.10: Zauj si-mon Jwavg kov uaq teij zx'q Byaud txig, sej-Be-Di Eei txn, yaa-kxpg Zauj yo-han, yaag Bua'g hxvb. ye-su cvj kxvq Buaj si-mon, “meib maiq tuvq kamb Riaj og. yavb naaiq Jiaj meib xij lxd myenb.”
5.22: uaq teij myenb Navq haiq nx Namq, ye-su hiuq Eei. ninb zyrug naaig kaaj, “meib Bua Eei Hruq weig haiq tiug Navq naaiq nx Namq?
5.12: maaib Rung ye-su yem nxm muvq, maaib laanb myenb putq komb huq pcvg pwavq Revg sin. ninb pwatg ye-su zyrug Baapq Fiag Dau Toq, “tomb kxj aag, sij kxvq meib xij nx, meib haib zxg lovj yia Eei pcvg.”
5.15: mq paag ye-su Eei mevb taub Jaa siv Javq Jyenq mivb. maaib myenb Zamq! Eei taaib mwavj ninb, yaag xij ninb zxg ninb Bua Eei pcvg,
5.13: ye-su suv puad maan Jyenq uaq laanb myenb yaag kxvq, “yia xij zxg Eei. meib lovj taaib maa'b!” uaq laanb myenb Eei pcvg lyemb zeib lovj mig a'q.
5.1: maaib Nxi nx, ye-su sruq Jyenq ken-ne-saa-letq Kxib txn Len. myenb Zamq Eei Bevj Jyenq mivb ye-su uaq, xij mwavj ninb kxvq Tinb huvb Eei waag.
5.26: zwavj myenb Bua'g hxvb haig zyrug Zev Tinb huvb. ninb Bua kamb Riaj Eei, yaag kxvq, “ib Nxi Bua za'kevb pwatg Bua'g hxvb haig Eei sig a'q.”
5.25: uaq laanb myenb zyrug yem zwavj myenb Eei Ra'Myen lyemb zeib Jiad sin, txb Jyenq ninb pweij uaq nxm Jiug, Zev Jyenq Tinb huvb Rwrnj.

9.18: maaib Nxi ye-su yem levb Eei txvj, ninb kanb tauj kauj. saib kxj Bua yaag Zauj ninb yem Eei. ye-su naaig kaaj ninb Bua, “zwavj myenb kxvq yia se haiq taub?”
9.45: mq paag saib kxj Bua maiq mevb pc'g naaiq Jruj waag Eei eij leid. se Navq xmq Jyenq nx, ninb Bua Zivj taaib maiq haib mevb pc'g. ninb Bua yaag kamb Riaj maiq naaig ye-su.
9.3: ye-su Buaj ninb Eei saib kxj, “Zwrtq Jauq maiq tuvq txb haiq Euvg mivb. pyaab Byaag, Bua'g Jxvj, pyenb fwij, zinb Eaanb, lyemb lwib hruj yeng yaag maiq tuvq txb.
9.43: zwavj myenb Bua'g hxvb haig Tinb huvb Eei tomb Qa'q. zwavj myenb Zxg Bua'g hxvb haig ye-su zruj Eei yetg zuvq sig uaq zang, ye-su Buaj ninb Eei saib kxj,
9.50: ye-su Buaj ninb, “maiq tuvq laanb ninb, weig zu'g haiq taub maiq Zauj Bua txib tekg, uaq taub se Tevj Bua a'q.”
9.14: (yem uaq Eei mJavg txn maaib leib maiq ko pyaa Zin laanb Eei txvj.) ye-su Buaj ninb Eei saib kxj Bua, “heug zwavj myenb zweid Jyenq yetg Bomd yetg Bomd Eei. yetg Bomd leib maiq ko Mmd zyepg laanb Eei txvj.”
9.48: yaag kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “haiq taub tevq yia Eei Buaj zipq naaiq taub faij Eei fu'Jweiq, uaq taub yaag zipq yia. haiq taub zipq yia yaag zipq Paaiq yia taaib uaq taub. Navq naaig, yem meib Bua Eei Bu'Dovj, haiq taub zruj kaub faij Jiaj, uaq taub tu'q zruj kaub Lo Jiaj.’
9.34: ninb kxvq waag zuvq maiq kcvb setq, maaib txq Bwrnj taaib Ria Jyenq ninb Bua. saib kxj Bua pia'g Bwrnj ka'Euad ninb Bua kamb Riaj haig.
9.2: ninb Paaiq ninb Bua Zwrtq mivb zunb Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq myenb Eei Kuq fyenj yaag zxg pcvg.
9.36: naaiq teij Qiaj sekq mig a'q, Kuvj maaib ye-su kanb yem uaq Navq. saib kxj Bua yaag mwavb Jyenq naaiq teij Jaub lrug, maiq kcvb kxvq ninb Bua tu'q pwatg liud Eei Jauq Buaj haiq taub.
9.35: haid waag yem Bwrnj ka'Euad Zwrtq taaib kxvq, “naaiq se yia Eei txn, tovb yia kinq taaib uaq taub. mwavj ninb maa'b!”
9.24: haiq taub Kuvj Namq Fruj ninb kanb Eei mcvg Navq, uaq taub Eei mcvg zyrug zu'g kwavg. mq paag haiq taub weig yia kwavg ninb Eei mcvg, uaq taub zyrug Fruj tu'q ninb Eei mcvg.
9.61: cvj maaib laanb kxvq Buaj ye-su, “tomb kxj aa'b! yia xij kan meib mivb mq paag yia Toq Rwrnj Buaj tavb yia Eei Mwavq txig.”
9.7: kunq kaa-li-li teib puv uaq taub he-lotq huvb haid naaiq teij yetg zuvq sig Zwrtq, ninb Namq maiq mevb pc'g. maaib teij kxvq Tevj myenb Jiaj uam Eei leid uaq taub yo-han cvj navb taaib.
9.17: zwavj myenb Eang peuq Revg. zevg Fiag mwrng uaq teij ka'naaiq, saib kxj Bua syru taaib tu'q zyepg Eeig Daan pwavq.
9.58: ye-su kxvq Buaj ninb, “Yiab Juq maaib Kwrtq yem, nx'g yaag maaib laud, mq paag yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, maiq maaib txvj pweij hitq Kwrnj.”
9.49: yo-han kxvq, “saib tiaj aa'b! yia Bua pwatg taub myenb lovg meib Eei Buaj zung myenq Zwrtq. yia Bua maiq pun ninb zruj, weig zu'g ninb maiq zeid zruj Bua Eei kwanb.”
9.11: myenb Zamq hiuq tu'q, zyrug kan Jyenq mivb. ye-su zipq ninb Bua yaag kxvq Tinb huvb zruj zyruq Eei Kuq fyenj Buaj ninb Bua. haiq taub Qyemj zu'g zxg pcvg, ninb yaag zxg lovj.
9.33: uaq teij i laanb Zauj ye-su xij leib txig uaq zang pi-te kxvq Buaj ye-su, “zyruq aa'b! yia Bua yem naaiq kevb lovj haig. Toq pun yia Bua zruj pua nxm liub, zruj nxm pun meib, zruj nxm pun mo-se, cvj zruj nxm pun e-li-yaa.” (pi-te zuvq maiq hiuq tu'q ninb kxvq haiq Euvg.)
9.16: ye-su zx'q uaq teij pyaa nxm Fuaq Zauj i taub Byaud Zau Myen mavg luvb, lcvd zivb Tinb huvb liud zyrug mc'q Gxi pun saib kxj Bua txb mivb pun Gxi zwavj myenb Eang.
9.40: yia Toq meib Eei saib kxj Bua zung myenq Zwrtq mq paag ninb Bua zung maiq haib Zwrtq.”
9.59: ye-su cvj Buaj laanb myenb, “kan yia mivb maa'b!” uaq laanb myenb tau, “tomb kxj aa'b! yia Toq Rwrnj mivb pyopq yia Eei tia Daavg.”
9.37: ta'Eeig Nxi, ye-su Bua yem Bov Fiag taaib, maaib kwanb myenb Zamq Eei taaib lxd ye-su.
9.4: meib Bua hitq haiq taub Eei pyauq, xij zu'g hitq Tauj Zwrtq mivb kanb nxm muvq.
9.51: Tinb huvb xij zipq ye-su faauj Tinb txvb Eei Nxib Eia'g Tauj fatq a'q. ye-su zyrug lyepg tivg Hruq mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb.
9.62: ye-su kxvq, “haiq taub nanq Jyenq laib pyeiq laib livb mq paag ninb Win Rwrnj mavg Ga'haaq, uaq taub maiq Pwij yem Tinb huvb Eei kua'q.”
9.12: Ba'Nxi aaq lamb teij mwrtq a'q. uaq teij zyepg Eeig taub saib kxj taaib Buaj ye-su, “xij zu'g pun naaiq teij myenb mivb a'q. Buaj ninb Bua mivb naaiq teij txvj Eei laavd Zauj Deib liub Jxm lxd ka'naaiq Eang, lxd txvj hitq, weig zu'g naaiq se levb Eei txvj.”
9.46: saib kxj Bua yem ninb Bua kanb Bu'Dovj Rcv haiq taub zruj kaub Lo Jiaj.
9.13: mq paag ye-su Buaj ninb Bua, “meib Bua kanb lxd pun ninb Bua Eang maa'b!” ninb Bua tau, “yia Bua Kuvj maaib Du'g pyaa nxm Fuaq Zauj i taub Byaud Navq. saib tiaj xij yia Bua mivb maaid ka'naaiq pun Dovg naaiq Zamq Eei myenb Eang?”
9.26: haiq taub Eaiq yia yaag Eaiq yia Faauj Eei waag, yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, Zauj yia kanb Eei Favb laavg yaag Zauj zavg tiaj Zauj Zivb Revg finb myenb Eei Favb laavg taaib uaq zang, yia zyrug Eaiq uaq taub.
9.28: ye-su kxvq liud naaiq teij waag, Ga'haaq siag Yetg Nxi Eei txvj, ninb txb Jyenq pi-te, yo-han, Zauj yaa-kxpg mivb uaq Jiaj Bov tauj kauj.
9.54: ye-su Eei saib kxj, yaa-kxpg Zauj yo-han, pwatg Navq naaiq, ninb Bua kxvq, “zyruq aa'b! meib xij yia Bua heug luvb trud Fiag taaib puaq myetg Revg ninb Bua fai?”
9.8: maaib teij kxvq e-li-yaa hing Zwrtq taaib. cvj maaib teij kxvq maaib yetg taub lob Nxi Eei trug waag myenb navb taaib.
9.9: he-lotq kxvq, “yo-han Eei mGxvq yia zuvq Buaj myenb Va'q Dutq mig a'q. uaq Euvg, tovb yia haid kxvq zruj naaiq teij sig uaq laanb myenb se haiq taub?” he-lotq zyrug lxd Qavj pwatg ye-su.
9.32: uaq zang pi-te Zauj ninb Eei i taub txig mziv Ewij, xij mFxmb haig a'q. ninb Bua yetq Eia taaib, pwatg ye-su Eei Favb laavg yaag pwatg uaq teij i laanb myenb Zauj ye-su sruq Jyenq uaq.
9.21: ye-su hatg ninb Eei saib kxj, heug ninb Bua maiq tuvq kxvq naaiq teij sig Buaj haiq taub.
9.57: ninb Bua kan Jyenq Jauq mivb kau, maaib laanb myenb Buaj ye-su, “maiq kunq meib mivb haaij, yia xij kan meib mivb.”
9.23: ye-su cvj kxvq Buaj ninb Bua yetg zuvq, “haiq taub xij kan yia mivb xij zu'g siaq Jyenq ninb kanb. Nxib Nxi xij zu'g Daam Jyenq ninb Eei zyepg Ravg Jaaj kan yia mivb.
9.6: kovb zob Bua zyrug mivb laavd Jiaj laavd, yem nxmb nxm txvj zunb Kuq fyenj yaag zxg pcvg.
9.55: ye-su Win Rwrnj kxvq ninb Bua.
9.44: “meib Bua lovb lovj Eei mwavj yia ib zang Buaj meib Bua naaiq teij waag. yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, xij zu'g Jiu pun yem myenb Eei puab Diaq.”
9.20: ye-su cvj kxvq, “meib Bua ni? meib Bua kxvq yia tovb haiq taub?” pi-te tau, “meib tovb Tinb huvb Paaiq taaib Eei ki-tug.”
9.5: myenb maiq zipq nx, xij zu'g Zwrtq uaq nxm laavd yaag fevj kua'q zauj Eei niab Buv kwavg uaq, weig zruj zxvb zevj pun ninb Bua hiuq tu'q ninb Bua zruj txvg.”
9.56: ye-su Bua cvj mivb kanb nxm laavd mig a'q.
9.53: mq paag laavd zavg myenb maiq Kavq zipq weig zu'g pwatg ye-su xij mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb.
9.19: saib kxj Bua tau, “maaib teij kxvq meib tovb Tevj myenb Jiaj uam Eei leid uaq taub yo-han. maaib teij kxvq e-li-yaa. cvj maaib teij kxvq meib yetg taub lob Nxi Eei trug waag myenb cvj navb taaib.”
9.38: uaq kwanb myenb maaib taub mJavg txn heug Jyenq kxvq, “finb scv aa'b! Toq meib Tevj mavg yia Eei txn. yia Kuvj maaib naaiq taub txnb Do'g Navq.
9.31: ninb Bua yem Favb laavg hing Zwrtq yaag yem uaq Zauj ye-su kxvq Tauj ninb taig Eei Jauq maiq laub xij yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb zyavb sig.
9.52: ninb Paaiq teij myenb mivb Daavg. ninb Bua pia'g nxm saa-maa-lia laavd, xij Tevj ye-su liug leid txvj,
9.27: yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua, yem naaiq Eei myenb maaib teij zuvq maiq kcvb taig zyrug tu'q pwatg Tinb huvb taaib zruj zyruq kunq myenb.”
9.60: ye-su tau, “sweib taig mivb Eei myenb kanb pyopq ninb Bua Eei taig mivb Eei myenb a'q. meib kunq mivb zunb Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq myenb Eei Kuq fyenj.”
9.41: ye-su Buaj zwavj myenb, “meib Bua ib Jaaj Eei myenb aa'b! meib Bua za'kevb maiq syenj, mnxmb yaag hod haig. yia xij zu'g Zauj meib Bua yem, xij zu'g Eyend meib Bua Dovg haaij laub?” ye-su cvj kxvq Buaj uaq laanb myenb, “txb meib Eei txn taaib naaiq maa'b!”
9.1: ye-su heug ninb Eei zyepg Eeig taub kovb zob taaib zunq zyrug Jiu livg Jiu hatg maad pun ninb Bua haib zung tu'q Euvb Euvg myenq Zwrtq yaag haib zxg tu'q pcvg lovj.
9.39: ninb zu'g myenq mua'q. yetq zu'g yetg Rung, zyrug naub naug Eei heug cvj Zyru a'q. uamb Rwib Byaaud pomb pomb Eei Zwrtq. myenq zanb zang hxig ninb Kruq haig, maiq Kavq puvj kwavg.
9.47: mq paag ye-su hiuq tu'q ninb Bua yem Hruq Navq haiq nx Namq, ninb zyrug Ken taub fu'Jweiq taaib sruq Jyenq ninb Eei ka'Len,
9.10: kovb zob Bua Rwrnj taaib kxvq ninb Bua zruj liud Eei yetg zuvq Jaub lrug pun ye-su mwavj. ye-su txb Jyenq kovb zob Bua kanb mivb nxm muvq, Buaj heug Betg-sai-Daa.
9.25: haiq taub tu'q Revg luvb Diaq Eei ka'naaiq mq paag ninb kanb zu'g myetg, uaq taub tu'q haiq Euvg maaib lamb lovg?
9.22: ninb yaag kxvq, “yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, xij zu'g syrug Zamb Euvg Kruq. myenb koj Zauj sai myenb pyeiq Zauj Faauj leid Eei finb scv xij Gemb yia, txb yia mivb taij kwavg, mq paag Ga'haaq pua Nxi yia cvj navb taaib.”
9.42: naaiq taub txn taaib Jyenq uaq zang, myenq cvj mua'q ninb Kiv Fiag Dau Zyru tu'q Kruq haig. ye-su zyrug hatg Yiab kwaiq myenq yaag zxg lovj uaq taub txn, Jiu pun ninb Eei tia mig a'q.
9.15: saib kxj Bua ei Jyenq naaiq teij waag zruj. zwavj myenb zyrug zweid Fiag.
9.29: ye-su tauj kauj uaq zang, ninb Eei Myen Tiuq Revg mig a'q. ninb Eei lwib hruj yaag Tiuq mig a'q, Bopq pc'g Eei, zcvb zcvb uaq.
9.30: lyemb zeib maaib i laanb myenb yem uaq Zauj ye-su kxvq waag, se mo-se Zauj e-li-yaa.

16.18: “haiq taub leib ninb Eei auq cvj mivb lovg syavb auq, ninb se Yenj auq Navq. haiq taub lovg aub leib zruj auq, uaq taub se Kuvj Yenj auq Navq.
16.8: “uaq taub putg zxib myenb zyrug Zev Hruq maiq zivj uaq taub kunq kov myenb zruj tu'q kwai haig. weig zu'g yem naaiq luvb Diaq Eei myenb Zauj ninb Bua kanb Eei uaq txig myenb zruj kaub kwai Jiaj yem Fav zov uaq Jauq myenb.”
16.3: “uaq taub kunq kov myenb yem Hruq Namq, ‘yia xij zu'g Navq haiq nx zruj? yia Eei zyruq maiq lovg yia zruj kov a'q. yia wetq Dau, yrug maiq maaib Qa'q. Toq Eang, yia yaag tiaq maiq tu'q Eaiq.
16.21: zuaq Naavb Meib Dxtq Eang. Juq yaag taaib Biag ninb Eei faav.
16.14: faa-li-sij myenb Namq Eaanb, ninb Bua haid ye-su kxvq naaiq teij waag ninb Bua zyrug Kub Jyetq haig ye-su a'q.
16.23: ninb mivb yem yemb ken zu'g tiaq mun tiaq Kruq. ninb zyrug Zau Myen pwatg apg-laa-ham yem ko Eei, yaag pwatg laa-saa-latq Zauj apg-laa-ham yem uaq.
16.6: “uaq taub tau, ‘Qyemj yetg pc'q Tovq ka'lanq yrub.’ “kunq kov myenb Buaj ninb, ‘naaiq meib Eei zc'g taan. Govb zweid Fiag fiaq Mmd zyepg Tovq Navq.’
16.2: ninb zyrug heug ninb Eei kunq kov myenb taaib naaig, ‘yia haid myenb kxvq meib naaiq teij sig Navq haiq nx? zx'q Revg meib kunq kov Eei zc'g taan taaib pun yia mavg kaaj maa'b! yem naaiq mivb meib maiq tu'q zruj yia Eei kunq kov myenb a'q.’
16.20: “cvj maaib taub Dxtq naang myenb, Buaj heug laa-saa-latq, putq faav putq laaij pwavq Revg yetg sin. myenb zanb zang txb ninb mivb Tauj uaq taub putg zxib myenb Eei kcvb Daavg
16.24: ninb zyrug heug apg-laa-ham, ‘ov aa'b! Toq Kxb lyenb yia, Buaj laa-saa-latq taaib lovg puab Do'q Zo'q uam taaib Dyepq yia Eei Byetg laavb teij, weig zu'g yem naaiq trud puaq Jyenq yia mun haig, Kruq haig.’
16.28: yia Zxg maaib pyaa muab txn yem uaq. Toq pun laa-saa-latq mivb Kwinj ninb Bua maiq tuvq taaib naaiq syrug Kruq Eei txvj.’
16.7: “ninb cvj naaig ta'Eeig taub, ‘meib ni? Qyemj Bu'ziaj?’ “uaq taub tau, ‘yetg pc'q Bua'g Zu'q.’ “kunq kov myenb kxvq, ‘naaiq meib Eei zc'g taan. fiaq petq zyepg Bua'g Navq.’
16.29: “apg-laa-ham tau, ‘ninb Bua zuvq maaib mo-se Zauj Tinb huvb Eei trug waag myenb Eei sru nyaa. meib Eei muab txig xij zu'g mwavj ninb Bua Eei waag.’
16.19: “maaib taub tomb putg zxib myenb zu'q Zyrub zu'q tung Eei lwib hruj Navq. Nxib Nxi Eang xq hopq tiuq Fyenb yrub haig.
16.17: luvb Zauj Dau Jiaj Revg Zxg kaub huvb heg leib latg Dxtq yetg timq yetg wc'g Ravg.
16.31: “apg-laa-ham kxvq, ‘sij kxvq ninb Bua maiq mwavj mo-se Zauj Tinb huvb Eei trug waag myenb Eei waag nx, maiq kunq maaib laanb myenb taig mivb cvj navb taaib, ninb Bua yaag maiq mwavj lx'g.’+”
16.30: “putg zxib myenb cvj tau apg-laa-ham, ‘ov aag, Bua'g naaiq maiq kauj. sij kxvq maaib laanb myenb taig mivb cvj navb taaib mivb Tauj yia Eei muab txig uaq, muab txig zuvq xij kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid.’
16.27: “putg zxib myenb cvj kxvq, ‘ov aag, uaq Euvg Toq meib Paaiq laa-saa-latq mivb Tauj yia Eei tia Eei pyauq.
16.11: sij kxvq paamb ken Eei zinb Eaanb meib Bua kruj maiq zivj, haiq taub xij pun meib Bua kruj zyen zinb zxib?
16.5: “ninb zyrug heug Qyemj ninb Eei zyruq Eei zc'q uaq teij zo'g taub, zo'g taub Eei taaib. ninb naaig kaaj ta'yetq taub, ‘meib Qyemj yia Eei zyruq Eei zc'q Bu'ziaj?’
16.9: ye-su cvj kxvq, “yia Buaj meib Bua, xij zu'g lovg paamb ken maiq pcvb fim Eei zinb Eaanb ziu kxb yrud. Tauj zinb Eaanb Revg mig a'q, meib Bua zyrug tu'q Tinb huvb zipq mivb yem yetg liud Eei pyauq.
16.16: “mo-se Eei leid Zauj Tinb huvb Eei trug waag myenb fiaq taaib Eei sru myenb zunb Jyenq taaib Tauj yo-han. yem naaig taaib, zunb Tinb huvb Eei kua'q Eei Kuq fyenj. myenb yaag Zaavq Jyenq pia'g Tinb huvb Eei kua'q.
16.4: aa, yia hiuq tu'q hxpg zu'g Navq haiq nx zruj. Ga'haaq naaiq Euvg kov yia maiq tu'q zruj mq paag Zxg haib maaib teij myenb zipq yia yem ninb Bua Eei pyauq.’
16.10: “haiq taub yem faib fiuq sig zruj tu'q zivj, yem Lo Eei sig yaag zruj tu'q zivj. sij kxvq faib fiuq sig zruj maiq zivj, Lo Eei sig yaag zruj maiq zivj a'q.
16.22: “zruj kau, naaiq taub Dxtq naang myenb taig mig a'q. finb myenb txb ninb mivb Zauj ninb Eei ovb Taaib vc'q, apg-laa-ham, yem. “putg zxib myenb yaag taig mig a'q, pyopq Jyenq.
16.12: sij kxvq meib Bua kruj kanb taub Eei ka'naaiq maiq zivj, meib Bua kanb hxpg zu'g tu'q Eei ka'naaiq, haiq taub xij pun meib Bua?
16.15: ye-su zyrug kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “meib Bua zruj Eei sig pun myenb laaig meib Bua zruj tu'q hxpg, mq paag Tinb huvb hiuq tu'q meib Bua Eei Hruq. weig zu'g paamb myenb funj Jaaij Eei, ei Tinb huvb mavg se maiq zig zinb.
16.13: “maiq maaib haiq taub haib zruj tu'q i taub zyruq Eei pru. Navq naaig ninb xij Rxv naaiq taub, xij Namq uaq taub. maiq zei c'q, ninb xij Taaib naaiq taub, xij mavg Piaj uaq taub. meib Bua maiq haib tovb tavb zruj Tinb huvb Eei pru yaag zruj Eaanb Eei pru.”
16.1: ye-su kxvq Buaj ninb Eei saib kxj, “maaib taub putg zxib myenb, myenb cvj taaib koj ninb kxvq, ninb Eei kunq kov myenb la'kwaib zaauj ninb Eei zinb Eaanb.
16.26: Zxg cvj maaib Euvg. maaib tiub tomb zwrnj maang zuvj Do Gc'q Jyenq. haiq taub yem naaiq puv xij Jiaj meib Bua uaq puv, Jiaj maiq tu'q. haiq taub yem uaq puv xij Jiaj yia Bua naaiq puv yaag Jiaj maiq tu'q.’
16.25: “apg-laa-ham tau ninb, ‘fun aag, meib xij zu'g Javj Tauj meib yem seij zavg uaq zang meib Euvb Euvg yaag tu'q lovj haig. laa-saa-latq yaag Kuvj tu'q waaig Eei Navq. ib zang laa-saa-latq tu'q lovj, Fyenb yrub haig a'q. taauj Rwrnj meib ib zang zu'g syrug Kruq.

4.18: “zyruq Eei sivj livb Zauj yia yem, weig zu'g ninb kinq yia taaib zunb Kuq fyenj Buaj myenb Jomg myenb. ninb Paaiq yia taaib zunb Buaj zu'g wrnj Eei myenb ninb Bua xij tu'q puvj Zwrtq, yaag zunb Buaj mziv mcvb Eei myenb, ninb Bua haib mavg tu'q pwatg, yaag pun zu'g myenb zruj to'g hxig uaq teij tu'q puvj Gxi,
4.3: myenq Eei huvb zyrug kxvq Buaj ninb, “sij kxvq meib zruj Tinb huvb Eei txn nx, heug naaiq nxm la'pyeiq penj Fuaq taaib maa'b!”
4.43: ye-su Buaj ninb Bua, “Tinb huvb Paaiq yia, yia zyrug xij zu'g mivb uaq teij kanb nxm muvq zunb Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq myenb Eei Kuq fyenj. Tinb huvb Paaiq yia taaib se weig Navq naaiq nx zruj.”
4.14: ye-su cvj Rwrnj kaa-li-li scvq, maaib sivj livb Eei Qa'q Zauj ninb yem. ninb Eei Jaub lrug siv pwavq uaq nxm teib puv.
4.34: “naa-saa-letq muvq Eei ye-su aa'b! meib maaib haiq Euvg kwen zu'g yia Bua? meib taaib naaiq xij myetg yia Bua? meib haiq taub yia hiuq Eei. meib se Tinb huvb Eei Zivb Revg myenb uaq taub.”
4.2: feij zyepg Nxi, zu'g myenq Eei huvb seij. naaiq teij Nxi ka'Euad, ye-su maiq Eang haiq Euvg. naaiq teij Nxib Eia'g Jiaj liud, ninb Hruq sia a'q.
4.36: zwavj myenb Bua'g hxvb haig. laanb Buaj laanb, “naaig haiq Euvg waag ni? ninb maaib livg maaib hatg maad hatg Yiab kwaiq myenq Zwrtq, myenq zyrug Zwrtq mig a'q.”
4.35: ye-su hatg uaq taub myenq, “maiq tuvq Ko lo. Zwrtq naaiq taub myenb Eei sin taaib maa'b!” myenq zyrug mua'q uaq taub myenb Kiv Gwekg Fiag zwavj myenb Eei Ra'Myen, zyav naaig Zwrtq mig a'q, yaag maiq zruj haiq Euvg hxig uaq laanb myenb.
4.24: ye-su cvj Buaj ninb Bua, “trug waag myenb yem kanb Eei pwrnb muvq maiq maaib haiq taub a'Neiq zipq.
4.7: sij kxvq meib paaij yia, naaiq teij yetg zuvq zyrug penj meib Eei Revg.”
4.17: maaib taub zx'q Fung uaq taub trug waag myenb, i-saa-yaa, Eei sru Zunq pun ye-su. ninb zyrug Kxi taaib lxd pwatg fiaq Jyenq naaiq teij waag,
4.11: ‘ninb Bua zyrug lovg puad prub Jyenq meib, maiq pun meib Eei zauj zov zu'g la'pyeiq.’+”
4.33: yem uaq wig txvb maaib laanb myenb maaib Yiab kwaiq myenq yem ninb Eei sin. ninb naub naug Eei kxvq,
4.16: ye-su cvj Rwrnj naa-saa-letq, tovb ninb yem uaq Lo taaib uaq nxm muvq. Tauj tivb kov Nxi ninb Navq yetg kau nx, mivb wig txvb. ninb zyrug sruq Jiad taaib to'g kivb sru.
4.40: Ba'Nxi mwrtq Eei zyavb hog, haiq taub maaib kxb yrud putq haiq Euvg pcvg zyrug txb taaib lxd ye-su. ye-su maan Jyenq taub taub, zxg yetg zuvq Eei pcvg lovj Revg.
4.37: ye-su zruj Eei Jaub lrug zyrug siv pwavq uaq nxm teib puv.
4.4: ye-su tau, “kivb sru fiaq Jyenq kxvq, ‘myenb maiq zeid Kuvj Kauj Eang hopq yuvd mcvg Navq.’+”
4.12: ye-su tau, “kivb sru kxvq, ‘maiq tuvq seij zyruq, meib Eei Tinb huvb.’+”
4.13: myenq Eei huvb lovg Euvb Euvg za'eij seij liud, zyrug mivb mig a'q, zuaq Jyenq lxd Qavj taaib seij.
4.26: Tinb huvb yaag maiq Paaiq e-li-yaa mivb lxd yem i-saa-laa-en teib puv Eei haiq taub. Kuvj Paaiq ninb mivb lxd yem sai-Dxn teig, saaj-le-fatq muvq uaq taub Navq.
4.28: yem wig txvb Eei zwavj myenb haid ye-su Navq naaiq nx kxvq, ninb Bua Qiaj Jiad! haig,
4.8: ye-su cvj tau ninb, “kivb sru fiaq Jyenq kxvq, ‘xij zu'g paaij zyruq, meib Eei Tinb huvb, Kuvj xij zu'g zavg ninb Du'g taub Navq.’+”
4.9: myenq Eei huvb cvj txb ye-su mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb, zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq uaq, pun ninb yem Lav Jiaj uaq nxm txvj, kxvq Buaj ninb, “sij kxvq meib penj Tinb huvb Eei txn nx, yem naaiq piu Fiag kaaj.
4.32: zwavj myenb Bua'g hxvb ninb Faauj Eei waag, weig zu'g ninb Eei waag maaib hatg maad.
4.21: ninb zyrug kxvq mevb Buaj ninb Bua, “meib Bua haid liud naaiq trug kivb sru Eei waag, ib Nxi Zwrtq taaib txib tiug Revg.”
4.23: ye-su kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “yia hiuq tu'q meib Bua Dovg haaij xij kxvq naaiq tiub waab peiq pun yia, ‘Diab sai aa'b! xij zu'g zxg meib kanb maa'b!’ yaag xij Buaj yia, ‘yia Bua haid meib yem Kaa-pe-naa-um muvq zruj Eei sig. ib zang meib yem naaiq meib Eei pwrnb muvq zruj kaaj maa'b!’+”
4.6: yaag kxvq, “naaiq yetg zuvq Eei livg Zauj naaiq teij nxmb nxm kua'q Eei zinb zxib yia Jiu pun meib, weig zu'g naaiq teij yetg zuvq se Jiu pun yia mig a'q. yia xij pun haiq taub se sweib yia pun a'q.
4.44: ye-su zyrug mivb kxmj yu-Dia teig Eei wig txvb zunb tod.
4.20: ye-su to'g liud zyrug Fung Jyenq sru Jiu pun kruj wig txvb Eei myenb syru zyrug zweid Fiag. yetg zwavj wig txvb Eei myenb nib nuvj nu'q Eei mavg Jyenq ye-su.
4.5: myenq Eei huvb cvj txb ninb faauj nxm txvj Lav Eei, zyrug zx'q paamb ken Eei maang kua'q hing Zwrtq Fapg tavb pun ninb mavg,
4.19: cvj zunb kxvq zyruq Zeij en Eei Havj Tauj a'q.”
4.38: ye-su Zwrtq wig txvb cvj mivb si-mon Eei pyauq. si-mon Eei maab tiaq putq pcvg, sin Lu'q Jxm Eei. ninb Bua zyrug Toq ye-su Tevj.
4.31: ye-su Fiag Tauj kaa-li-li scvq, Kaa-pe-naa-um muvq. tivb kov Nxi ninb yem uaq Faauj myenb.
4.27: trug waag myenb, e-li-saa, Eei luvb Diaq maaib putq komb huq pcvg Eei myenb Zamq Eei. mq paag maiq maaib haiq taub nxig tu'q ninb kanb Eei pcvg lovj. Kuvj maaib uaq taub si-lia myenb, naa-aa-maan, Du'g taub tu'q pcvg lovj Navq.”
4.41: myenq yem myenb Zamq Eei sin Zwrtq nib nuvj naug Eei heug Jyenq kxvq, “meib se Tinb huvb Eei txn.” mq paag ye-su hatg myenq, maiq pun ninb Bua kxvq waag, weig zu'g ninb Bua hiuq tu'q ninb se ki-tug.
4.1: ye-su mivb Jx-Dcn Daaib Rwrnj, sivj livb yem pwavq ninb Eei Hruq. sivj livb yaag txb ninb mivb yem teib puvb Waav,
4.39: ye-su zyrug mivb sruq Jyenq ninb Eei ka'Len hatg sin Jxm pcvg Twij. pcvg zyrug Twij mig a'q. pi-te Eei maab tiaq lyemb zeib Jiad sin taaib fub suj ye-su Bua.
4.10: weig zu'g kivb sru fiaq Jyenq kxvq, ‘Tinb huvb xij Paaiq ninb Eei finb myenb peu Jyenq, kruj Jyenq meib,’ yaag kxvq,
4.25: yia Buaj meib Bua, yem e-li-yaa Eei luvb Diaq luvb haand pua Havb pyenj. pwavb zu'g tomb Waav tomb vxg uaq zang, i-saa-laa-en teib puv maaib aub kwaaq Zamq Eei.
4.22: zwavj myenb haid hxpg Hruq haig ninb, yaag Bua'g hxvb ninb Eei waag Dovg naaig Kub mwavj. ninb Bua naaig kaaj, “naaiq yo-sepq Eei txn maiq zeid?”
4.42: luvb Fav ye-su Zwrtq zi'g muvq mivb levb Eei txvj. zwavj myenb Zwrtq mivb lxd. lxd pwatg, ninb Bua xij lyrub ninb yem uaq, maiq pun ninb leib Gxi ninb Bua.
4.15: ninb yem ninb Bua Eei nxmb nxm wig txvb Faauj myenb. zwavj myenb yaag Zev ninb.
4.29: zyrug Jiad sin Revg taaib, Tx ye-su Zwrtq zi'g muvq. uaq nxm muvq yem Bov kub vwaaig, ninb Bua zyrug Tx Jyenq mivb Tauj Kamb Baav taaub, xij fovq ninb Dxtq.
4.30: mq paag ye-su yavb zwavj myenb Bu'Dovj, mivb mig a'q.

10.18: ye-su Buaj ninb Bua, “yia pwatg saa-taan yem Tinb txvb Dxtq Fiag Navq Ba'livg nx.
10.8: “meib Bua pia'g haiq nxm muvq pwatg myenb zipq meib Bua nx, myenb Beng haiq Euvg Eang hopq, kunq Eang a'q.
10.33: “mq paag maaib taub saa-maa-lia Janj Jiaj Tauj uaq, pwatg naaig taub zu'g Janb za'g Bx'q mun Eei myenb zyrug Kxb lyenb haig,
10.3: mivb maa'b! yia Paaiq meib Bua Zwrtq mivb Navq puvj pa'ki yuvb txn pia'g Yiab Juq kwanb ka'Euad nx.
10.32: “cvj maaib taub le-wi myenb yaag fib Navq Eei Tauj uaq pwatg zyrug mivb mavg. mavg liud, cvj wivg Jiaj uaq puv Jaub Len, zyav naaig mivb mig a'q.
10.21: uaq zang sivj livb pun ye-su Fyenb yrub haig, ninb zyrug kxvq, “aa tia, luvb Dau Eei zyruq aa'b! yia Zev tia weig zu'g naaiq teij sig tia kem Jyenq maiq pun maaib Zovb mevb Eei myenb Zauj ho'g Lav Eei myenb hiuq, mq paag tia pun maiq ho'g Lav Eei myenb hiuq. aa tia aa'b! naaiq se zruj tu'q hxpg tia kanb Eei Hruq.
10.35: “ta'Eeig Dxm saa-maa-lia Janj zx'q tu'q i nxm Tcpq taaib pun pyaub zyruq yaag kxvq Buaj ninb, ‘Tevj yia kruj lovj ninb og. zuaq yia cvj taaib Tauj naaiq mavg kaaj, meib lovg zu'g Bu'ziaj yia mtaaib Jaauq meib.’+”
10.40: maa-Taa Beng Kc'q, kov Zamq, la'Eauq haig, ninb zyrug taaib kxvq, “zyruq aa'b! meib Namq tu'q Jiaj eij Eei? yia Eei Riad kwavg pun yia kanb zruj kov Navq. Toq Buaj ninb taaib Tevj teij yia maa'b!”
10.14: Tauj Tinb huvb syemq zwid uaq Nxi, Tai-la'q Zauj sai-Dxn muvq zuvq zu'g tivg zwid kaub hev meib Bua.
10.23: ye-su cvj Win Rwrnj Zauj saib kxj Bua kanb kxvq, “meib Bua tu'q pwatg naaiq teij sig, meib Bua za'kevb Fyenb yrub a'q.
10.6: sij kxvq yem naaig maaib taub xij tu'q pcvb xn Eei myenb nx, meib Bua Toq Eei pcvb xn ninb zyrug tu'q mig a'q. maiq maaib xij tu'q pcvb xn Eei myenb nx, cvj syru meib Bua Toq Eei pcvb xn Rwrnj taaib.
10.34: mivb Tauj uaq mavg. mavg liud, ninb zyrug zx'q yrub Zauj a'vung tiuq Yetq Jyenq zu'g mun Eei txvj, yaag zx'q Dia peu Jyenq, cvj Lxpq ninb faauj naaiq taub saa-maa-lia Janj Eei lxb, Ken mivb Tauj nxm Kc'q pyauq, Zxg yem uaq kruj ninb.
10.2: ninb kxvq Buaj saib kxj Bua, “kcvb zwavj Zamq mq paag kovb myenb zo'g. weig naaiq xij zu'g Toq kcvb zwavj Eei zyruq Paaiq kovb myenb Zwrtq mivb syru ninb Eei kcvb zwavj.
10.36: setq mweid ye-su kxvq, “meib Bua Namq kaaj, naaiq teij pua taub, tovb haiq taub Namq Janb za'g Zaavq uaq taub myenb?”
10.20: mq paag maiq tuvq a'Neiq myenq mwavj meib Bua Eei waag. xij zu'g a'Neiq meib Bua Eei Buaj tu'q fiaq Jyenq yem Tinb txvb.”
10.24: yia Buaj meib Bua, maaib trug waag myenb Zauj huvb tiaj Zamq Eei xij pwatg tovb meib Bua pwatg Eei, mq paag ninb Bua maiq tu'q pwatg. xij haid tovb meib Bua haid Eei, mq paag ninb Bua maiq tu'q haid.”
10.28: ye-su kxvq, “meib tau tu'q hxpg Eei. xij zu'g Navq naaiq nx zruj meib zyrug tu'q zyavb Jyenq.”
10.7: tivg hitq haiq nxm pyauq, ninb Bua Beng haiq Euvg Eang hopq kunq Eang kunq hopq, weig zu'g kovb myenb Pwij tu'q zipq ninb Eei kovb zinb. yaag maiq tuvq yem naaiq nxm pyauq swiq Jiaj uaq nxm pyauq.
10.29: uaq taub finb scv zyrug maiq maaib ib feij a'q. cvj lxd Jauq naaig ye-su, “uaq Euvg, yia hxpg zu'g Namq Eei se haiq taub?”
10.19: mwavj maa'b! yia pun meib Bua maaib hatg maad Zaaiq tu'q naav, Zaaiq tu'q zyepg Eeig Daavb, yaag hivb Jiaj uaq taub winb wavq Eei yetg zuvq Qa'q, yaag maiq maaib haiq Euvg hxig meib Bua.
10.17: uaq teij Zyetq zyepg Eeig taub saib kxj a'Neiq Eei Rwrnj taaib Buaj ye-su, “zyruq aa'b! yia Bua lovg meib Eei Buaj hatg myenq, myenq yaag mwavj yia Bua.”
10.38: ye-su Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj Bua yavb Jauq mivb uaq zang, ninb Tauj nxm laavd. uaq nxm laavd maaib taub msia'q txn, Buaj heug maa-Taa, a'Neiq zipq ye-su hitq ninb Eei pyauq.
10.31: “txij zu'g uaq nxm zyavb hog, maaib taub sai myenb yavb uaq tiub Jauq Jiaj, pwatg naaiq taub zu'g mun Eei myenb yem uaq Jaub Len. ninb zyrug wivg Jiaj uaq puv Jaub Len mivb mig a'q.
10.30: ye-su tau, “maaib taub myenb yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Fiag ye-li-Ko zivb. ninb mivb kau, zu'g Janb za'g Zaavq. lyemb lwib hruj Ziaq Fav Revg, zx'q ninb Bx'q tu'q maiq navb maiq taig Eei, kwavg Jyenq uaq, zyav naaig mivb mig a'q.
10.27: uaq taub finb scv tau, “xij zu'g lovg Revg Hruq, lovg Revg za'eij, lovg Revg Qa'q, lovg Revg Zovb mevb Namq zyruq, meib Eei Tinb huvb. yaag xij zu'g Namq myenb Navq Namq kanb nx.”
10.11: ‘lyemb meib Bua naaiq nxm muvq Eei niab Buv nitq yia Bua Eei zauj yia Bua Laatq kwavg Revg pun Ziv meib Bua txvg. mq paag meib Bua xij zu'g Javj Jyenq, Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq myenb Eei Nxib Eia'g Tauj fatq a'q.’
10.5: “pia'g haiq nxm pyauq, xij zu'g kxvq naaiq teij waag Daavg, ‘Toq pun naaiq nxm pyauq pcvb xn.’
10.9: xij zu'g zxg lovj uaq nxm muvq Eei pcvg myenb yaag Buaj ninb Bua, ‘Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq myenb Eei zyavb hog Tauj meib Bua fatq a'q.’
10.16: ye-su Buaj ninb Eei saib kxj Bua, “haiq taub mwavj meib Bua, ninb yaag mwavj yia. haiq taub Gemb meib Bua, yaag Gemb yia. haiq taub Gemb yia yaag Gemb Paaiq yia taaib uaq taub.”
10.41: zyruq tau, “maa-Taa aa'b! maa-Taa! meib maaib Zamb Euvg hxig meib Hruq Raub Hruq Waav nyaa.
10.37: Faauj leid Eei finb scv kxvq, “tovb Kxb lyenb ninb uaq taub.” ye-su kxvq, “uaq Euvg, kunq mivb Navq naaig nx zruj og.”
10.39: maa-Taa maaib taub Riad, Buaj heug, maa-li-yaa, zweid Jyenq zyruq Eei zaub Len mwavj ninb Faauj leid.
10.4: maiq tuvq txb Eaanb Bua'g yaag maiq tuvq txb Bua'g tapq ka'naaiq. heb yaag maiq tuvq txb. Jauq zavg pwavb zu'g myenb, lyemb maiq tuvq kxvq wig pwavb waag.
10.10: sij kxvq meib Bua pia'g haiq nxm muvq, myenb yaag maiq zipq meib Bua nx, xij zu'g mivb uaq tomb Jauq kxvq,
10.22: “aa tia zx'q Euvb Euvg Jiu pun yia. Zwrtq liud tia, maiq maaib haiq taub hiuq tu'q txn. Zwrtq liud txn Zauj txn pun hiuq uaq teij, maiq maaib haiq taub hiuq tu'q tia.”
10.12: yia Buaj meib Bua, Tauj Tinb huvb syemq zwid uaq nxm Nxi, soj-Dom zivb zu'g tivg zwid zuvq kaub hev uaq nxm muvq.
10.42: mq paag hxpg zu'g zruj Eei maaib Du'g Euvg Navq. kaub lovj uaq Euvg maa-li-yaa kinq liud a'q, yaag maiq maaib haiq taub zx'q tu'q ninb Eei Zwrtq.”
10.15: Kaa-pe-naa-um muvq aa'b! meib kanb xij Taaib meib kanb faauj luvb fai? meib zuvq zu'g zxi Fiag yemb ken a'q lo'b!”
10.13: “Ko-laa-sin muvq aa'b! meib xij zu'g Kruq a'q. Betg-sai-Daa muvq aa'b! meib yaag xij zu'g Kruq a'q. yem meib Bua Bu'Dovj zruj Jiaj uaq teij Bua'g hxvb Eei sig, sij kxvq yem Tai-la'q Zauj sai-Dxn muvq zruj Zwrtq taaib nx, uaq teij i nxm muvq Eei myenb zuvq pwij Jyenq la'maab Diab Zru, zweid Jyenq saaib Dwi, pun Ziv ninb Bua kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid laub a'q.
10.1: naaiq teij sig Jiaj liud, Ga'haaq zyruq cvj kinq Zwrtq Zyetq zyepg Eeig taub saib kxj Paaiq ninb Bua yetg txij yetg txij Eei mivb. ye-su xij mivb haiq nxm muvq haiq nxm txvj, ninb zyrug Paaiq ninb Bua mivb Daavg.
10.26: ye-su kxvq, “leib latg fiaq Jyenq Navq haiq nx kxvq? meib to'g liud, eij leid Navq haiq nx?”
10.25: maaib taub Faauj leid Eei finb scv sruq Jiad taaib xij seij ye-su. ninb zyrug naaig, “finb scv aa'b! yia xij zu'g Navq haiq nx zruj Zivj tu'q yetg liud Eei mcvg?”

22.18: yia Buaj meib Bua, yavb naaiq Jiaj yia maiq hopq a'vung tiuq. zuaq Tauj Tinb huvb taaib zruj zyruq kunq myenb Zivj taaib cvj hopq.”
22.45: ye-su tauj kauj paag, Jiad sin taaib Tauj saib kxj Bua uaq, pwatg ninb Bua laaij Raub tu'q Kruq haig, mFxmb mig a'q.
22.3: uaq zang saa-taan pia'g yu-Daatg Eei Hruq. uaq taub yu-Daatg, myenb yaag heug i-saa-Kaa-li-otg. ninb zruj ye-su Eei zyepg Eeig taub saib kxj Eei yetg taub.
22.66: luvb Fav uaq zang, yiu-Tai myenb Eei myenb koj Zauj sai myenb pyeiq Zauj Faauj leid Eei finb scv kapq zunq cvj txb ye-su mivb yem ninb Bua Eei kunq sig wig Ra'Myen.
22.43: maaib taub finb myenb yem Tinb txvb taaib hing Zwrtq Tevj Qa'q ye-su.
22.50: maaib taub zuvq Va'q tomb sai myenb Eei nrub zyrug Pai zu'g nrub Eei Byaaug puv mnxmb Dutq mig a'q.
22.14: Tauj Eang Eei zyavb hog, ye-su Zauj ninb Eei kovb zob Bua faauj tiab Eang Naavj.
22.48: mq paag ye-su naaig, “yu-Daatg aag, meib zom yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, weig zx'q yia maaig fai?”
22.69: mq paag yavb naaiq Jiaj, yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, zyrug zweid Jyenq maaib Qa'q Eei Tinb huvb Eei Byaaug mcvj.”
22.34: ye-su kxvq, “pi-te aa'b! yia Buaj meib, ib Nxi Jai maiq kcvb Gaaij, meib xij kxvq pua Rung meib maiq hiuq tu'q yia.”
22.2: sai myenb pyeiq Zauj Faauj leid Eei finb scv xij pivj Jyenq lxd Qavj taij ye-su, weig zu'g ninb Bua kamb Riaj zwavj myenb.
22.36: ye-su kxvq, “mq paag ib zang haiq taub maaib Eaanb Bua'g fai tapq ka'naaiq Eei Bua'g xij zu'g txb Jyenq mivb. haiq taub maiq maaib Ru'g Daauq xij zu'g maaig ninb Eei tomb lwi maaid zuv.
22.35: ye-su cvj naaig kaaj ninb Eei saib kxj Bua, “yia Paaiq meib Bua mivb uaq zang, yia Buaj meib Bua maiq tuvq txb Eaanb Bua'g, yaag maiq tuvq txb Bua'g tapq ka'naaiq fai txb heb, meib Bua Zaa haiq Euvg fai?” ninb Bua tau, “maiq Zaa haiq Euvg.”
22.24: saib kxj Rcv Jiad taaib kxvq, yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj, xij zu'g funj ninb Bua haiq taub zruj Lo Jiaj.
22.71: ninb Bua kxvq, “yia Bua maiq zu'g cvj lovg haiq Euvg zruj zxvb zevj a'q. yia Bua zuvq haid ninb kanb Eei Rwib kxvq liud a'q.”
22.61: zyruq Win Rwrnj mavg Jyenq pi-te, pi-te zyrug Javj zu'g zinb Daavg zyruq kxvq Eei waag, “ib mwrnd Jai zuvq maiq kcvb Gaaij, meib maiq Eyemg yia pua Rung.”
22.67: ninb Bua kxvq, “sij kxvq meib za'kevb ki-tug, Buaj yia Bua maa'b!” ye-su tau, “sij kxvq yia Buaj meib Bua nx, meib Bua yaag maiq syenj.
22.7: Jiaj maiq an pivq Eei Fuaq Eei zipq, tovb xij zu'g taij yuvb txn Eang siaj mcvg zipq uaq tonj Eang hopq Eei Nxi Tauj a'q.
22.17: kxvq liud, ye-su zx'q zaanq a'vung tiuq taaib lcvd zivb Tinb huvb yaag kxvq, “zipq naaiq nxm zaanq mivb pun Gxi yetg laanb hopq teij.
22.58: aaq tavb cvj maaib taub myenb pwatg pi-te zyrug kxvq, “meib yaag tovb yetg taub uaq kwanb myenb nyaa.” mq paag pi-te tau, “meib naaig taub myenb aa'b! yia maiq zeid lx'g.”
22.49: Zauj ye-su yem uaq teij saib kxj pwatg xij maaib haiq Euvg sig Zwrtq, ninb Bua zyrug naaig kaaj, “zyruq aa'b! pcv Ru'g Daauq Va'q ninb Bua tu'q Eei saa'b?”
22.11: yaag naaig kaaj pyaub zyruq, ‘saib tiaj naaig, ninb Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj xij zu'g yem haiq Qovj pyauq Eang siaj mcvg zipq uaq tonj Eang hopq?’
22.33: pi-te tau, “zyruq aa'b! maiq kunq pia'g lob, maiq kunq taig, yia zyavb yaag Zauj meib yetg Dwi. taig yaag Zauj meib yetg Kwrtq.”
22.16: yia Buaj meib Bua, yavb naaiq Jiaj yia maiq Eang siaj mcvg zipq Eei Naavj. zuaq Tauj naaiq tonj Naavj Eei zyen eij leid tunb yunb Revg, se tovb Tinb huvb taaib zruj zyruq kunq myenb Eei zyavb hog, yia Zivj taaib cvj tu'q Eang.”
22.70: ninb Bua yetg zuvq kxvq, “uaq Euvg, meib zruj Tinb huvb Eei txn?” ye-su tau ninb Bua, “yia tovb haiq taub meib Bua kanb kxvq liud a'q.”
22.40: Tauj uaq nxm txvj, ye-su Buaj ninb Bua, “meib Bua xij zu'g Toq Tinb huvb Tevj meib Bua maiq zu'g pwavb seij Hruq Eei sig.”
22.59: Ga'haaq yetg nxm zyavb hog Eei txvj, cvj maaib taub myenb taaib tig Jyenq kxvq, “naaiq taub Dovg haaij zuvq zruj yetg taub ninb Eei myenb, weig zu'g ninb se kaa-li-li myenb.”
22.37: kivb sru fiaq Jyenq kxvq, ‘ninb zu'g funj Zauj zwib myenb fib Navq.’ yia Buaj meib Bua, naaiq Jruj waag xij yem yia Zwrtq taaib, zuvq Zwrtq Jyenq a'q.”
22.4: yu-Daatg zyrug mivb sai myenb pyeiq Zauj kruj zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei pcvb pyeiq uaq Zaavb laavb Navq haiq nx haib zx'q ye-su Jiu pun ninb Bua.
22.51: mq paag ye-su kxvq, “maiq tuvq zruj maa'b!” ninb zyrug Lua uaq taub nrub Eei mnxmb zxg lovj mig a'q.
22.62: pi-te zyrug Zwrtq mivb Qa'q Eyemq tu'q Kruq haig.
22.12: pyaub zyruq zyrug txb meib Bua faauj mivb mavg kub vwaaig uaq Ravb pyauq, maaib Qovj Javq Eei. Euvb Euvg maaib Rxib Revg. meib Bua yem naaig Beng a'q.”
22.46: ninb kxvq Buaj saib kxj Bua, “meib Bua fuvg Navq naaiq nx mFxmb? Jiad sin Toq Tinb huvb Tevj meib Bua maiq zu'g pwavb seij Hruq Eei sig maa'b!”
22.13: ninb Bua zyrug mivb pwatg Euvb Euvg txij ye-su kxvq Eei waag. ninb Bua zyrug yem uaq Beng siaj mcvg zipq Eei Naavj.
22.26: mq paag meib Bua maiq hxpg zu'g Navq naaig. meib Bua haiq taub zruj kaub Lo Jiaj, uaq taub xij zu'g zruj Navq kaub lunj Jiaj uaq taub. haiq taub zruj pyeiq, uaq taub xij zu'g zruj Navq pru nx.
22.28: yia pwavb zu'g Kruq meib Bua Zauj yia yem, maiq kwavg yia.
22.54: ninb Bua zx'q ye-su txb mivb tomb sai myenb Eei pyauq. pi-te yaag kan Jyenq mivb mq paag leib ko teij Eei.
22.68: sij kxvq yia naaig Jruj waag meib Bua, meib Bua yaag maiq tau.
22.63: kruj ye-su uaq teij myenb kwatg to'g Jyetq ye-su yaag Bx'q ninb.
22.8: ye-su Paaiq pi-te Zauj yo-han, Buaj ninb Bua, “meib Bua xij zu'g mivb Beng siaj mcvg zipq uaq tonj Eang hopq taaib pun Bua lomb Rxib Eang.”
22.9: ninb Bua naaig kaaj ye-su, “saib tiaj xij yia Bua mivb haaij Beng?”
22.32: mq paag yia zuvq weig meib tauj kauj Toq Tinb huvb pun meib syenj wrnq, maiq Twij. meib cvj Rwrnj taaib lxd yia, meib xij zu'g Tevj meib Eei kxb yrud henq Jiad taaib.”
22.21: “mavg maa'b! xij maaig yia uaq taub Eei puad Zauj yia Eei puad Jwavg tiab lxvj Jyenq.
22.64: ninb Bua pwav Jyenq ninb Eei mziv naaig ninb, “Zai kaaj! haiq taub Bx'q meib?”
22.57: mq paag pi-te maiq Eyemg. ninb kxvq, “meib naaiq taub msia'q txn aa'b! yia maiq hiuq tu'q ninb nyaa.”
22.23: saib kxj Bua zyrug laanb naaig laanb ninb Bua haiq taub xij zruj Zwrtq naaiq teij sig.
22.6: yu-Daatg zyrug lcvd a'q. zyrug lxd Qavj, tovb zwavj myenb maiq yem Eei zyavb hog, zx'q ye-su Jiu pun ninb Bua.
22.55: yem laatg ka'Euad, Bu'Dovj uaq nxm txvj, ninb Bua puaq Jyenq trud zweid Jyenq. pi-te yaag Zauj ninb Bua zweid uaq.
22.44: ye-su pa'la'g Raub tu'q Kruq haig zyrug Jaa lovg Qa'q tauj kauj. ninb Zwrtq hang yetg nxm yetg nxm Lo Eei, Navq Ryaamq nx Dyepq Fiag Dau.
22.20: Eang liud Naavj, ye-su cvj zx'q zaanq a'vung tiuq taaib kxvq, “naaiq nxm zaanq se lovg yia Eei Ryaamq lyepg Jiad Eei syavb vcvg waag, se weig meib Bua lyrug Zwrtq taaib.”
22.5: uaq teij myenb a'Neiq haig yaag lcvd pun Eaanb ninb.
22.56: maaib taub msia'q pru pwatg pi-te zweid trub Raug Len, trud cvq zu'g pi-te. uaq taub pru nu'g nu'q Eei mavg yaag kxvq, “naaiq taub yaag Zauj uaq laanb myenb yem.”
22.53: yia Nxib Nxi Zauj meib Bua yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq, meib Bua yaag maiq zx'q. mq paag ib zang se meib Bua Eei zyavb hog a'q. Mwavj Eei Qa'q yaag kunq Jyenq.”
22.19: ye-su zx'q Fuaq taaib lcvd zivb liud Tinb huvb, zyrug mc'q Gxi pun saib kxj Bua, yaag kxvq, “naaiq yia Eei sin, se weig meib Bua siaq Eei. meib Bua xij zu'g Navq naaiq zruj weig Javj yia.”
22.38: saib kxj Bua kxvq, “zyruq aa'b! mavg kaaj naaiq! maaib i zuv Ru'g Daauq.” ye-su tau, “naaiq kauj a'q.”
22.31: “si-mon aa'b! si-mon! mwavj og. saa-taan tu'q Tinb huvb Gxi Rwib seij meib Bua yetg zuvq Navq myenb Eomj Zu'q nx.
22.52: ye-su kxvq Buaj taaib zx'q ninb uaq teij sai myenb pyeiq Zauj kruj huvb ting Eei pcvb pyeiq Zauj myenb koj, “meib Bua pwatg yia Navq za'g pcv Zivj taaib txb Jyenq Ru'g Daauq Zauj Dyavb Donj taaib zx'q yia?
22.65: ninb Bua yaag kxvq waag Zamq Eei Wrtq ye-su.
22.27: haiq taub zruj kaub Lo? zweid Jyenq Eang uaq taub fai liug leid uaq taub? zweid Jyenq uaq taub zruj kaub Lo maiq zeid? mq paag yia yem meib Bua Bu'Dovj Navq fub suj Eei myenb nx.
22.60: mq paag pi-te tau, “meib naaig taub myenb aa'b! yia zuvq maiq hiuq tu'q meib kxvq haiq Euvg.” pi-te kxvq naaiq teij waag maiq kcvb setq, Jai zyrug Gaaij a'q.
22.41: kxvq liud, ninb kanb cvj mivb nxm txvj ko teij Eei, Dovg zxi yetg lau la'pyeiq ko Eei txvj, yem uaq kweig Fiag Zauj Tinb huvb kxvq waag.
22.1: maiq an pivq Eei Fuaq Eei zipq, cvj maaib nxm Buaj heug siaj mcvg zipq, aaq lamb Tauj a'q.
22.39: ye-su Zwrtq zivb mivb yaag Navq yetg kau nx, mivb ka'lanq Bov. saib kxj Bua kan Jyenq mivb.
22.47: ye-su kxvq waag zuvq maiq kcvb setq, maaib kwanb myenb taaib. zyepg Eeig taub saib kxj Eei yetg taub, Buaj heug yu-Daatg, yaag txb Jyenq ninb Bua taaib. yu-Daatg mivb fatq Eei xij zom ye-su.
22.10: ninb tau, “meib Bua pia'g zivb uaq zang zyrug maaib taub myenb Daam nxm tapq Jyenq uam Eei niab ha'lrub taaib pwavb meib Bua. ninb pia'g haiq nxm pyauq, meib Bua kan Jyenq ninb pia'g.
22.25: ye-su Buaj ninb Bua, “Janj Eei huvb kunq Jyenq pc'g fivj. zruj Jyenb fruq uaq teij, pc'g fivj heug, ‘Ria myenb Eei kxb yrud.’
22.22: yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, xij zu'g ei Tinb huvb Jaab Daavg tivg taaib Eei kwei seij, mq paag maaig yia uaq taub zuvq zu'g Kruq a'q.”
22.42: ninb kxvq, “aa tia aa'b! sij kxvq ei tia Eei eij nx, Toq zx'q Gxi yia xij zu'g hopq naaiq nxm zaanq. mq paag maiq tuvq ei yia Eei eij. xij zu'g ei tia kanb Eei eij Navq.”
22.15: ye-su kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “yia maiq kcvb zu'g syrug Kruq, yia za'kevb xij Zauj meib Bua Eang naaiq tonj siaj mcvg zipq Eei Naavj Daavg.
22.29: yia Eei tia Navq haiq nx zx'q nxm kua'q pun yia, yia zyrug Navq uaq nx zx'q nxm Jiu pun meib Bua.
22.30: se weig pun meib Bua yem yia Eei kua'q Zauj yia Jwavg tiab Eang Jwavg tiab hopq. meib Bua yaag tu'q zweid weig, syemq uaq teij zyepg Eeig fivj i-saa-laa-en myenb.

12.18: ninb cvj Namq Zwrtq, ‘aa, yia xij zu'g Zc'q Gxi yia Eei lob lamd, cvj kanb zruj kaub Lo, zyrug zx'q yia Eei laavb zi'g Zauj yetg zuvq syru taaib Eei ka'naaiq tapq Jyenq.’
12.45: mq paag sij kxvq uaq taub pru yem Hruq Namq, ‘aa, yia Eei zyruq maiq kcvb Rwrnj syepq,’ ninb zyrug tovd sin Bx'q mJavg pru msia'q pru yaag Eang peuq hopq Gwin.
12.3: meib Bua yem Mwavj zov kxvq Eei waag, myenb yem Fav zov haib mwavj tu'q haid. yem uaq ken ka'Euad pivj Jyenq kxvq Eei waab sapq yaag xij maaib myenb yem pyaub vxb zunb Buaj myenb.
12.43: zyruq Rwrnj taaib pwatg naaiq taub pru zruj tu'q zivj, pru zyrug Fyenb yrub a'q.
12.50: mq paag yia feib Euvg zuvq xij zu'g syrug Kruq Daavg. maiq kcvb Jiaj uaq teij syrug Kruq Eei Nxi yia haid Hruq maiq henb yetg teij.
12.14: ye-su tau ninb, “yrud aa'b! haiq taub xn yia zruj punb zxv myenb, zx'q meib Bua Eei Jaab tivb ka'naaiq pun Gxi?”
12.48: haiq taub pru maiq hiuq tu'q zyruq xij ninb Navq haiq nx zruj, ninb zruj liud Eei sig hxpg zu'g Bx'q Eei mq paag zu'g Bx'q zo'g. haiq taub tu'q Zamq, uaq taub xij zu'g Zwrtq Zamq. Jiu pun haiq taub zipq Zamq, uaq taub xij zu'g Zwrtq kaub Zamq.”
12.34: meib Bua syru Jaaij Eei ka'naaiq yem haiq nxm txvj, meib Bua Eei Hruq haiq zang yaag Javj Jyenq uaq a'q.
12.2: maiq maaib haiq Euvg kem Jyenq maiq zu'g Zwrtq yaavb. maiq maaib haiq Euvg pivj Jyenq myenb maiq haib hiuq.
12.36: Navq pru zuaq Jyenq ninb Bua Eei zyruq mivb Zivb Jaab yinb Rwrnj nx. Tauj pyaub zyruq heug, pru Bua zyrug lyemb zeib Kxi kcvb.
12.35: “meib Bua xij zu'g liug leid zyavj zxv Jyenq yaag tyemq zia'g tav zuaq Jyenq,
12.24: Namq mavg kaaj, nx'g aa! ninb Bua maiq zwavj yaag maiq syru. ninb Bua maiq maaib Baatg yaag maiq maaib lamd. mq paag Tinb huvb wij ninb Bua. meib Bua zuvq kaub Jaaij Jiaj nx'g.
12.7: lyemb meib Bua Eei Ba'pyei zuvq saauq Revg mig a'q. Navq naaig maiq tuvq kamb Riaj. meib Bua zuvq kaub Jaaij Jiaj nx'g meij Zamq.
12.17: naaiq taub putg zxib myenb Namq taaib, ‘xij zu'g Navq haiq nx zruj mq pei? yia syru taaib Eei ka'naaiq yia maiq maaib txvj tapq tu'q Fiag.’
12.58: sij kxvq maaib taub myenb koj meib, xij txb meib mivb Beng sig myenb uaq, yem Daamb Jauq meib xij zu'g Zauj ninb kxvq suv. maiq zei nx, ninb xij Tx meib mivb syemq zwid Jyen uaq. syemq zwid Jyen xij zx'q meib Jiu pun huvb pcv. huvb pcv zyrug txb meib mivb wrnj Jyenq lob.
12.49: “yia taaib weig xij pun trud zia'g paamb ken. feij tu'q ib zang zia'g Jyenq a'q maiq zei!
12.11: “ninb Bua txb meib Bua mivb Tauj wig txvb, fai Jyenb fruq, fai maaib livg Eei myenb, meib Bua maiq tuvq Raub xij zu'g Navq haiq nx tau, Navq haiq nx kxvq.
12.33: xij zu'g maaig Revg meib Bua Eei Jaab tivb cvj Zwrtq fim Tevj myenb Jomg myenb. xij zu'g lxd yetg liud maiq haib waaig Eei Eaanb Bua'g tapq Jaaij Eei ka'naaiq syru uaq Tinb txvb. yem uaq, naaiq teij ka'naaiq maiq haib zitg, Janb za'g maiq haib petq pia'g mivb nimg, kcv yaag maiq haib vaatg waaig.
12.16: ye-su zyrug kxvq naaiq tiub waab peiq Buaj ninb Bua. “maaib taub putg zxib myenb maaib livb teig lovj haig, zwavj tu'q ka'naaiq Zamq.
12.40: meib Bua yaag xij zu'g liug leid zyavj zanb zang zuaq Jyenq, weig zu'g meib Bua Javj maiq zaaig Eei zyavb hog yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, zyrug Tauj a'q.”
12.59: yia Buaj meib Bua, meib xij zu'g wrnj Jyenq lob Tauj funj suv Revg, maiq Zaa yetg nxm tovb zinb Eei zc'q Zivj taaib tu'q Zwrtq.”
12.37: zyruq Rwrnj taaib pwatg pru Navq naaiq kiv Hruq zuaq Jyenq, pru zyrug maaib Fyenb yrub a'q. yia Buaj meib Bua, zyruq xij heug ninb Eei pru Bua zweid Jyenq Eang Naavj, ninb kanb zyrug Fung Jyenq lwib mweid liug leid pru Bua.
12.4: “yia Eei kxb yrud aag, yia Buaj meib Bua, meib Bua maiq tuvq kamb Riaj Kuvj haib taij Bua Eei sin uaq teij, Ga'haaq maiq haib zruj haiq Euvg hxig.
12.51: meib Bua Namq yia taaib pun paamb ken Taaib pcvb fai? maiq zeid. yia Buaj meib Bua, yia taaib zruj pun myenb pun Gxi.
12.12: Tauj uaq nxm zyavb hog sivj livb xij Faauj meib Bua hiuq tu'q Navq haiq nx kxvq.”
12.46: pru Javj maiq zaaig Eei Nxi, Javj maiq zaaig Eei zyavb hog, ninb Eei zyruq zyrug Rwrnj taaib a'q. zyruq xij tivg ninb Eei zwid Niaq Eei. yaag zung ninb mivb Zauj maiq syenj Eei myenb yem.
12.13: yem uaq kwanb myenb maaib laanb myenb kxvq Buaj ye-su, “finb scv aag, Toq Buaj yia Eei kxj zx'q yia Eei tia Paaiq pun yia Eei pwrng Jaab tivb pun yia og.”
12.26: Dovg naaiq faij Eei sig meib Bua zuvq maiq haib zruj, meib Bua Zxg Kwrnj Hruq ta'Eeig Euvg zruj haiq Euvg?”
12.28: lomg Eei miaq ib Nxi zyavb, Fav Nxi Kru Gaai zu'g trud puaq, mq paag Tinb huvb zxv miaq Rweig. Navq naaig, Tinb huvb zuvq kaub xij zxv meib Bua. meib Bua syenj tu'q hei haig wei'b!
12.54: ye-su yaag kxvq Buaj zwavj myenb, “meib Bua pwatg fai puv mcvj faauj txq Bwrnj meib Bua zyrug kxvq, ‘xij twib Byuvg a'q,’ yaag za'kevb Navq naaig.
12.8: “yia Buaj meib Bua, haiq taub txv zwavj Eyemg yia, yia paamb myenb Eei txn, zyrug yem Tinb huvb Eei finb myenb Eei Ra'Myen Eyemg uaq taub.
12.9: mq paag haiq taub maiq txv zwavj Eyemg yia, yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, yem Tinb huvb Eei finb myenb Eei Ra'Myen maiq Eyemg uaq taub a'q.
12.32: “meib Bua naaiq kwanb zo'g Eei myenb aa'b! maiq tuvq kamb Riaj og. meib Bua Eei zavg tiaj a'Neiq zx'q ninb Eei kua'q pun meib Bua.
12.21: ye-su cvj kxvq setq mweid waag, “haiq taub Kuvj xij syru Jyenq ka'naaiq Zamq lyrub ninb kanb lovg, se Navq uaq taub putq zxib Eei myenb Vovj myenb nx. ei Tinb huvb mavg, ninb se myenb Jomg myenb.”
12.57: “meib Bua kanb weig haiq tiug maiq haib tivg haiq Euvg se hxpg fai maiq hxpg?
12.23: mcvg kaub Jaaij Jiaj Eang hopq. sin yaag kaub Jaaij Jiaj lwib hruj.
12.6: pyaa nxm nx'g meij maaig tu'q i nxm tovb zinb Navq maiq zeid? mq paag Tinb huvb Zxg maiq la'Ku'q yetg nxm naaiq teij nx'g meij.
12.55: meib Bua haid Ryaauj yem naamb puv mcvj pwrng taaib, meib Bua kxvq, ‘xij yua'q a'q,’ yaag za'kevb yua'q.
12.44: yia Buaj zyen meib Bua, zyruq xij pun naaiq taub pru kruj Revg ninb Eei yetg zuvq Jaab tivb.
12.20: “mq paag Tinb huvb kxvq Buaj ninb, ‘ka'naaib Vovj aa'b! ib mwrnd meib xij zu'g taig a'q. meib syru taaib lyrub meib kanb lovg Eei ka'naaiq, naaiq Rung xij penj haiq taub Eei?’+”
12.5: yia xij tonq meib Bua, pun meib Bua hiuq tu'q xij zu'g kamb Riaj haiq taub. xij zu'g kamb Riaj Tinb huvb. ninb taij liud myenb, Zxg maaib livg zxi Fiag teig Eua'g. yia Buaj meib Bua, za'kevb xij zu'g kamb Riaj Tinb huvb.
12.56: peib za'g Hruq Fwrtq Eei myenb aa'b! meib Bua haib samj luvb samj Dau Eei setq zeiq. weig haiq tiug samj maiq Zwrtq ib Jaaj Eei sig?
12.53: tia Zauj txn, txn Zauj tia yaag pun Gxi. maa Zauj sia'q, sia'q Zauj maa pun Gxi. maab puag Zauj Bwavd, Bwavd Zauj maab puag yaag pun Gxi.”
12.19: ninb cvj Namq taaib, ‘aa, yia mcvg lovj haig a'q. Euvb Euvg lovj Eei ka'naaiq yia maaib kauj Eang kauj hopq ziaj Havj. yia Kuvj pweij Jyenq Eang, pweij Jyenq hopq, Fyenb yrub a'Ryaaug Navq.’
12.38: maiq kunq uaq taub zyruq Daamq mwrnd fai Daamq mwrnd Jiaj Rwrnj taaib, sij kxvq pwatg pru Bua Zxg kiv Hruq zuaq Jyenq Eei, uaq teij pru zyrug tu'q Fyenb yrub a'q.
12.31: xij zu'g pun Tinb huvb zruj meib Bua Eei zyruq kunq meib Bua, naaiq teij yetg zuvq ka'naaiq ninb zyrug Jaa Tipq pun meib Bua.
12.52: yem naaiq mivb, yetg pwrng myenb maaib pyaa laanb mq paag xij zu'g pun Gxi. pua laanb Zauj i laanb pun Gxi. i laanb Zauj pua laanb pun Gxi.
12.27: Namq mavg kaaj, pc'g hx'g pyavb Navq haiq nx zyavb! pyavb maiq zruj kov yaag maiq pcv swij Datq Dia, mq paag yia Buaj meib Bua, lyemb saa-lo-mxn huvb Dovg naaig putq zxib yaag maiq maaib zxvb zu'q Dovg yetg txq naaiq teij pyavb Rweig.
12.41: pi-te naaig kaaj, “zyruq aa'b! naaiq tiub waab peiq kxvq pun yia Bua fai kxvq pun zwavj myenb?”
12.1: naaiq teij zyavb hog, maaib ziaj Zin laanb myenb taaib zunq mwavj ye-su, laanb yaag Zaaiq zu'g laanb. ye-su Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj Bua kxvq Daavg, “xij zu'g faij fim faa-li-sij myenb Eei pivq. eij leid se ninb Bua peib za'g Hruq Fwrtq.
12.39: “naaiq meib Bua hiuq tu'q Eei. sij kxvq pyaub zyruq hiuq tu'q Janb za'g haiq nxm zyavb hog xij taaib, ninb zyrug zuaq Jyenq maiq pun Janb za'g pia'g pyauq.
12.47: “haiq taub pru hiuq tu'q ninb Eei zyruq xij ninb Navq haiq nx zruj, ninb yaag maiq liug leid yaag maiq ei Jyenq zruj, uaq taub zu'g Bx'q kaub Zamq.
12.10: “haiq taub kxvq to'g yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, Tinb huvb haib kwavg uaq taub Eei zwid. mq paag haiq taub kxvq to'g sivj livb, Tinb huvb maiq kwavg uaq taub Eei zwid.
12.25: meib Bua haiq taub laaij Kwrnj Hruq haib px'q tu'q mcvg Daauq teij?
12.22: ye-su cvj Buaj ninb Eei saib kxj, “Navq naaig yia Buaj meib Bua, maiq tuvq weig yuvd mcvg Eei Eang hopq Kwrnj Hruq. yaag maiq tuvq weig sin zavg Eei lwib hruj Kwrnj Hruq.
12.42: zyruq tau, “haiq taub zruj Hruq zivj, Zovb mevb Eei pru, tovb pyaub zyruq xij Paaiq kruj ninb Eei pyauq yaag ziuj zyavb hog zx'q hxpg zu'g tu'q Eei pwrng Eang hopq pun pru Bua?
12.15: ye-su kxvq Buaj zwavj myenb, “xij zu'g faij fim. maiq tuvq zruj Hruq Lo mauq haiq Euvg. maiq kunq Dovg haaij putq zxib, zyen mcvg maiq zeid yem naaiq teij ka'naaiq.”
12.29: “meib Bua maiq tuvq zanb zang Raub Jyenq xij zu'g Eang xij zu'g hopq haiq Euvg, yaag maiq tuvq Kwrnj Hruq.
12.30: luvb Diaq maang fivj, maiq syenj Tinb huvb Eei myenb, zanb zang lxd naaiq teij ka'naaiq. meib Bua Eei zavg tiaj hiuq tu'q meib Bua Qyemj zu'g lovg naaiq teij ka'naaiq.

15.18: yia xij Rwrnj mivb Buaj yia Eei tia, “aa tia aa'b! yia zi'g zwid Tinb huvb yaag zi'g zwid tia.
15.8: “fai sij kxvq maaib taub msia'q txn maaib zyepg nxm zinb, tivj laaib yetg nxm, ninb Navq haiq nx zruj? ninb maiq zeid tyemq tav taaib ziuj Jyenq, Pwrtq ninb Eei pyauq lovb lovj Eei lxd nxmb nxm txvj, lxd Tauj pwatg fai?
15.3: ye-su zyrug kxvq naaiq tiub waab peiq pun ninb Bua mwavj.
15.32: mq paag yia Bua xij zu'g zruj Jxm Fyenb yrub Eei hrug, weig zu'g meib Eei naaiq taub yrud taig mivb cvj navb taaib, tivj laaib mivb cvj Rwrnj taaib a'q.’+”
15.21: “ninb Eei txn kxvq, ‘aa tia aa'b! yia zi'g zwid Tinb huvb yaag zi'g zwid tia. ib zang yia zuvq maiq Pwij tia Eyemg yia zruj txn a'q.’
15.14: zaauj Revg Eaanb uaq zang yaag txij Jyenq ninb yem uaq nxm teib puv pwavb zu'g tomb Waav tomb vxg. ninb Eei Eaanb yaag tavj Revg mig a'q.
15.23: xij zu'g cvj mivb zx'q Jung Jiaj uaq taub vovb txn taij taaib, Beng taaib Eang hrug ninb.
15.6: “Tauj pyauq ninb heug ninb Eei kxb yrud Zauj laavd zavg myenb taaib, Buaj ninb Bua, ‘xij zu'g lomb Rxib Tevj yia a'Neiq. weig zu'g yia Eei pa'ki yuvb, tivj laaib mivb uaq taub, yia lxd pwatg taaib a'q.’
15.2: faa-li-sij myenb Zauj Faauj leid Eei finb scv zyrug vopq ye-su. ninb Bua kxvq, “naaiq laanb myenb a'Neiq zipq naaig teij mevb taub waaig Eei myenb, Zxg cvj Zauj ninb Bua Eang Naavj.”
15.20: ninb zyrug Jiad sin Zwrtq Jauq Rwrnj ninb Eei tia uaq. “Rwrnj kau, Zxg leib ko teij Eei, ninb Eei tia pwatg, zia'q tu'q ninb Eei txn a'q. za'kevb Kxb lyenb haig zyrug Tiuj mivb Tauj, Qam Jyenq ninb Eei txn zom.
15.24: weig zu'g yia naaiq taub txn taig mivb cvj navb taaib. tivj laaib mivb cvj lxd pwatg taaib.’ zwavj myenb zyrug Jiad kxn hrug ninb a'q.
15.28: “txnb Lo Qiaj Jiad haig zyrug maiq Kavq pia'g pyauq a'q. ninb Eei tia zyrug Zwrtq taaib Kwinj ninb pia'g.
15.7: “yia Buaj meib Bua, fib Navq Eei. maaib laanb myenb kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid nx, yem Tinb txvb uaq teij a'Neiq haig, zuvq kaub a'Neiq maaib Juaq zyepg Juaq laanb Kuq myenb maiq Qyemj zu'g kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid.
15.29: txnb Lo kxvq, ‘mavg kaaj! yia Navq nrub kauq nx Tevj meib zruj kov Tauj ib zang a'q. maiq maaib yetg Rung yia maiq mwavj meib Eei waag nyaa. meib pun Jiaj haiq Euvg yia? lyemb yetg taub yuvb txn zuvq maiq pun Jiaj yia weig Zauj yia Eei kxb yrud Eang zruj Jxm yetg Rung nyaa.
15.19: yavb naaiq Jiaj yia maiq Pwij tia Eyemg yia zruj txn a'q. yia Toq meib funj yia se Navq yetg taub meib Eei pru nx og.”+’
15.17: “zruj kau, ninb Namb Rwrnj. ‘Javj zu'g yia Eei tia Eei pru Bua. luvb tonj ninb Bua Eang liud hopq liud, zuvq Zxg maaib zevg Eei. yia yem naaiq xij zu'g vxg taig.
15.31: “ninb Eei tia tau, ‘txn aag, meib haiq zang yaag Zauj yia yem. yia Eei yetg zuvq ka'naaiq se meib Eei.
15.30: meib naaig taub txn c'q, la'kwaib maaid sia'q Yenj, zx'q meib Eei Jaab tivb ka'naaiq zaauj Fav Revg Rwrnj taaib. meib Zxg se cvj zx'q Jung Jiaj uaq taub vovb txn taij taaib hrug ninb!’
15.27: pru kxvq, ‘meib Eei yrud Rwrnj taaib a'q. meib Eei tia heug zx'q Jung Jiaj uaq taub vovb txn taij taaib Eang hrug meib Eei yrud, weig zu'g meib Eei tia tu'q ninb Eei txn Rwrnj taaib lovj Eei.’
15.11: ye-su cvj kxvq, “maaib laanb myenb maaib i taub txn.
15.5: lxd pwatg taaib ninb a'Neiq haig, zyrug zx'q yuvb taapq Jyenq Ba'taub Rwrnj.
15.9: lxd pwatg taaib, ninb zyrug heug myenb muab txig Zauj laavd zavg myenb taaib, kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, ‘lomb Rxib Tevj yia a'Neiq og. weig zu'g yia Eei zinb, tivj laaib uaq nxm, yia lxd pwatg taaib a'q.’
15.16: “kruj kau tuvd, pwatg tuvd Eang topg Ku'q, ninb za'kevb xij Eang haig a'q. mq paag maiq maaib haiq taub pun haiq Euvg ninb Eang.
15.4: “sij kxvq meib Bua haiq taub maaib yetg pc'q taub pa'ki yuvb, maaib taub tivj laaib mivb, ninb Navq haiq nx zruj? ninb maiq zeid kwavg Jyenq uaq teij Juaq zyepg Juaq taub yem uaq miab Zyavq, mivb lxd Tauj pwatg tivj laaib uaq taub fai?
15.10: “yia Buaj meib Bua, sij kxvq maaib taub zwib myenb kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid, Tinb huvb Eei finb myenb fib Navq Eei a'Neiq haig a'q.”
15.22: “mq paag ninb Eei tia heug ninb Eei pru Bua, ‘Govb mivb zx'q Rweig Jiaj uaq teij lwib Daauq taaib Tevj ninb zu'q Jyenq. cvj zx'q puab Do'g Rcv taaib Tevj ninb tavb Jyenq. heb yaag zx'q taaib Tevj ninb taapg Jyenq.
15.12: txnb faij kxvq Buaj ninb Eei tia, ‘aa tia aa'b! tia Paaiq pun yia Eei pwrng Jaab tivb Toq ib zang pun yia og.’ ninb Eei tia zyrug zx'q ninb Eei Jaab tivb ka'naaiq taaib pun Gxi ninb Bua i muad mig a'q.
15.15: ninb zyrug kan taub uaq nxm teib puv Eei myenb zruj kov. uaq taub myenb Paaiq ninb mivb Deig kruj tuvd.
15.13: “Ga'haaq i ziaj Nxi Navq, txnb faij zyrug zx'q ninb Eei pwrng maaig penj Eaanb taaib kapq zunq txb Jyenq Zwrtq teib puv kob ko Eei mivb. Tauj nxm teib puv, ninb yem uaq la'kwaib zaauj Revg ninb Eei Eaanb.
15.1: maaib Rung maaib syru Rrub zinb Eei myenb Zauj mevb taub waaig Eei myenb taaib fatq ye-su, xij mwavj ninb Faauj leid.
15.26: ninb zyrug heug taub pru taaib naaig, ‘uaq pyauq ninb Bua zruj haiq Euvg?’
15.25: “uaq zang txnb Lo yem uaq Deig. Rwrnj Tauj pyaub Len haid pyomq Ratg, Bx'q lxb, Bx'q Rod, Zavj heij Eei Qiaj Bwi.

13.18: ye-su naaig kaaj, “Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq myenb Navq haiq nx? yia xij zu'g txb haiq Euvg taaib peiq?
13.8: kruj Wivj Eei myenb kxvq, ‘tomb kxj aa'b! Toq meib cvj lyrub Havj. yia xij wetq nia ywav Jyenq kxn, an Jyenq pwrnj.
13.33: mq paag Navq haaij yia ib Nxi, Fav Nxi, Naav Nxi xij zu'g kan Jyenq Jauq mivb a'q, weig zu'g haiq taub trug waag myenb maiq hxpg zu'g yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb ka'Eiag mcvj Eei txvj zu'g taij.
13.3: maiq zeid lx'g. yia Buaj meib Bua, sij kxvq meib Bua maiq kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid, meib Bua yaag fib Navq Eei xij zu'g myetg.
13.32: ye-su tau, “mivb Buaj uaq taub Yiab Juq, ib Nxi Zauj Fav Nxi yia zung myenq Zwrtq yaag zxg pcvg. Naav Nxi zruj zyavj yia Eei kov a'q.
13.21: se Navq pivq nx. maaib taub msia'q txn zx'q teij pivq Qruq pua Tovq Bwrnq. naaiq teij Bwrnq zyrug putq Revg mig a'q.”
13.35: mavg maa'b! meib Eei pyauq zuvq zu'g kwavg penj pyaub Waav. yia Buaj meib Bua, yem naaiq mivb meib Bua maiq tu'q pwatg yia. zuaq meib Bua kxvq, ‘Toq Tinb huvb Zeij fu'q tevq zyruq Eei Buaj taaib uaq taub’ Zivj tu'q pwatg yia.”
13.14: kruj wig txvb uaq taub myenb koj pwatg ye-su lovg tivb kov Nxi zxg pcvg, maiq hxpg ninb Eei Hruq yetg teij. ninb zyrug Buaj zwavj myenb, “maaib Ju'q Nxi zruj kov nyaa. meib Bua lovg naaiq teij Ju'q Nxi zxg pcvg maa'b! maiq tuvq lovg tivb kov Nxi taaib zxg saa.”
13.23: maaib laanb myenb naaig kaaj, “finb scv aa'b! tu'q Fruj Eei myenb zo'g Eei fai?” ye-su Buaj ninb Bua,
13.6: ye-su kxvq naaiq tiub waab peiq pun ninb Bua mwavj. “maaib laanb myenb maaib zuvb vovb Exj Dyavj yem ninb Eei a'vung Wivj. ninb mivb Tauj uaq lxd pyruq yaag lxd maiq tu'q yetg nxm.
13.34: “ye-lu-saa-lem zivb aa'b! ye-lu-saa-lem zivb! meib taij trug waag myenb yaag zx'q la'pyeiq zov taig Tinb huvb Paaiq mivb meib naaig Eei myenb. Bu'ziaj Rung yia xij Lxq zunq meib Eei myenb Navq Jaib Eeid puag txn yem Daatg Diaq nx. mq paag meib maiq Kavq pun yia zruj.
13.2: ye-su tau ninb Bua, “naaiq teij kaa-li-li myenb Navq naaiq nx zu'g taij, meib Bua laaig ninb Bua Eei zwid kaub Lo kaa-li-li Eei uaq teij zwavj myenb Eei zwid fai?
13.20: ye-su cvj naaig kaaj, “xij zu'g lovg haiq Euvg peiq Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq myenb?
13.24: “xij zu'g Bevj Jyenq pia'g hepg Eei kcvb. yia Buaj meib Bua, maaib myenb Zamq Eei xij pia'g yaag pia'g maiq tu'q.
13.28: “uaq zang meib Bua tu'q pwatg apg-laa-ham, i-sakg, yaa-Kopq Zauj yetg zuvq trug waag myenb yem Tinb huvb Eei kua'q, mq paag meib Bua kanb zu'g zung kwavg yem ka'Eiag puvb siv puvb Qiaj Eei Eyemq, vaatg Jyenq Eaab tiaq.
13.7: ninb zyrug Buaj Tevj ninb kruj Wivj Eei myenb, ‘mavg kaaj! tu'q pua Havj yia taaib lxd naaiq zuvb vovb Exj Dyavj Eei pyruq yaag maiq tu'q yetg nxm. kunq kxij kwavg a'q. Kuvj yem naaiq Txvq Dau Navq.’
13.29: myenb xij yem tov naamb fai pa'q puv taaib yem Tinb huvb Eei kua'q Jwavg tiab Eang Naavj.
13.19: xij zu'g peiq nxm laib Jaaij Eim. maaib laanb myenb txb mivb zwavj ninb Eei Wivj. Eim Zwrtq, Lo taaib penj yetg zuvb Dyavj, nx'g yaag zruj laud yem ninb Eei Gwaab.”
13.17: ye-su Navq naaiq nx tau, Zauj ninb zruj winb wavq uaq teij zyrug haid Eaiq haig. mq paag zwavj myenb a'Neiq haig ye-su zruj Eei yetg zuvq Bua'g hxvb haig Eei sig.
13.31: uaq zang maaib teij faa-li-sij myenb taaib Buaj ye-su, “meib xij zu'g simq Gxi mivb kanb nxm txvj a'q. he-lotq huvb xij taij meib.”
13.30: uaq zang yem Ga'haaq maaib teij tu'q yem uaq Daavg, yem uaq Daavg maaib teij zuvq xij zu'g yem Ga'haaq.”
13.27: “mq paag ninb cvj kxvq, ‘yia Buaj meib Bua, yia maiq hiuq tu'q meib Bua yaag maiq hiuq tu'q meib Bua yem haaij taaib. myenb waaig myenb aa'b! pyauj Gxi maa'b!’
13.11: yem uaq maaib taub msia'q txn maaib myenq yem ninb Eei sin pun ninb putq zyepg petq Havj pcvg, mua'q ninb Eei Jaaiq Jutq mivb, sruq maiq za'g.
13.5: zuvq maiq zeid. yia Buaj meib Bua, sij kxvq meib Bua maiq kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid, meib Bua yaag Navq ninb Bua nx, xij zu'g taig.”
13.9: ta'Eeig Havj zyavb pyruq nx, lovj a'q. maiq zyavb nx, kunq kxij kwavg a'q.’+”
13.16: naaiq taub apg-laa-ham Eei zeib fun zu'g saa-taan Dob Jyenq tu'q zyepg petq Havj. lovg tivb kov Nxi Jaiq Dutq, puvj ninb Zwrtq maiq hxpg fai?”
13.4: Zauj sij-lo-am fanb Taapq Baav, Dapq taig uaq teij zyepg petq laanb ni? meib Bua laaig ninb Bua txvg kaub Do ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Eei zwavj myenb fai?
13.10: maaib nxm tivb kov Nxi, ye-su yem nxm wig txvb Faauj myenb.
13.22: ye-su mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb. mivb uaq zang ninb zweib muvq zweib laavd Faauj myenb.
13.12: ye-su pwatg zyrug heug ninb taaib fatq teij Buaj ninb, “Eaam aag, meib Eei pcvg lovj tavj kxn a'q.”
13.15: zyruq tau ninb, “meib Bua peib za'g Hruq Fwrtq Eei myenb aa'b! tivb kov Nxi meib Bua haiq taub yaag puvj vovb puvj lxb Zwrtq laanb, Ken mivb hopq uam maiq zeid?
13.13: ye-su txb puad maan Jyenq ninb, ninb zyrug lyemb zeib sruq za'g taaib yaag Zev Tinb huvb.
13.1: uaq zang maaib teij yem uaq Eei myenb kxvq Buaj ye-su maaib teij kaa-li-li myenb taij scvb Kuq ziag pun Tinb huvb uaq zang, zu'g pi-laatq taij ninb Bua. Ryaamq Zwrtq taaib zxpg zu'g uaq teij scvb Kuq Eei Ryaamq.
13.26: “meib Bua zyrug tau, ‘yia Bua Zauj meib Jwavg Eang, Jwavg hopq Jiaj. meib yaag yem yia Bua Eei Jaaib hxvg Faauj Jiaj Eei.’
13.25: pyaub zyruq Jiad sin mivb kwrn Jyenq kcvb, meib Bua xij zu'g yem ka'Eiag heug, ‘tomb kxj aa'b! Toq Kxi kcvb pun yia Bua pia'g maa'b!’ “mq paag ninb xij tau, ‘yia maiq hiuq tu'q meib Bua yem haaij taaib.’

1.18: sej-Kaa-li-yaa naaig finb myenb, “meib Navq naaig kxvq, yia fuvg haib hiuq tu'q zyen? yia koj haig a'q. yia Eei msia'q txn yaag koj haig.”
1.45: meib syenj zyruq kxvq liud uaq teij waag za'kevb xij Zwrtq taaib zyen Eei, meib zyrug maaib xnb lx'g haig.”
1.3: naaiq teij Jauq yem kxn taaib yetg zuvq yia kanb timq liud zyrug zweib yetq zweib Eeig Eei fiaq Jyenq pun meib.
1.66: haid liud Eei myenb zx'q naaiq teij sig an Jyenq Hruq Namq, “aa, naaiq taub fu'Jweiq Lo taaib penj haiq Euvg myenb ni?” weig zu'g mevb mevb pc'g pc'g Eei pwatg Jyenq zyruq Zauj ninb yem.
1.43: yia weig haiq tiug tu'q Dovg naaiq lovj? tu'q yia Eei zyruq Eei maa taaib Zauj yia Ryaaug ni?
1.50: ninb Kxb lyenb Taaib ninb Eei myenb, yetg txig Jiaj yetg txig.
1.14: meib zyrug Fyenb yrub, xnb lx'g haig. naaiq taub fu'Jweiq Zwrtq seij, myenb Zamq yaag a'Neiq haig.
1.48: yia zruj ninb Eei pru, maiq maaib haiq Euvg mevb hog mq paag ninb Zxg Javj Tauj yia. yem naaiq mivb Ga'haaq hivq, txib txig myenb zuvq xij kxvq yia tu'q fu'q,
1.69: ninb yem ninb Eei pru, Daa-witq, Eei zeib fun, weig Bua lyepg taub maaib Qa'q Eei Fruj zyruq,
1.34: maa-li-yaa naaig kaaj finb myenb, “yia lyemb maiq Zauj haiq taub mJavg txn pweij Jiaj. Navq haiq nx haib maaib sin?”
1.2: zunb tod myenb Eei mziv pwatg naaiq teij sig yem kxn Zwrtq uaq zang yaag zunb Buaj yia Bua, myenb zyrug ei Jyenq fiaq.
1.36: meib Namq mavg kaaj meib Eei Zyenb Ze'q, e-li-saa-Betg. myenb kxvq ninb maiq haib maaib kub vwaad. ib zang ninb Dovg naaig koj mq paag ninb zuvq maaib Jyenq sin tu'q Ju'q Laaj Eia'g a'q lo'b!
1.35: finb myenb cvj tau, “sivj livb xij Fiag taaib yem meib. yem Lav Jiaj Eei Tinb huvb Eei Qa'q xij Ria Jyenq meib. Navq naaiq meib zyrug tu'q taub maiq maaib zwid, Zivb Revg Eei fu'Jweiq, heug Tinb huvb Eei txn.
1.24: Ga'haaq e-li-saa-Betg maaib Jyenq sin. ninb zyrug yem pyaa Laaj Eia'g pyauq, maiq mivb haiq Dau.
1.71: Tinb huvb xij Fruj Bua leib Dutq Bua Eei winb wavq, Zauj Rxv Bua uaq teij myenb Eei puab Diaq.
